text: In this episode: Jon Arryn, the Hand of the King, is dead. King Robert Baratheon plans to ask his oldest friend, Eddard Stark, to take Jon's place. Across the sea, Viserys Targaryen plans to wed his sister to a nomadic warlord in exchange for an army.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [First scene opens with three Rangers riding through a tunnel, leaving the Wall, and going into the woods. (Eerie music in background) One Ranger splits off and finds a campsite full of mutilated bodies, including a child hanging from a tree branch. A birds-eye view shows the bodies arranged in a shield-like pattern. The Ranger rides back to the other two.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: WAYMAR ROYCE: What d’you expect? They’re savages. One lot steals a goat from another lot and before you know it, they’re ripping each other to pieces.
name: Winter is Coming

text: WILL: I’ve never seen wildlings do a thing like this. I’ve never seen a thing like this, not ever in my life.
name: Winter is Coming

text: WAYMAR ROYCE: How close did you get?
name: Winter is Coming

text: WILL: Close as any man would.
name: Winter is Coming

text: GARED: We should head back to the wall.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROYCE: Do the dead frighten you?
name: Winter is Coming

text: GARED: Our orders were to track the wildlings. We tracked them. They won’t trouble us no more.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROYCE: You don’t think he’ll ask us how they died? Get back on your horse.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [GARED grumbles.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: WILL: Whatever did it to them could do it to us. They even killed the children.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROYCE: It’s a good thing we’re not children. You want to run away south, run away. Of course, they will behead you as a deserter … If I don’t catch you first. Get back on your horse. I won’t say it again.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [WILL glares, but obeys. Sometime later, the three Rangers return to the campsite, which is now completely cleared.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROYCE: Your dead men seem to have moved camp.
name: Winter is Coming

text: WILL: They were here.
name: Winter is Coming

text: GARED: See where they went.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The three look around, swords drawn. They hear the wind and eerie calls. GARED finds a red cloth in the snow.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROYCE: What is it?
name: Winter is Coming

text: GARED: It’s …
name: Winter is Coming

text: [As he speaks, a CREATURE with glowing blue eyes rises behind ROYCE. ROYCE turns, the CREATURE strikes. The scene shifts to WILL, who hears a man crying out. The three horses stampede past him. He turns and sees someone standing very still in the distance. The figure turns – it’s the child who had been suspended in the tree, now with glowing blue eyes. WILL turns and runs.
name: Winter is Coming

text: GARED is also fleeing, and we hear strange growls and catch glimpses of the CREATURE. Both terrified RANGERS stop, some distance apart, to catch their breath. WILL sees a CREATURE behead GARED. WILL sinks to his knees and the CREATURE tosses GARED’S head to him.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Blackout / Opening credits]
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Riders from Winterfell come up behind a dazed WILL. The scene shifts to the castle, where BRAN is practicing archery and getting frustrated, under the eyes of JON SNOW and ROBB STARK. JON pats BRAN’S shoulder.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Go on. Father’s watching.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [We see NED and CATELYN STARK watching from above.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: And your mother.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to needlework practice with the girls inside the castle.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: SEPTA MORDANE (to SANSA): Fine work, as always. Well done.
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: Thank you.
name: Winter is Coming

text: SEPTA MORDANE: I love the detail that you’ve managed to get in this corners. … Quite beautiful … the stitching …
name: Winter is Coming

text: [As she murmurs to SANSA about the embroidery, ARYA struggles with her needlework and listens to the arrows hitting and the male laughter outside.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Outside, BRAN tries and misses again. Everyone laughs.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: And which one of you was a marksman at ten? Keep practicing, Bran. Go on.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Don’t think too much, Bran.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: Relax your bow arm.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [BRAN pulls the arrow back. An arrow hits the bullseye. BRAN (still with his arrow), JON, and ROBB turn in surprise to see ARYA, who curtsies after her perfect shot. ROBB and JON laugh as Bran takes out after ARYA.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON/ROBB: Quick, Bran, faster!
name: Winter is Coming

text: [RODRICK CASSEL and THEON GREYJOY approach NED and CATELYN on the balcony.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CASSEL: Lord Stark. My lady. A guardsman just rode in from the hills. They’ve captured a deserter from the Night’s Watch.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [NED grimaces.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Get the lads to saddle their horses.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [THEON departs.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Do you have to?
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: He swore an oath, Cat.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CASSEL: The law is law, my lady.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Tell Bran he’s coming, too.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [CASSEL nods and departs.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Ned. Ten is too young to see such things.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: He won’t be a boy forever. And winter is coming.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [NED departs. In the courtyard, ROBB and JON gather the arrows. CATELYN turns and glares down on JON. He looks at her and walks away.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: Lad, go run back and get the rest.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts, and we see WILL being taken to the block.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: WILL (muttering): White Walkers. I saw the White Walkers. White Walkers. The White Walkers, I saw them.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He and NED face each other.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: WILL: I know I broke my oath. And I know I’m a deserter. I should have gone back to the Wall and warned them. But I saw what I saw. I saw the White Walkers. People need to know. If you can get word to my family, tell them I’m no coward. Tell them I’m sorry.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [NED nods yes, and WILL is positioned on the tree limb that serves as a block. NED draws ice from a scabbard held by Theon.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: WILL (whispering): Forgive me, lord.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [NED bows his head over ICE.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: In the name of Robert of the House Baratheon, first of his name …
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON (to BRAN): Don’t look away.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: King of the Andals and the First Men …
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Father will know if you do.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and protector of the realm, I, Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell and Warden of the North, sentence you to die.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [NED swings ICE and beheads WILL. BRAN does not look away.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: You did well.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He walks away. ROBB turns and puts his arm around BRAN and they go to their horses together. NED approaches BRAN.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: You understand why I did it?
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: Jon said he was a deserter.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: But do you understand why I had to kill him?
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: Our way is the old way?
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: Is it true he saw the White Walkers?
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: The White Walkers have been gone for thousands of years.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: So he was lying?
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: A madman sees what he sees.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to a dead stag’s head. The Winterfell men gather on the bridge They see a ravaged deer before them.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: What is it?
name: Winter is Coming

text: THEON: Mountain lion?
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: There are no mountain lions in these woods.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [With swords out, they begin to search. NED finds a dead direwolf with antlers through her throat. Her pups are whimpering around her.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: THEON: It’s a freak.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: It’s a direwolf.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [NED and CASSEL glance at each other.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Tough old beast.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He pulls out the antlers.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: There are no direwolves south of the Wall.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Now there are five.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Jon picks up a pup and offers it to BRAN.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: You want to hold it?
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: Where will they go? Their mother’s dead.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CASSEL: They don’t belong down here.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Better a quick death. They won’t last without their mother.
name: Winter is Coming

text: THEON: Right. Give it here.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: NO!
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB (disgustedly to THEON): Put away your blade.
name: Winter is Coming

text: THEON: I take orders from your father, not you.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: Please, father!
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: I’m sorry, Bran.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Lord Stark? There are five pups. One for each of the Stark children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. They were meant to have them.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Everyone looks at NED, BRAN with great hope.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: You will train them yourselves. You will feed them yourselves. And if they die, you will bury them yourselves.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [BRAN cradles his pup as JON hands more pups to ROBB.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN (to JON): What about you?
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: I’m not a Stark. Get on.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JON walks away, pauses, and hears another whimper.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: What is it?
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JON pulls up a white wolf pup.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: THEON: The runt of the litter. That one’s yours, Snow.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to bells ringing at Kings Landing. In front of the Iron Throne, surrounded by druidical looking celebrants, lies the body of JON ARRYN. Up in the balcony, CERSEI watches the scene below as JAIME approaches.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: As your brother, I feel it’s my duty to warn you: You worry too much. It’s starting to show.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: And you never worry about anything. When we were seven, you jumped off the cliffs as Casterly Rock. One hundred foot drop into the water. And you were never afraid.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: There was nothing to be afraid of until you told father. [In a whisper, mimicking] We’re Lannisters. Lannisters don’t act like fools.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: What if Jon Arryn told someone?
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: But who would he tell?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: My husband.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: If he told the king, both our heads would be skewered on the city gates by now. Whatever Jon Arryn knew or didn’t know, it died with him. And Robert will choose a new Hand of the king, someone to do his job while he’s off f*cking boars and hunting whores. Or is it the other way around? And life will go on.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: You should be the Hand of the king.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: That’s an honor I can do without. Their days are too long, their lives are too short.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to a raven approaching Winterfell. CATELYN crosses a busy courtyard and finds NED in the godswood.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: All these years and I still feel like an outsider when I come here.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: You have five northern children. You’re not an outsider.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: I wonder if the old gods agree.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: It’s your gods with all the rules.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: I am so sorry, my love.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Tell me.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: There was a raven from Kings Landing. Jon Arryn is dead. A fever took him. I know he was like a father to you.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Your sister. The boy …
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: They both have their health. Gods be good. [pause] The raven brought more news. The king rides for Winterfell. With the queen and all the rest of them.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: He’s coming this far North, there’s only one thing he’s after.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: You can always say no, Ned.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to the Winterfell great hall where a great banquet is being prepared.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: We need plenty of candles for Lord Tyrion’s chamber. I’m told he reads all night.
name: Winter is Coming

text: MAESTER LUWIN: I’m told he drinks all night.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: How much could he possibly drink? A man of his … stature.
name: Winter is Coming

text: LUWIN: We’ve brought up eight barrels of ale from the cellar. Perhaps we’ll find out.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: In any case, candles.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to Robb, Theon, and Jon getting barbered.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Why’s your mother so dead-set on us getting pretty for the king?
name: Winter is Coming

text: THEON: It’s for the queen, I bet. I hear she’s [sleek as a mink?]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: I hear the prince is a right royal prick.
name: Winter is Coming

text: THEON: Think of all those southern girls he gets to stab with his right royal prick.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: Go on, Tommy, shave him good. He’s never met a girl he likes better than his own hair.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to the royal procession approaching Winterfell. Bran sees them from his perch high atop a castle wall and clambers nimbly down to tell everyone. CATELYN and LUWIN walk to the courtyard, passing BRAN’s wolf pup.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Gods, but they grow fast. [Seeing BRAN on the wall] Brandon!
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: I saw the king! He’s got hundreds of people!
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: How many times have I told you: No climbing!
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: But he’s coming right now! Down our road!
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: I want you to promise me: No more climbing.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN (looking down): I promise.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: D’you know what?
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: What?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: You always look at your feet before you lie. Run and find your father. Tell him the king is close.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [BRAN runs off, followed by his wolf pup.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to grand entry of the king’s horses and men. ARYA, wearing a helm and cloak, pushes her way into a tall wagon for a better look. In rides JOFFREY, followed by the HOUND. The other Starks wait in a greeting line.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Where’s Arya? Sansa, where’s your sister?
name: Winter is Coming

text: [More riders with banners. ARYA scoots past her parents to get in the receiving line.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Hey,, hey, hey, hey. What are you doing with that on? [Pulls off ARYA’s helm]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ARYA (pushing BRAN): Move!
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JOFFREY rides up, SANSA smiles at him, ROBB glares at JOFFREY. The HOUND pulls up his helm. The coach carrying CERSEI lumbers in, followed by KING ROBERT. All kneel. ROBERT heaves himself off his horse. NED looks shocked at the sight of his old friend, now fat and red-faced. ROBERT signals for all to rise and looks at NED.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Your Grace.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: You’ve got fat.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [NED gives ROBERT a “What about you?” look. They start laughing.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Cat!
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Your Grace.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Nine years. Why haven’t I seen you? Where the hell have you been?
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Guarding the North for you, Your Grace. Winterfell is yours.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [CERSEI and her other children descend from the coach.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ARYA: Where’s the Imp?
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: Will you shut up?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Who have we here? You must be Robb. (To Sansa) My, you’re a pretty one. (To Arya) Your name is?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ARYA: Arya.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT (to BRAN) Ooh. Show us your muscles. You’ll be a soldier.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JAIME removes his helm.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ARYA: That’s Jaime Lannister. The queen’s twin brother.
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: Would you please shut up.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [CERSEI approaches.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: My queen.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: My queen.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Take me to your crypt. I want to pay my respects.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: We’ve been riding for a month, my love. Surely the dead can wait.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Ned.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ARYA: Where’s the Imp?
name: Winter is Coming

text: [CERSEI, humiliated in front of all, walks back to JAIME.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: Where is our brother? Go find the little beast.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene changes to the crypt.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Tell me about Jon Arryn.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: One minute he was fine, and then … Burned right through him, whatever it was. I loved that man.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: We both did.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: He never had to teach you much, but me … You remember me at 16? All I wanted to do was crack skulls and f*ck girls. He showed me what was what.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Aye.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Don’t look at me like that. Not his fault I didn’t listen. (They laugh. ROBERT sighs.) I need you, Ned. Down at Kings Landing. Not up here, where you’re no damn use to anybody. Lord Eddard Stark, I would name you the Hand of the king.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [NED kneels.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: I’m not worthy of the honor.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: I’m not trying to honor you. I’m trying to get you to run my kingdom while I eat, drink, and whore my way to an early grave. Damn it, Ned, stand up. You helped me win the Iron Throne, now help me keep the damn thing. We were meant to rule together. If your sister had lived, we would have been bound by blood. Well, it’s not too late. I have a son, you have a daughter. We’ll join our Houses.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene changes to JAIME in the Winterfell settlement. We see Tyrion inside a whorehouse, swilling liquor and laughing as a woman pops into view after servicing him.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: Mmh. It is true what they say about the Northern girls.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROS: Did you hear the king’s in Winterfell?
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: I did hear something about that.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROS: And the queen. And her twin brother. They say that he is the most handsome man in the Seven Kingdoms.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: And the other brother?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROS: The queen has two brothers?
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: There’s the pretty one. And there’s the clever one.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROS: I hear they call him the Imp.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: I hear he hates that nickname.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROS: Oh? I hear he’s more than earned it. I hear he’s a drunken little lecher into all manner of perversions.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: Clever girl.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROS: We’ve been expecting you, Lord Tyrion.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: Have you?
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: The gods gave me one blessing.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [She climbs on TYRION. JAIME walks in without knocking.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: Don’t get up.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROS: M’lord.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: Should I explain to you the meaning of a closed door in a whorehouse, brother?
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: You’ve much to teach me, no doubt. But our sister craves your attention.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: She has odd cravings, our sister.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: A family trait. Now, the Starks are feasting us at sundown. Don’t leave me alone with these people.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: I’m sorry, I’ve begun the feast a bit early. And this is the first of many courses.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: I thought you might say that. But since we’re short on time, (he opens the door; a bevy of whores enter and descend on TYRION) Come on, girls. See you at sundown.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JAIME leaves.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: Close the door!
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene changes to the Winterfell crypt, at Lyanna’s tomb. Robert places a feather in the hand of her statue.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Did you have to bury her in a place like this? She should be on a hill somewhere with the sun and the clouds above her.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: She was my sister. This is where she belongs.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: She belonged with me.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He touches Lyanna’s face.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: In my dreams, I kill him every night.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: It’s done, Your Grace. The Targaryens are gone.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Not all of them.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to Daenerys on a balcony in Pentos, across the Narrow Sea.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS (off camera): Daenerys!
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He enters a large chamber.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: Daenerys! There’s our bride to be! Look – a gift from Illyrio. Touch it. Come on. Feel the fabric. Mmmm. Isn’t he a gracious host?
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS: We’ve been his guests for over a year and he’s never asked us for anything.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: Illyrio is no fool. He knows I won’t forget my friends when I come into my throne. You still slouch. Let me see. (He pulls off her gown.) You have a woman’s body now. (She endures it as he strokes her breast.) I need you to be perfect today. Can you do that for me? You don’t want to wake the dragon, do you?
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS: No.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [VISERYS nods and starts to leave the chamber. He turns.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: When they write the history of my reign, sweet sister, they will say it began today.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Daenerys turns and steps into a steaming hot bath with a despairing look on her face.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: MAID: It’s too hot, my lady.
name: Winter is Coming

text:
ad=document.getElementById("chitika-ads-1"),ad.getBoundingClientRect().width?adWidth=ad.getBoundingClientRect().width:adWidth=ad.offsetWidth,function(){if(void 0===window.CHITIKA&&(window.CHITIKA={units:[]}),adWidth>=550)var t={publisher:"andjoh",width:550,height:250,sid:"In-Post",color_site_link:"E7CE64",color_text:"ffffff",color_bg:"000033",color_button:"E7CE64",color_button_text:"000033"};else var t={publisher:"andjoh",width:300,height:250,sid:"In-Post",color_site_link:"E7CE64",color_text:"ffffff",color_bg:"000033",color_button:"E7CE64",color_button_text:"000033"};var i=window.CHITIKA.units.length;window.CHITIKA.units.push(t),document.write('
');var e=document.createElement("script");e.type="text/javascript",e.src="//cdn.chitika.net/getads.js";try{document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(e)}catch(o){document.write(e.outerHTML)}}();
name: Winter is Coming

text: [But DAENERYS keeps stepping deeper. The scene shifts to ILLYRIOS, DAENERYS, AND VISERYS outside the mansion, awaiting Khal Drogo.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: Where is he?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: The Dothraki are not known for their punctuality.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [A host of Dothraki come riding up. Khal Drogo wheels his stallion into the front.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: (Greets them in Dothraki.) May I present my honored guests? Viserys of House Targaryen, the third of his name. The rightful King of the Andals and the First Men. And his sister, Daenerys, of the House Targaryen.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS (to DAENERYS) Do you see how long his hair is? When Dothraki are defeated in combat, they cut off their braid so the whole world can see their shame. Khal Drogo has never been defeated. He’s a savage, of course, but he’s one of the finest killers alive. And you will be his queen.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: Come forward, my dear.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [KHAL DROGO watches as DAENERYS walks toward him. She does not hesitate and looks straight at him, although there is fear on her face. KHAL DROGO gazes at her and then leads his horsemen on a charge away.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: Where’s he going?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: The ceremony is over.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: But he didn’t say anything. Did he like her?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: Trust me, Your Grace. If he didn’t like her, we’d know.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The scene shifts to ILLYRIO, VISERYS, AND DAENERYS ON A GARDEN BALCONY OVERLOOKING THE SEA.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: It won’t be long now. Soon you will cross the Narrow Sea and take back your father’s throne. The people drink secret toasts to your health. They cry out for their true king.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: When will they be married?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: Soon. The Dothraki never stay still for long.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: Is it true they lie with their horses?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: I wouldn’t ask Khal Drogo.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: Do you take me for a fool?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: I take you for a king. Kings lack the caution of common men. My apologies if I’ve given offense.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: I know how to play a man like Drogo. I give him a queen and he gives me an army.
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS (pleadingly) I don’t want to be his queen. I want to go home.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: So do I. I want us both to go home. But they took it from us. So tell me, sweet sister, how do we go home?
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS: I don’t know.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: We go home with an army. With Khal Drogo’s army. I would let his whole tribe f*ck you, all 40,000 men and their horses too, if that’s what it took.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He gives DAENERYS a brotherly kiss on the forehead and walks away. The scene shifts to a bedroom in Winterfell, where CATELYN is fixing SANSA’S hair.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: Do you think Joffrey will like me? What if he thinks I’m ugly?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Then he is the stupidest prince that ever lived.
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: He’s so handsome.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [CATELYN rolls her eyes.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: When would we be married? Soon or do we have to wait?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Hush now. Your father hasn’t even said yes.
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: Why would he say no? He’d be the second most powerful man in the kingdoms.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: He’d have to leave home. He’d have to leave me. And so would you.
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: You left your home to come here. And I’d be queen someday. Please make father say yes.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Sansa…
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: Please, please. It’s the only thing I ever wanted.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [Scene shifts to the Winterfell banquet. Laughter, music, KING ROBERT getting bawdy with a wench. CATELYN and CERSEI watch, CATELYN embarrassed for CERSEI, who looks disgusted. Out in the courtyard, JON takes out his frustration on a fencing dummy. His uncle BENJEN rides up.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: Is he dead yet?
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Uncle Benjen!
name: Winter is Coming

text: [They hug.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: You got bigger. I rode all day. Didn’t want to leave you alone with the Lannisters. Why aren’t you at the feast?
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Lady Stark thought it might insult the royal family to seat a b*st*rd in their midst.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: Well, you’re always welcome on the wall. No b*st*rd was ever refused a seat there.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: So take me with you when you go back.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: Jon…
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Father will let me if you ask him, I know he will.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: The Wall isn’t going anywhere.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: I’m ready to swear your oath.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: You don’t understand what you’d be giving up. We have no families. None of us will ever father sons.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: I don’t care about that.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: You might, if you knew what it meant. … I’d better get inside. Rescue your father from his guests. We’ll talk later.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [BENJEN goes to the banquet.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: Your uncle’s in the Night’s Watch.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: What’re you doing back there?
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION (drinking): Preparing for a night with your family. I’ve always wanted to see the Wall.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: You’re Tyrion Lannister. The queen’s brother?
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: My greatest accomplishment. You – you’re Ned Stark’s b*st*rd, aren’t you?
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JON looks angry and turns away.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: Did I offend you? Sorry. You are the b*st*rd, though.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: Lord Eddard Stark is my father.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: And Lady Stark is not your mother. Making you a b*st*rd. Let me give you some advice, b*st*rd. Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armor. Then it can never be used to hurt you.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JON: What the hell do you know about being a b*st*rd?
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: All dwarves are bastards in their fathers’ eyes.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [TYRION departs. JON picks up his sword and attacks the dummy with new ferocity.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The scene shifts back to the banquet, in full raucous swing. NED is off to himself; BENJEN comes up to him.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: You at a feast -- It’s like a bear in a trap.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: The boy I beheaded. Did you know him?
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: Of course I did. Just a lad. But he was tough, Ned. A true Ranger.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: He was talking madness. Said the Walkers slaughtered his friends.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: The two he was with are still missing.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: A wildling ambush.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: Maybe. Direwolves south of the wall. Talk of the Walkers. My brother might be the next Hand to the king. Winter is coming.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Winter is coming.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [ROBB approaches.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: Uncle Benjen.
name: Winter is Coming

text: BENJEN: Robb boy. How are ye?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: I’m good.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [KING ROBERT gets even more bawdy with a wench.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN (in desperation) Is this your first time in the North, Your Grace?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: Yes. Lovely country.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [They observe SANSA.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: I’m sure it’s very grim, after Kings Landing. I remember how scared I was when Ned brought me up here for the first time.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [SANSA approaches and smiles shyly at CERSEI.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: Hello, little dove. But you are a beauty. How old are you?
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: Thirteen, Your Grace.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: You’re tall. Still growing?
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: I think so, Your Grace.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: And have you bled yet?
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA (discomfited): No, Your Grace.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: And your dress. Did you make it?
name: Winter is Coming

text: [SANSA nods yes.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: Such talent. You must make something for me.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [SANSA departs.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI (to CATELYN]: I hear we might share a grandchild someday.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: I hear the same.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: Your daughter will do well in the capital. Such a beauty shouldn’t stay hidden up here forever.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [SANSA and JOFFREY catch each other’s eye. JOFFREY smiles at her and she turns to her friend.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JAIME and NED meet up. JAIME blocks their path.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Your pardon.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: I hear we might be neighbors soon. I hope it’s true.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Yes, the king has honored me with his offer.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: I’m sure we’ll have a tournament to celebrate the new title, if you accept. It would be good to have you in the field. The competition has become a bit stale.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: I don’t fight in tournaments.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: No? Getting a little old for it?
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: I don’t fight in tournaments because when I fight a man for real, I don’t want him to know what I can do.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: Well said.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [ARYA flips food onto SANSA’s face.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: SANSA: Arya!
name: Winter is Coming

text: [CATELYN signals a laughing ROBB to deal with the girls. He hoists up ARYA.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBB: Time for bed.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The scene shifts to after the banquet. NED and CATELYN are in their bed.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: I’m a Northman. I belong here with you, not down south in that rat’s nest they call a capital.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: I won’t let him take you.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: The king takes what he wants. That’s why he’s king.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: I’ll say, ‘Listen, fat man, you are not taking my husband anywhere. He belongs to me now.’
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: How did he get so fat?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: He only stops eating when it’s time for a drink.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [There’s a knock at the door.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: A VOICE: It’s Maester Luwin, my lord.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Send him in.
name: Winter is Coming

text: LUWIN: Pardon, my lord, my lady. A rider in the night from your sister.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He hands CATELYN a sealed note.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: Stay.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: This was sent from the Eyrie. What’s she doing at the Eyrie? She hasn’t been back there since her wedding.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [CATELYN reads the note, looks up in alarm, and then burns it.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: What news?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: She’s fled the capital. She says Jon Arryn was murdered. By the Lannisters. She says the king is in danger.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: She’s fresh widowed, Cat. She doesn’t know what she’s saying.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: Lysa’s head would be on a spike right now if the wrong people had found that letter. Do you think she would risk her life, her son’s life, if she wasn’t certain her husband was murdered?
name: Winter is Coming

text: LUWIN: If this news is true, and the Lannisters conspire against the throne, who but you can protect the king?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: They murdered the last Hand. Now you want Ned to take the job.
name: Winter is Coming

text: LUWIN: The king rode for a month to ask Lord Stark’s help. He’s the only one he trusts. You swore the king an oath, my lord.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CATELYN: He spent half his life fighting Robert’s wars. He owes him nothing. (To NED) Your father and brother rode south once on a king’s demand.
name: Winter is Coming

text: LUWIN: A different time. Different king.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The scene shifts to the wild wedding celebration of KHAL DROGO and DAENERYS. Fighting and fornication. DAENERYS looks stricken at everything around her.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: When do I meet with the Khal? We need to begin planning the invasion.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: If Khal Drogo has promised you a crown, you shall have it.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: When?
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: When their omens favor war.
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: I piss on Dothraki omens. I waited 17 years to get my throne back.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The s*x and violence intensify. Two men fight to the death over a woman each is trying to rape. KHAL DROGO watches avidly.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: A Dothraki wedding without at least three deaths is considered a dull affair.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [A knight in Westerosi garb appears. KHAL DROGO greets him in Dothraki. It is JORAH MORMONT, bearing books.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JORAH: A small gift for the new Khaleesi. Songs and histories from the Seven Kingdoms.
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS: Thank you, ser. Are you from my country?
name: Winter is Coming

text: JORAH: Ser Jorah Mormont of Bear Island. I served your father for many years. Gods be good, I hope to always serve the rightful king.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [DANY is presented with a chest with three dragon eggs in it.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ILLYRIO: Dragons’ eggs, Daenerys. From the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai. The ages have turned them to stone, but they will always be beautiful.
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS: Thank you, Magister.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [KHAL DROGO rises and strides forward. DAENERYS follows him, looking sick with fear. The Dothraki crowd behind her as she goes. The KHAL leads her to a white mare.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS: She’s beautiful. … Ser Jorah, I don’t know how to say ‘thank you’ in Dothraki.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JORAH: There is no word for ‘thank you’ in Dothraki.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The KHAL puts DANY on her horse and mounts his.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: VISERYS: Make him happy.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The scene shifts to the seaside at sunset. The KHAL begins to unwrap DANY’s dress. She is sobbing. He touches the tears on her face.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: KHAL DROGO: No.
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS: Do you know the Common Tongue?
name: Winter is Coming

text: KHAL DROGO: No.
name: Winter is Coming

text: DAENERYS: Is ‘no’ the only word that you know?
name: Winter is Coming

text: KHAL DROGO: No.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He takes off her gown and bends her down.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The scene shifts to Winterfell. Tyrion and the Hound are seated outside the day after the banquet.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: THE HOUND: Rough night, Imp?
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: If I get through this without squirting from one end or the other, it will be a miracle.
name: Winter is Coming

text: THE HOUND: I didn’t pick you for a hunter.
name: Winter is Coming

text: TYRION: The greatest in the land. My spear never misses.
name: Winter is Coming

text: THE HOUND: It’s not hunting if you pay for it.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The king and Ned come into view.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: Are you as good with a spear as you used to be?
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: No, but I’m still better than you.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: I know what I’m putting you through. Thank you for saying yes. I only ask you because I need you. You’re a loyal friend. You hear me? A loyal friend. The last one I’ve got.
name: Winter is Coming

text: NED: I hope I’ll serve you well.
name: Winter is Coming

text: ROBERT: You will. And I’ll make sure you don’t look so f*cking grim all the time. Come on, boys, let’s go kill some boar!
name: Winter is Coming

text: [The king’s party rides off, NED nodding goodbye to BRAN, whose wolf pup begins sniffing at his feet.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: Come on, you.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [BRAN begins climbing, his wolf pup crying at the bottom of the castle wall. As he nears the top, he hears a woman and man moaning. Peering in the window, he sees CERSEI and JAIME having s*x. CERSEI sees BRAN.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: Stop. STOP.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JAIME runs and grabs BRAN at the window.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: Are you completely mad?
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: He saw us.
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: It’s all right. It’s all right.
name: Winter is Coming

text: CERSEI: He saw us!
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: I heard you the first time. (To BRAN) Quite the little climber, aren’t you? How old are you, boy?
name: Winter is Coming

text: BRAN: Ten
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: Ten.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [JAIME looks at CERSEI, who gazes back imploringly.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: JAIME: The things I do for love.
name: Winter is Coming

text: [He shoves BRAN out the window.]
name: Winter is Coming

text: / BLACKOUT /
name: Winter is Coming

text: ( Cawing )
name: The Kings Road

text: There was a raven from King's Landing.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Arryn is dead.
name: The Kings Road

text: The King rides for Winterfell with the Queen and all the rest of them.
name: The Kings Road

text: The Queen has two brothers?
name: The Kings Road

text: There's the pretty one, and there's the clever one.
name: The Kings Road

text: I would name you the Hand of the King.
name: The Kings Road

text: We were meant to rule together.
name: The Kings Road

text: I have a son, you have a daughter. We'll join our houses.
name: The Kings Road

text: The boy I beheaded ... he was talking madness.
name: The Kings Road

text: Said the others slaughtered his friends.
name: The Kings Road

text: Ned: A Wildling ambush.
name: The Kings Road

text: Maybe.
name: The Kings Road

text: You're Tyrion Lannister. You ... you're Ned Stark's b*st*rd, aren't you?
name: The Kings Road

text: Let me give you some advice, b*st*rd. Never forget what you are and it can never be used to hurt you.
name: The Kings Road

text: It's a direwolf.
name: The Kings Road

text: There are no direwolves south of the wall.
name: The Kings Road

text: Now there are five, one for each of the Stark children.
name: The Kings Road

text: What about you?
name: The Kings Road

text: I'm not a Stark.
name: The Kings Road

text: That one's yours, Snow.
name: The Kings Road

text: May I present Viserys of House Targaryen, the rightful King of the Andals, and his sister Daenerys?
name: The Kings Road

text: I don't want to be his queen. I want to go home.
name: The Kings Road

text: We go home with an army ...  with Khal Drogo's army.
name: The Kings Road

text: From your sister. She says Jon Arryn was murdered by the Lannisters.
name: The Kings Road

text: She says the King is in danger.
name: The Kings Road

text: What if Jon Arryn told someone?
name: The Kings Road

text: Whatever Jon Arryn knew died with him.
name: The Kings Road

text: The things I do for love.
name: The Kings Road

text: ♪ Game of Thrones 1x02 ♪ The Kingsroad Original Air Date on April 24, 2011
name: The Kings Road

text: Jorah Mormont : You need to drink, child. And eat.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Isn't there anything else ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jorah Mormont : The Dothraki have two things in abundance : grass and horses. People can't live on grass. In the Shadow Lands beyond Asshai, they say there are fields of ghost grass with stalks as pale as milk that glow in the night. It murders all other grass. The Dothraki believe that one day it will cover everything. That's the way the world will end. It'll get easier.
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : Khaleesi !
name: The Kings Road

text: Irri : Your hands.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jorah Mormont : We're still not far from Pentos, your Grace. Magister Illyrio has extended his hospitality. You'd be more comfortable there.
name: The Kings Road

text: Viserys Targaryen : I have no interest in hospitality or comfort. I'll stay with Drogo until he fulfils his end of the bargain and I have my crown.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jorah Mormont : As you wish, your Grace.
name: The Kings Road

text: Viserys Targaryen : Well, Mormont, as brutish as this life is, I suppose it is preferable to beheading. What did Ned Stark want you for ? Buying from a slaver ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jorah Mormont : Selling to one... Some poachers I caught on my land.
name: The Kings Road

text: Viserys Targaryen : Under my reign, you won't be punished for such nonsense. You can rest assured of that.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : Better-looking bitches than you're used to, Uncle. My mother's been looking for you. We ride for King's Landing today.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Before you go, you will call on Lord and Lady Stark and offer your sympathies.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : What good will my sympathies do them ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : None. But it is expected of you. Your absence has already been noted.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : The boy means nothing to me. And I can't stand the wailing of women.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : One word and I'll hit you again.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : I'm telling mother !
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Go ! Tell her. But first you will get to Lord and Lady Stark and you will fall on your knees in front of them and tell them how very sorry you are, that you are at their service, and that all your prayers are with them. Do you understand ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : You can't...
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Do you understand ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Sandor Clegane : The Prince will remember that, little lord.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : I hope so. If he forgets, be a good dog and remind him. Time for breakfast. Bread. And two of those little fish. And a mug of dark beer to wash it down. And bacon, burned black.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : Little brother.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Beloved siblings.
name: The Kings Road

text: Myrcella Baratheon : Is Bran going to die ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Apparently not.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : What do you mean ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : The Maester says the boy may live.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : It's no mercy, letting a child linger in such pain.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Only the gods know for certain. All the rest of us can do is pray. The charms of the north seem entirely lost on you.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : I still can't believe you're going. It's ridiculous even for you.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Where's your sense of wonder ? The greatest structure ever built, the intrepid men of the Night's Watch, the wintry abode of the White Walkers.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : Tell me you're not thinking of taking the black.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : And go celibate ? The whores would go begging from Dorne to Casterly Rock. I just want to stand on top of the Wall and piss off the edge of the world.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : The children don't need to hear your filth. Come.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : Even if the boy lives, he'll be a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death any day.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Speaking for the grotesques, I'd have to disagree. Death is so final, whereas life... Life is full of possibilities. I hope the boy does wake. I'd be very interested to hear what he has to say.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : My dear brother, there are times you make me wonder whose side you're on.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : My dear brother, you wound me. You know how much I love my family.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : Please.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I would have dressed, your Grace.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : This is your home. I'm your guest. Handsome one, isn't he ? I lost my first boy, a little black-haired beauty. He was a fighter too... Tried to beat the fever that took him. Forgive me. It's the last thing you need to hear right now.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I never knew.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : It was years ago. Robert was crazed, beat his hands bloody on the wall, all the things men do to show you how much they care. The boy looked just like him. Such a little thing... A bird without feathers. They came to take his body away and Robert held me. I screamed and I battled, but he held me. That little bundle. They took him away and I never saw him again. Never have visited the crypt, never. I pray to the Mother every morning and night that she return your child to you.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I am grateful.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : Perhaps this time she'll listen.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : A sword for the wall ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : I already have one.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : Good man. Have you swung it yet ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Of course I have.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : At someone, I mean. It's a strange thing, the first time you cut a man. You realize we're nothing but sacks of meat and blood and some bone to keep it all standing. Let me thank you ahead of time for guarding us all from the perils beyond the Wall... Wildlings and White Walkers and whatnot. We're grateful to have good, strong men like you protecting us.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : We've guarded the kingdoms for 8 000 years.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : Is it "we" already ? Have you taken your vows then ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Soon enough.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jaime Lannister : Give my regards to the Night's Watch. I'm sure it will be thrilling to serve in such an elite force. And if not ? It's only for life.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Thank you, Nymeria. Septa Mordane says I have to do it again. My things weren't properly folded, she says. Who cares how they're folded ?! They're going to get all messed up anyway.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : It's good you've got help.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Watch. Nymeria, gloves.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Impressive.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Shut up. Nymeria, gloves !
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : I have something for you. And it has to be packed very carefully.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : A present ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Close the door. This is no toy. Be careful you don't cut yourself.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : It's so skinny.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : So are you. I had the blacksmith make it for you special. It won't hack a man's head off, but it can poke him full of holes if you're quick enough.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : I can be quick.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : You'll have to work at it every day. How does it feel ? Do you like the balance ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : I think so.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : First lesson: Stick them with the pointy end.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : I know which end to use.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : I'm going to miss you. Careful. All the best swords have names, you know.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Sansa can keep her sewing needles. I've got a needle of my own.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : I came to say goodbye to Bran.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : You've said it.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : I wish I could be here when you wake up. I'm going north with Uncle Benjen. I'm taking the black. I know we always talked about seeing the Wall together, but you'll be able to come visit me at Castle Black when you're better. I'll know my way around by then. I'll be a sworn brother of the Night's Watch. We can go out walking beyond the Wall, if you're not afraid.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I want you to leave. 17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon. You came back a year later with another woman's son. And now you're leaving again.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : I have no choice.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : That's what men always say when honor calls. That's what you tell your families, tell yourselves. You do have a choice. And you've made it. I can't do it, Ned. I really can't.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : You can. You must.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : You've said goodbye to Bran ? He's not going to die. I know it.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : You Starks are hard to kill.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : My mother ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : She was very kind.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : Good. Next time I see you, you'll be all in black.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : It was always my color.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : Farewell, Snow.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : And you, Stark.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch. The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years. And you are a Stark. You might not have my name, but you have my blood.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Is my mother alive ? Does she know about me ? Where I am, where I'm going ? Does she care ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : The next time we see each other, we'll talk about your mother. I promise.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : Gods, this is country ! I've half a mind to leave them all behind and keep going.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : I've half a mind to go with you.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : What do you say, just you and me on the Kingsroad, swords at our sides, a couple of tavern wenches to warm our beds tonight.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : You should have asked me 20 years ago.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : There were wars to fight, women to marry... We never had the chance to be young.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : I recall a few chances.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : There was that one... Oh, what was her name ? That common girl of yours ? Becca ? With the great big tits you could bury your face in.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Bessie. She was one of yours.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : Bessie ! Thank the gods for Bessie and her tits. Yours was... Aleena ? No. You told me once. Meryl ? Your b*st*rd's mother ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Wylla.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : That's it. She must have been a rare wench to make Lord Eddard Stark forget his honor. You never told me what she looked like.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Nor will I.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : We were at war. None of us knew if we were gonna go back home again. You're too hard on yourself. You always have been. I swear if I weren't your King, you'd have hit me already.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : The worst thing about your coronation... I'll never get to hit you again.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : Trust me, that's not the worst thing. There was a rider in the night.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord. What of it ? Should we send her a wedding gift ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : A knife perhaps, a good sharp one, and a bold man to wield it.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : She's little more than a child.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : Soon enough that child will spread her legs and start breeding.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Tell me we're not speaking of this.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : Oh, it's unspeakable to you ? What her father did to your family... That was unspeakable. What Rhaegar Targaryen did to your sister... the woman I loved. I'll kill every Targaryen I get my hands on.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : But you can't get your hands on this one, can you ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : This Khal Drogo, it's said he has 100 000 men in his horde.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Even a million Dothraki are no threat to the realm, as long as they remain on the other side of the Narrow Sea. They have no ships, Robert.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : There are still those in the Seven Kingdoms who call me Usurper. If the Targaryen boy crosses with a Dothraki horde at his back, the scum will join him.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : He will not cross. And if by chance he does, we'll throw him back into the sea.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : There's a war coming, Ned. I don't know when, I don't know who we'll be fighting, but it's coming.
name: The Kings Road

text:
ad=document.getElementById("chitika-ads-1"),ad.getBoundingClientRect().width?adWidth=ad.getBoundingClientRect().width:adWidth=ad.offsetWidth,function(){if(void 0===window.CHITIKA&&(window.CHITIKA={units:[]}),adWidth>=550)var t={publisher:"andjoh",width:550,height:250,sid:"In-Post",color_site_link:"E7CE64",color_text:"ffffff",color_bg:"000033",color_button:"E7CE64",color_button_text:"000033"};else var t={publisher:"andjoh",width:300,height:250,sid:"In-Post",color_site_link:"E7CE64",color_text:"ffffff",color_bg:"000033",color_button:"E7CE64",color_button_text:"000033"};var i=window.CHITIKA.units.length;window.CHITIKA.units.push(t),document.write('
');var e=document.createElement("script");e.type="text/javascript",e.src="//cdn.chitika.net/getads.js";try{document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(e)}catch(o){document.write(e.outerHTML)}}();
name: The Kings Road

text: Benjen Stark : Sit. You'll be fed. Untie them.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Rapers. They were given a choice no doubt... Castration or the Wall. Most choose the knife. Not impressed by your new brothers ? Lovely thing about the Watch... You discard your old family and get a whole new one.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Why do you read so much ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Look at me and tell me what you see.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Is this a trick ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : What you see is a dwarf. If I'd been born a peasant they might've left me out in the woods to die. Alas, I was born a Lannister of Casterly Rock. Things are expected of me. My father was the Hand of the King for 20 years.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Until your brother killed that King.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Until my brother killed him. Life is full of these little ironies. My sister married the new King and my repulsive nephew will be King after him. I must do my part for the honor of my house, wouldn't you agree ? But how ? Well, my brother has his sword and I have my mind. And a mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone. That's why I read so much. And you ? What's your story, b*st*rd ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : Ask me nicely and maybe I'll tell you, dwarf.
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : A b*st*rd boy with nothing to inherit, off to join the ancient order of the Night's Watch, alongside his valiant brothers-in-arms.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jon Snow : The Night's Watch protects the realm from...
name: The Kings Road

text: Tyrion Lannister : Yes yes, against grumpkins and snarks and all the other monsters your wet nurse warned you about. You're a smart boy. You don't believe that nonsense. Everything's better with some wine in the belly.
name: The Kings Road

text: Maester Luwin : It's time we reviewed the accounts, my lady. You'll want to know how much this royal visit has cost us.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : Talk to Poole about it.
name: The Kings Road

text: Maester Luwin : Poole went south with Lord Stark, my lady. We need a new steward, and there are several other appointments that require our immediate attention...
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I don't care about appointments !
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : I'll make the appointments. We'll talk about it first thing in the morning.
name: The Kings Road

text: Maester Luwin : Very good, my Lord. My Lady.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : When was the last time you left this room ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I have to take care of him.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : He's not going to die, mother. Maester Luwin says the most dangerous time has passed.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : What if he's wrong ? Bran needs me.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : Rickon needs you. He's six. He doesn't know what's happening. He follows me around all day, clutching my leg, crying...
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : Close the windows ! I can't stand it ! Please make them stop !
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : Fire. You stay here. I'll come back.
name: The Kings Road

text: Man : You're not supposed to be here. No one is supposed to be here. It's a mercy. He's dead already.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : No !
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Have you ever seen a dragon ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Irri : Dragon gone, Khaleesi.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Everywhere ? Even in the east ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Irri : No dragon. Brave men kill them. It is known.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jhiqui : It is known.
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : A trader from Garth told me that dragons come from the moon.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : The moon ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : He told me the moon was an egg, Khaleesi, that once there were two moons in the sky. But one wandered too close to the sun and it cracked from the heat. Out of it poured a thousand thousand dragons and they drank the sun's fire.
name: The Kings Road

text: Irri : Moon is no egg. Moon is goddess... wife of sun. It is known.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jhiqui : It is known.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Leave me with her. Why did the trader from Garth tell you these stories ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : Men like to talk when they're happy. Before your brother bought me for you, it was my job to make men happy.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : How old were you ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : I was nine when my mother sold me to the pleasure house.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Nine ?!
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : I did not touch a man for three years, Khaleesi. First you must learn.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Can you teach me how to make the Khal happy ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : Yes.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Will it take three years ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : No.
name: The Kings Road

text: Benjen Stark : Welcome.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : What I am about to tell you must remain between us. I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown.
name: The Kings Road

text: Maester Luwin : The boy was always sure-footed before.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : Someone tried to kill him twice. Why ? Why murder an innocent child ? Unless he saw something he wasn't meant to see.
name: The Kings Road

text: Theon Greyjoy : Saw what, my lady ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I don't know. But I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved. We already have reason to suspect their loyalty to the crown.
name: The Kings Road

text: Rodrick Cassel : Did you notice the dagger the killer used ? It's too fine a weapon for such a man. The blade is Valyrian steel, the handle dragonbone. Someone gave it to him.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : They come into our home and try to murder my brother ? If it's war they want...
name: The Kings Road

text: Theon Greyjoy : If it comes to that, you know I'll stand behind you.
name: The Kings Road

text: Maester Luwin : What, is there going to be a battle in the Godswood ? Too easily words of war become acts of war. We don't know the truth yet. Lord Stark must be told of this.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I don't trust a raven to carry these words.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : I'll ride to King's Landing.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : No. There must always be a Stark in Winterfell. I will go myself.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : Mother, you can't.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I must.
name: The Kings Road

text: Rodrick Cassel : I'll send Hal with a squad of guardsmen to escort you.
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : Too large a party attracts unwanted attention. I don't want the Lannisters to know I'm coming.
name: The Kings Road

text: Rodrick Cassel : Let me accompany you at least. The Kingsroad can be a dangerous place for a woman alone.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robb Stark : What about Bran ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Catelyn Stark : I have prayed to the Seven for more than a month. Bran's life is in their hands now.
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : No, Khaleesi. You must look in his eyes always. Love comes in at the eyes. It is said that Irogenia of Lys could finish a man with nothing but her eyes.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Finish a man ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : Kings traveled across the world for a night with Irogenia. Magisters sold their palaces. Khals burned her enemies just to have her for a few hours. They say a thousand men proposed to her and she refused them all.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : Well, she sounds like an interesting woman. I don't think that Drogo will like it with me on top.
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : You will make him like it, Khaleesi. Men want what they've never had. And the Dothraki take slaves like a hound takes a bitch. Are you a slave, Khaleesi ? Then don't make love like a slave. Very good, Khaleesi. Out there he is the mighty Khal, but in this tent, he belongs to you.
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : I don't think that this is the Dothraki way.
name: The Kings Road

text: Doreah : If he wanted the Dothraki way, why did he marry you ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Daenerys Targaryen : No. No. Tonight I would look upon your face.
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : Pardon me, Ser.
name: The Kings Road

text: Sandor Clegane : Do I frighten you so much, girl ? Or is it him there making you shake ? He frightens me too. Look at that face.
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : I'm sorry if I offended you, Ser. Why won't he speak to me ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Sandor Clegane : He hasn't been very talkative these last 20 years. Since the mad King had his tongue ripped out with hot pincers.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : He speaks damn well with his sword though. Ser Ilyn Payne, the King's justice. The royal executioner. What is it, sweet lady ? Does the hound frighten you ? Away with you, dog. You're scaring my lady. I don't like to see you upset. The sun is finally shining. Come walk with me.
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : Stay, Lady. I probably shouldn't have any more. Father only lets us have one cup at feasts.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : My princess can drink as much as she wants. Don't worry... You're safe with me.
name: The Kings Road

text: Mycah : I'll get you !
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : Arya !
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : What are you doing here ? Go away.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : Your sister ? And who are you, boy ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Mycah : Mycah, my Lord.
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : He the butcher's boy.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : He's my friend.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : A butcher's boy who wants to be a Knight, eh ? Pick up your sword, butcher's boy. Let's see how good you are.
name: The Kings Road

text: Mycah : She asked me to, my Lord. She asked me to.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : I'm your prince, not your lord, and I said pick up your sword.
name: The Kings Road

text: Mycah : It's not a sword, my prince. It's only a stick.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : And you're not a Knight. Only a butcher's boy. That was my lady's sister you were hitting, do you know that ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Stop it !
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : Arya, stay out of this.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : I won't hurt him... Much. Filthy little bitch !
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : No no, stop it, stop it, both of you. You're spoiling it. You're spoiling everything !
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : I'll gut you, you little c**t !
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : Arya !
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Nymeria !
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : Please don't.
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : Arya, leave him alone. My prince, my poor prince, look what they did to you. Stay here, I'll go back to the inn and bring help.
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : Then go ! Don't touch me.
name: The Kings Road

text: Soldier 1 : The wolf's not here. Look down by the stream.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : You've got to go. They'll kill you for what you did to Joffrey. Go on... run. Go ! Leave now !
name: The Kings Road

text: Soldier 2 : It's a direwolf.
name: The Kings Road

text: Soldier 1 : I'll check down here.
name: The Kings Road

text: Soldier 2 : I think I heard a noise.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Go !
name: The Kings Road

text: Jory Cassel : My lord ! My lord ! They found her. She's unharmed.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Where is she ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jory Cassel : She's been taken directly before the King.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Who took her ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Jory Cassel : The Lannisters found her.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Right, get back.
name: The Kings Road

text: Jory Cassel : The Queen ordered them to bring her straight to him.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Back ! Back to the inn. All back !
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : I'm sorry.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Are you hurt ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : No.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : It's all right. What is the meaning of this ? Why was my daughter not brought to me at once ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : How dare you speak to your King in that manner ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : Quiet, woman. Sorry, Ned. I never meant to frighten the girl. But we need to get this business done quickly.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : Your girl and that butcher's boy attacked my son. That animal of hers nearly tore his arm off.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : That's not true ! She just... Bit him a little. He was hurting Mycah.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : Joff told us what happened. You and that boy beat him with clubs while you set your wolf on him.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : That's not what happened !
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : Yes it is ! They all attacked me and she threw my sword in the river.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Liar !
name: The Kings Road

text: Joffrey Baratheon : Shut up !
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : Enough ! He tells me one thing, she tells me another. Seven hells ! What am I to make of this ? Where's your other daughter, Ned ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : In bed asleep.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : She's not. Sansa, come here, darling.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : Now, child... Tell me what happened. Tell it all and tell it true. It's a great crime to lie to a King.
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : I don't know. I don't remember. Everything happened so fast. I didn't see.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Liar ! Liar liar liar !
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : Arya !
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Stop it ! That's enough of that.
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Liar liar liar !
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Stop ! Arya !
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : She's as wild as that animal of hers. I want her punished.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : What would you have me do, whip her through the streets ? Damn it, children fight. It's over.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : Joffrey will bear these scars for the rest of his life.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : You let that little girl disarm you ? See to it that your daughter is disciplined. I'll do the same with my son.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Gladly, your Grace.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : And what of the direwolf ? What of the beast that savaged your son ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : I'd forgot the damned wolf.
name: The Kings Road

text: Soldier : We found no trace of the direwolf, your Grace.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : So be it.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : We have another wolf.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : As you will.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : You can't mean it.
name: The Kings Road

text: Robert Baratheon : A direwolf's no pet. Get her a dog. She'll be happier for it.
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : He doesn't mean Lady, does he ? No no, not Lady ! Lady didn't bite anyone ! She's good !
name: The Kings Road

text: Arya Stark : Lady wasn't there ! You leave her alone !
name: The Kings Road

text: Sansa Stark : Stop them. Don't let them do it. Please ! It wasn't Lady !
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : Is this your command... your Grace ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : Where is the beast ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Soldier : Chained up outside, your Grace.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : Ser Ilyn, do me the honor.
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : No. Jory... Take the girls to their rooms. If it must be done, then I'll do it myself.
name: The Kings Road

text: Cersei Baratheon : Is this some trick ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Eddard Stark : The wolf is of the north. She deserves better than a butcher. The butcher's boy... You rode him down ?
name: The Kings Road

text: Sandor Clegane : He ran... Not very fast.
name: The Kings Road

text: ( Whines )
name: The Kings Road

text: ( Whimpers )
name: The Kings Road

text: ( Yelps )
name: The Kings Road

text: ( Theme music playing )
name: The Kings Road

text: Still not far from Pentos, Your Grace. You'd be more comfortable there.
name: Lord Snow

text: I have no interest in hospitality or comfort.
name: Lord Snow

text: I'll stay with Drogo until he fulfills his end of the bargain and I have my crown.
name: Lord Snow

text: I have something for you.
name: Lord Snow

text: First lesson: Stick them with the pointy end.
name: Lord Snow

text: 17 years ago you rode off with Robert Baratheon.
name: Lord Snow

text: And now you're leaving again.
name: Lord Snow

text: I have no choice.
name: Lord Snow

text: There's great honor serving in the Night's Watch.
name: Lord Snow

text: The Starks have manned the Wall for thousands of years.
name: Lord Snow

text: And you are a Stark.
name: Lord Snow

text: Daenerys Targaryen has wed some Dothraki horselord.
name: Lord Snow

text: What of it? Tell me we're not speaking of this.
name: Lord Snow

text: I'll kill every Targaryen I get my hands on.
name: Lord Snow

text: Rapers. Not impressed by your new brothers?
name: Lord Snow

text: Lovely thing about the watch ...
name: Lord Snow

text: You discard your old family and get a whole new one.
name: Lord Snow

text: Welcome.
name: Lord Snow

text: I don't think Bran fell from that tower. I think he was thrown. No!
name: Lord Snow

text: Someone tried to kill him twice.
name: Lord Snow

text: I would stake my life the Lannisters are involved.
name: Lord Snow

text: Lord Stark must be told of this.
name: Lord Snow

text: I will go myself.
name: Lord Snow

text: What is the meaning of this?
name: Lord Snow

text: Joff told us what happened.
name: Lord Snow

text: You and that boy beat him with clubs while you set your wolf on him.
name: Lord Snow

text: That's not what happened!
name: Lord Snow

text: Ahh!
name: Lord Snow

text: We found no trace of the direwolf, Your Grace.
name: Lord Snow

text: We have another wolf.
name: Lord Snow

text: As you will.
name: Lord Snow

text: He doesn't mean Lady, does he?
name: Lord Snow

text: Lady didn't bite anyone! She's good!
name: Lord Snow
