text: ( Neighing )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Whoa, oof!
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Groans )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Damn.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You're much uglier in daylight.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: What's your name?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I'm Jaime Lannister of Casterly Rock, son of Tywin.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A captive Knight has a right to know his captor's identity.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Brienne of Tarth.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Tarth, Tarth, Tarth.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Crescent moons and starbursts.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Lord... Selwyn Tarth, your father.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Do you have any brothers and sisters, My Lady?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: It's a long way to King's Landing.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Might as well get to know one another.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Have you known many men?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I suppose not.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Women?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Horses? Ah!
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I didn't mean to give offense, My Lady.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Forgive me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Your crimes are past forgiveness, Kingslayer.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Why do you hate me so much?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Have I ever harmed you?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You've harmed others ...  those you were sworn to protect, the weak, the innocent.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Has anyone ever told you you're as boring as you are ugly?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You will not provoke me to anger.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I already have. Look at you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You're ready to chop my head off.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Do you think you could?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Do you think you could beat me in a fair fight?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I've never seen you fight.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The answer is no.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: There are three men in the kingdoms who might have a chance against me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You're not one of them.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: All my life men like you have sneered at me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And all my life I've been knocking men like you into the dust.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: If you're so confident, unlock my chains.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Let's see what happens.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Do you take me for an idiot? In.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I took you for a fighter, a man ... pardon ... woman of honor.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Was I wrong?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You're afraid.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Maybe one day we'll find out, Kingslayer.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Kevan: King's Landing will fall an hour after Stannis lands his force.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: It's not too late for King Joffrey and Cersei and the court
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: to ride west to safety.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Surrender the Iron Throne?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Better than seeing their heads mounted on the city gates.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Stannis will execute them all.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: No, a king who runs will not be king for long.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's a Lannister. He'll stand and fight.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Stannis, two days from the capital and the wolf at my doorstep.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The scouts assure us Robb Stark remains north of Ashemark.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Ha! The last time the scouts assured us of Stark's movement, he lured us into a trap.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Which is why my son is his prisoner.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Too close to Casterly Rock.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He sent a splinter force to recapture Winterfell.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The Greyjoys have done us a great favor.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Stark won't risk marching on Casterly Rock until he's at full force.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's a boy and he's never lost a battle.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He'll risk anything at any time because he doesn't know enough to be afraid.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: We'll ride at nightfall.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I want a full night's march before he knows we're on the move.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Clegane, you'll maintain a garrison here at Harrenhal.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Track down this brotherhood and destroy them.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The girl has proven herself a good servant.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: She'll stay on with you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: See that he doesn't get drunk in the evenings.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's poor company when he's sober, but he's better at his work.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You've got some questions to answer.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Man: Who killed Ser Amory?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Man #2: I don't know!
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Give me the name.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Man #2: Please!
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Man #3: Take this one out for the crows.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Man #2: I told you, I don't know.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Please.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Look, it's Yoren's little c**t.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Used to be a boy, now it's a girl.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Man laughs )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Where's Jaqen?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Don't care.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Where's your stick now, bitch?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I promised to f*ck you with it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Guard: Come on, time to kill some wolves.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Men shouting )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You need sour cherries to make it right.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And the secret is you dry the stones, and then you break them with a mallet.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: That's where the real flavor is.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You crush 'em up real fine.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And then when you're finished, you sprinkle them over the piecrust.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Where's Jaqen?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: How would I know?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I need him now.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Lord Tywin's marching tonight.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You need him?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's helping me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Hot Pie: I saw him.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Where?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Where?!
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Ow!
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Where?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: They went riding out the gates a few hours ago.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: On patrol. Let go of my ears.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Horses neighing, men shouting )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: What do you want with him anyway?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Men shouting )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Wind howling )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Qhorin: Mance is gonna march on the Wall.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: When he does, one brother inside his army will be worth 1,000 fighting against it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: They'll never trust me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: They might...
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: If you do what needs to be done.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: What?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: How does it feel knowing those men all died so you could skip through the snow with your little savage girl?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I didn't.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I should have known better, trusting a traitor's b*st*rd.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's not yours to kill, crow.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Do you have to do that here?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I like to keep me hands clean.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Yes, but do you have to do it here?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You should start wearing the gold cloak.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I don't want to wear a gold cloak.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You're commander of the City Watch.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You shouldn't be dressed like a common sellsword.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A cloak slows you down in a fight, makes it hard to move quietly.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And the gold catches the light, so you're nice and easy to spot at night.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Well, you're not sneaking through alleyways any longer.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You're supposed to stand out.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: We had a deal, and wearing a gold cloak wasn't part of it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Fine, fine.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: No gold cloak.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: What?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: What?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: What? What? Why are you staring at me?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Scoffs ) You don't want me cleaning me nails.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You don't want me looking your way.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Why am I here?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: To help me plan the defense of King's Landing.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Laughs )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Stannis will be here any day.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Sighs )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And one of these explains how to beat him?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: "An History of the Great Sieges of Westeros" by Archmaester
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: "Shevelathin."
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: "Shevelatesh."
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: "Chevalteesh."
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I'd swap all your books for a few good archers.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: My Lord Hand, Commander.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I must compliment you on the Gold Cloaks' performance these last few weeks.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Did you know there has been a marked drop in thievery?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I did not know.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And how did you accomplish this marked drop in thievery?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Me and the lads rounded up all the known thieves.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: For questioning?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Uh, no.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: It's just the unknown thieves we need to worry about now.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: We talked about this.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Aye, we talked about it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Have you ever been in a city under siege?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Maybe this part's not in your books.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: See, it's not the fighting that kills most people.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: It's the starving. Food's worth more than gold.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Noble ladies sell their diamonds for a sack of potatoes.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Things get bad enough, the poor start eating each other.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The thieves, they love a siege.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Soon as the gates are sealed, they steal all the food.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: By the time it's all over, they're the richest men in town.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Given the circumstances, My Lord, I believe extreme measures are warranted.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Ah.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: "The Great Sieges of Westeros."
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Thrilling subject.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Shame Archmaester Ch'vyalthan wasn't a better writer.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Stannis knows King's Landing.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He knows where the walls are strongest and he knows which gates are weakest.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The mud gate.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A good ram will batter it down in minutes and it's only 50 yards from the water.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: That's where he'll land.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And if Stannis does attack the mud gate, what is our plan?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: We could throw books at his men.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: We don't have that many books.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: We don't have that many men, either.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: What do we have?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Pig sh1t.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Wind howling )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Chatter )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Panting )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I'm not cut out for this sort of work.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I always imagined meself doing something much worse.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: We're digging latrine pits at the end of the world.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I can't imagine anything much worse.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Dolorous Edd: You lack imagination.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Sam: Where do you think Jon is right now?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He went off with the Halfhand. He didn't come back.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A betting man would go with dead.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's not dead.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: No, Jon's a great fighter.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Well, he's better than me and a lot better than you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's got a Valyrian steel sword.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: So did his father.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And Qhorin Halfhand is the greatest ranger alive.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Great rangers never get old is the problem.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: sh1t ones neither.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: It's them in the middle that last a long time.

name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The First Men made these marks.

name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Help me with it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Straining )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Look.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: If you find something you're not supposed to, best thing to do is pretend you've never seen it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: That's a Night's Watch cloak.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: It's been here a long time.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Oh, must be Dragonglass.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Grenn: Dragonglass?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The Maesters call it Obsidian.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Why would a brother hide it here?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I expect it's 'cause he wanted somebody to find it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Mind where you're going.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I'm sorry. I'll ... where were you?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A man has patrol duty.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Tywin Lannister was right here and now he's gone.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A girl owes one more name.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The Red God demands it. Give the man a name.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: How long after I give you the name does it take you to kill someone?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A minute, an hour, a month.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Death is certain, the time is not.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's taking his army to attack my brother.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I need him dead right now.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: This a man cannot do.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You promised you'd help me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Help was not promised, lovely girl.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Only death. There must be others.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Give a name, any name.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And you'll kill them?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Anybody?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: By the seven New Gods and the Old Gods beyond counting, I swear it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: All right.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Jaqen H'ghar.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A girl gives a man his own name?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: That's right.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Gods are not mocked.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: This is no joking thing.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I'm not joking.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A man can go kill himself.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Un-name me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: No.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Please?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I'll un-name you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Thank you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: If you help me and my friends escape.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: This would require more than one life.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: This is not part of our bargain.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Fine, Jaqen H'ghar.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A girl lacks honor.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: If I do this thing, a girl must obey.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A girl will obey.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A girl and her friends will walk through the gate at midnight.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Thank you, Podrick.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Odd little boy.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I have a certain sympathy for odd little boys.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You and Varys both.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Excellent lamprey pie.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Were you slaving away in the kitchen all day?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I hear Joffrey plans on fighting.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: An inspiration for the troops.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The young king in his shining armor fighting to defend the capital against the wicked old rebel.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's only a boy.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Younger boys are off fighting his war.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He's not ready.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: What is he, 17?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Remember Jaime at 17?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Better than you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Some men have a gift for this sort of thing, some don't.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: His place is not on the battlefield.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: It's not on the throne, either, sadly for all of us.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Do you think I'm an idiot?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: No, I'd say you possess above average intelligence.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You shipped off my only daughter.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And now you want to send my eldest son to the battlefield to die.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He'll have his Kingsguard protecting him.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He has the finest armor gold can buy.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: He needs to be out there.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The men will fight more fiercely seeing their king fighting beside them instead of hiding behind his mother's skirts.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Any dessert?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Do you know why Varys is so dangerous?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Because he has thousands of spies in his employ.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Because he knows everything we do before we do it.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Because he doesn't have a cock.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Neither do you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Perhaps I'm dangerous, too.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You, on the other hand, are as big a fool as every other man.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: That little worm between your legs does half your thinking.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: It's not that little.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Laughs )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Why are you smiling?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Because I'm happy.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And why are you happy?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Because I have your little whore.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I thought you preferred blondes.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Such a droll little fellow.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Tell me, have you married this one yet?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: No?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Oh, good. Father will be so pleased.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Why do you care who I f*ck?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Because a Lannister always pays her debts.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You stole my only daughter, you plot to have Joffrey killed.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: This is madness. Stannis will be here in days.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You need me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: For what?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Your skill in battle?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Pretty thing, your whore.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Lovely body.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: The bruises will heal in time.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Where did you find her?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Varys isn't the only one who hears whispers.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Really, a Lannister lion necklace?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You need to hide your secret whores more carefully.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You've forgotten the most important thing about whores.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Oh?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Well, you're the expert.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Tell me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You don't buy them; You only rent them.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You're usually a better liar, baby brother.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: This one you like.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You like her very much.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Could it be love?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Don't worry, she'll be treated gently enough... unless Joffrey is hurt.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And then every wound he suffers she'll suffer, too.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And if he dies, there isn't a man alive who could devise a more painful death for your little c**t.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: And how do I know you haven't killed her already?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Would you like to see her?
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I thought you might.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Ser Mandon, bring in my brother's whore.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I'm sorry they hurt you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: You must be brave.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I promise I will free you.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Don't forget me.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: Never.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: ( Door opens, closes )
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: I will hurt you for this.
name: The Prince of Winterfell

text: A day will come when you think you're safe and happy and your joy will turn to ashes in your mouth.

text: For a man in service to such powers to sit on the Iron Throne, I can think of nothing worse.
name: Blackwater

text: And tonight, I believe you are the only man who can stop him.

name: Valar Morghulis

text: One or two must have tried to get inside big Brienne.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: One or two tried.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Ah.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: But you fought them off.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: But maybe you wished one of them could overpower you, fling you down, tear off your clothes.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: But none of them were strong enough.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'm strong enough.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Not interested.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Of course you are.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You'd love to know what it feels like to be a woman.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Ah. "They lay with lions."
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Tavern girls, I'd say.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Probably served my father's soldiers.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Maybe one of them gave up a kiss and a feel.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: That's how they earned this.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The glorious work of the northern freedom fighters.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Must make you proud to serve the Starks.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I don't serve the Starks. I serve Lady Catelyn.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Tell yourself that tonight when they swing in your dreams.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: What are you doing?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Burying them.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We shouldn't stay here. We should get back on the river.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I think these women would understand if ...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I don't care what you think.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I didn't leave it here.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Untie me now.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I gave it to you to cut the rope, and now I don't have me dagger no more.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: So unless it got stuck in your ass on its way to your c**t, it stands to reason that it's gone ... whoa!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: What's your business here?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Traveling a prisoner.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You're a woman. A woman!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Well, f*ck me!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If you've quite finished up ...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: All right, we'll be going.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Whoa, whoa.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Who do you fight for?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The Starks.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: What did he do?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Apparently eating is now a crime. Who knew?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No, stealing is a crime.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: But it's not a crime to starve. That's justice for you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Where are you taking him?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: To Riverrun.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Why Riverrun?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Steal from the Tullys, it's their dungeons you rot in.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Why not kill him?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: For stealing a pig?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I don't give the orders.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: He must be important to someone.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Sending him with you? How important could he be?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: All right, have it your way, m'lady.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Do I know you?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Have you been to Ashemark?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Then you don't know me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Do you ever go to the river market at Salt Rock?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Is it near Ashemark?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I've never been there.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: What do you think of these beauties?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I hope you gave them quick deaths.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Two of them we did, yeah.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Wait.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I do know you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: That's Jaime Lannister.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I wish someone had told me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I wouldn't have had to steal that pig.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If this is the Kingslayer, I think I'd know about it.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: How do you know what the Kingslayer looks like?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I was at Whispering Wood. I saw him.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They dragged him out of the woods and threw him down before the King.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: He's not the Kingslayer. Sorry to disappoint you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If he was, I'd only be traveling his head.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I have a question for you both.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And I want you to answer it at the same time.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I count to three, you both answer.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: What's his name?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: One.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Two. Three.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Two quick deaths.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Those were Stark men.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I don't serve the Starks.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I serve Lady Catelyn.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I told her I'd take you to King's Landing, and that's what I'm going to do.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Stay.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Walder Frey is a dangerous man to cross.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I know that.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And you mean to do it anyway?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I love her.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I know that seems important to you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It is important to me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Your father didn't love me when we married.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: He hardly knew me or I him.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Love didn't just happen to us.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We built it slowly over the years, stone by stone, for you, for your brothers and sisters, for all of us.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It's not as exciting as secret passion in the woods, but it is stronger.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It lasts longer.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And that is what would be in store for me with one of Walder Frey's daughters, what you and father had?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Why not?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Because she's not beautiful?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Because she's not exotic and exciting?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Now you're arguing just to argue because you arranged it.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And you agreed to it.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You gave him your word.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Treat your oaths recklessly and your people will do the same.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If your father lived his life for one thing ...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: My father is dead.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And the only parent I have left has no right to call anyone reckless.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You said you saw my victory in the flames.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I did.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I still see it.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The flames lied.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And I'm no better than a savage trusting in a Fire God.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I fought for your God in Blackwater Bay.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I led my men to the gates of the Seventh Hell as their brothers burned alive, and for what?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Attacked from behind by Tywin Lannister and the Tyrells.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If you see so much in your flames, why didn't you warn me?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The Lord of Light only allows me glimpses.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You claimed to speak for a God.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Will you quit the war just because you've lost a battle?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You talk about war as if you understand it.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I've been fighting far longer than you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Have you? Show me how you fight.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Show me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Where's your God now?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Will he save you?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Where is your God?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Inside you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I murdered my brother.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We murdered him.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Share the weight with me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: He wasn't your brother.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: This war has just begun.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It will last for years.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Thousands will die at your command.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You will betray the men serving you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You will betray your family.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You will betray everything you once held dear.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And it will all be worth it because you are the Son of Fire.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You are the Warrior of Light.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You will sweep aside this pretender and that one.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You will be King.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You promise these things, but... you don't know.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: None of us know.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Let me show you.

name: Valar Morghulis

text: Yes.

text: I will kill that man.

text: I don't care how many arrows they feather me with, how many spears they run through me, I will kill that horn-blowing c**t before I fall.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They want you to know you're surrounded.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I know I'm surrounded.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I know that because I stood on the battlements and saw I was surrounded.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They don't want you to sleep.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They want to sap your spirit before ...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Thank you, wise bald man.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Thank you for explaining siege tactics to me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No word from my father?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Send more ravens.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You killed all the ravens.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The first time I saw Winterfell...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The first time I saw Winterfell, it looked like something that had been here for thousands of years and would be here for thousands of years after I was dead.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I saw it and I thought,
name: Valar Morghulis

text: "of course Ned Stark crushed our rebellion and killed my brothers.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We never stood a chance against a man who lives here."
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Lord Stark went out of his way to make it your home.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Yes, my captors were so very kind to me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You love reminding me of that.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Everyone in this frozen pile of sh1t has always loved reminding me of that.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You know what it's like to be told how lucky you are to be someone's prisoner?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: To be told how much you owe them?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And then to go back home to your real father...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I will kill that man.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I swear it to the Drowned God, the Old Gods, the New Gods, to every f*cking God in every f*cking heaven, I will kill that man.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Theon, listen to me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I serve Winterfell.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Now Winterfell is yours.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'm bound by oath to serve you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And what's your counsel, trusted friend?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Run.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: 500 Northmen wait outside the walls.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You have 20 men.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You can't win.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Wait for nightfall and run.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: There's nowhere to run.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'd never make it back to the Iron Islands.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And even if I did, even if by some miracle I slipped through the lines and made it home, I'd be a coward.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The Greyjoy who ran.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The shame of the family.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Don't go home.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Join the Night's Watch.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Once a man has taken the Black... he's beyond reach of the law.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: All his past crimes are forgiven.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I won't make it to the Wall.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I won't make it 10 feet past the Winterfell gates.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: There are ways.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Hidden passageways built so the Lords of Winterfell could escape.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The road will be dangerous.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: But with a little luck... the Night's Watch is an ancient, honorable order.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You'll have opportunities there.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The opportunity for Jon Snow to cut my throat in my sleep.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The opportunity to make amends for what you've done.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I've done a lot, haven't I?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Things I never imagined myself doing.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I've known you many years, Theon Greyjoy.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You're not the man you're pretending to be.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Not yet.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You may be right.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: But I've gone too far to pretend to be anything else.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You hear that?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: That's the mating call of the Northmen.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They want to f*ck us.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Well, I haven't had a good f*ck in weeks.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'm ready for one.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They say every Ironborn man is worth a dozen from the mainland.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aye!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You think they're right?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aye.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We die today, brothers.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We die bleeding from 100 wounds with arrows in our necks and spears in our guts, but our war cries will echo through eternity.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They will sing about the battle of Winterfell until the Iron Islands have slipped beneath the waves.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Every man, woman, and child will know who we were and how long we stood.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aggar and Gelmarr;
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Wex and Urzen;
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Stygg and Black Lorren ...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Ironborn warriors will cry out our names as they leap onto the shores of Seagard and Faircastle.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aye!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Mothers will name their sons for us.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aye!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Girls will think of us with their lovers inside them.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aye!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And whoever kills that f*cking horn-blower will stand in bronze above the shores of Pyke!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aye!

text: Ah!
name: Valar Morghulis

name: Valar Morghulis

text: What is this?

text: Come on.

text: Why should I believe you?

name: Valar Morghulis

text: To create strife between my sister and me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Where before there was nothing but love.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Ser Mandon Moore tried to kill you on your sister's orders.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If it weren't for your Squire's bravery, you'd be a dead man.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Pod.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Yes, My Lord?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Would it be excessive of me to ask you to save my life twice in a week?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No, My Lord.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You're a good lad.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Get Bronn, tell him I want four of his most loyal Gold Cloaks outside my door at all times.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'm afraid your friend has been relieved of his command of the City Watch.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The Gold Cloaks are now firmly in the hands of your father or your sister.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It varies from cloak to cloak.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Then my hill tribesmen.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Have gone home.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Your father paid them quite handsomely.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'm afraid we won't be seeing each other for some time, My Lord.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Don't want to swim too close to a drowning man?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And I thought we were friends.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We are.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Podrick, would you mind?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: There are many who know that without you this city faced certain defeat.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The King won't give you any honors, the histories won't mention you, but we will not forget.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Come along now, Podrick.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: My love.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It was good of you to come.

text: Good of me?
name: Valar Morghulis

name: Valar Morghulis

text: You think I'm here for money?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: That was the arrangement we made.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I pay you and you lie to me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aw, I'm a poor little rich man and nobody loves me, so I make jokes all the time and pay them to laugh.
name: Valar Morghulis

name: Valar Morghulis

text: What are you doing here?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Waiting for you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: How did you know we'd come this way?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: After all the things you have seen, this is your question?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: How did you kill those guards?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Was it hard?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No harder than taking a new name if you know the way.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Show me how. I want to be able to do it, too.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If you would learn, you must come with me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Where?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Far and away across the Narrow Sea to Braavos.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: My dancing master was from Braavos.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: To be a dancing master is a special thing, but to be a faceless man ... that is something else entirely.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: A girl has many names on her lips ...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Joffrey, Cersei, Tywin Lannister, Ilyn Payne, the Hound.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Names to offer up to the Red God.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: She could offer them all one by one.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I want to.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: But I can't.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I need to find my brother and mother.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And my sister.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I need to find her, too.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Then we must part.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: A man has duties as well.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Here.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: What is it?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: A coin of great value.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Could it buy a horse?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It is not meant for the buying of horses.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Then what good is it?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If the day comes when you must find me again, just give that coin to any man from Braavos and say these words to him,
name: Valar Morghulis

text: "Valar Morghulis."
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Valar Morghulis.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Please don't go, Jaqen.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Jaqen is dead.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Say it again. Valar Morghulis.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Valar Morghulis.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Good.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Farewell, Arya Stark.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Osha, what are you doing?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Tell us what medicine to get from your chambers.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We'll make you better.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I feel just fine.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They burned it down. They burned everything.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Not everything. Not you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: But they may come back. You have to go.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Put on your warmest clothes.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Pack as much food as you can carry and go north.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: North's the wrong way.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Their mother and brother are south.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We don't know where.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: There are too many enemies in the South.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Go to the Wall to Jon.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: He'll look after you and let your mother know you're safe.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I don't want to leave you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No more than I want to leave you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I pulled you into the world.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Both of you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I've seen both your faces almost every day since.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And for that, I consider myself very, very lucky.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Go now with Hodor.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Go on.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'll be right here.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Hodor.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Osha.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You must protect them.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You're the only one who can.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You may have to protect them against your own kind.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I've got no great love for my own kind.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'll get you milk of the poppy.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Tell me where to find it.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I don't want milk of the poppy.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Do it quickly.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Until the sun rises in the west and sets in the east, until the rivers run dry and the mountains blow in the wind like leaves.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They miss their mother.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They want to be with you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Do you want to be with them?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You will be.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: When your dragons were born, our magic was born again.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It is strongest in their presence.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And they are strongest in yours.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You will be with them, through winter, summer, and winter again.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Across a thousand thousand seasons you will be with them.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And we will be with you until time comes to an end.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Welcome home, Daenerys Stormborn.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: This is not my home.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: My home is across the sea where my people are waiting for me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They will be waiting a long time.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Dracarys.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We should be there by sundown.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Won't be a fun night for you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Mance knows how to make crows sing.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If you know what to say, you might just make it through the night.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Not talking's not the way to go.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Careful with that.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You might cut yourself.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Never swung a sword before, have you?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You look like a baby with a rattle.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Enough of that!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Stop!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Why, traitor?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: So you can give Mance Rayder an invitation to Castle Black?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Let 'em fight.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: That's it? That's what you can do?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You little sh1t.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Your traitor father teach you that?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Or was it your whore mother?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We are the Watchers on the Wall.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You can tell Mance that's the man who killed Qhorin Halfhand.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Burn the body.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aye.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You don't want this one coming back for you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Come along, Jon Snow.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Time to meet the King-Beyond-The-Wall.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: What the ... ?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Khaleesi, please.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: He said you'd never leave Qarth alive.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Come.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Nothing.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Thank you, Xaro Xhoan Daxos.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Thank you for teaching me this lesson.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I am King of Qarth.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I can help you now, truly help you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: We can take the Iron Throne.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I'll bring you 1,000 ships.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Please, Khaleesi, I beg you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: All that you have dreamed is within your reach!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I beg you, please!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Khaleesi.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Please! Please!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: - Khaleesi!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It's all a lie.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Looks real enough to me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Real enough to buy a ship?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Aye, a small ship.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: I thought we were coming north to fight wildlings.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Is this goat?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It's moose.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: People shouldn't live anywhere you need to burn sh1t to keep warm.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Well, you see a tree, let me know.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: If you step back and think about it, the thing about Gilly that's so interesting is ...
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Just bloody kill me.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: No, truly.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The thing about her that I find so interesting is that after all that Craster's done to her, she's still got hope that life might get better.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: The thing about Gilly that you find so interesting is that she said six words to you.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: And the thing about you that I find so interesting is absolutely nothing.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: It's Jon and the Halfhand.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: They're back.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Two blasts is wildlings.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: You're not fighting them alone. Come on.
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Three blasts?
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Run!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Wait! Wait for me!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Grenn!
name: Valar Morghulis

text: Edd!
name: Valar Morghulis

name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We need to get back to the Wall.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It's a long march.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We know what's out there, but we have to make it, have to warn them or before winter's done, everyone you've ever known will be dead.

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: First time you've seen a giant, Jon Snow?

name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Crow!
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Crow!
name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Oh!
name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And I'll be free to kill you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Got no respect, this lot.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Got no fathers to slap 'em when they're foul.

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Some of them were killed by crows like you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Don't look so grim, Jon Snow.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: If Mance Rayder likes you, you'll live another day.
name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I smell a crow.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We killed his friends.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Thought you'd want to question this one.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: What do we want with a baby crow?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: This baby killed Qhorin Halfhand.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He wants to be one of us.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: That half-handed c**t killed friends of mine.

text: Friends twice your size.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: My father told me big men fall just as quick as little ones
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: if you put a sword through their hearts.

text: And there's plenty of little skeletons
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: buried in the woods.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: What's your name, boy?

text: Jon Snow.

text: This isn't the damned Night's Watch where we make you swear off girls.

text: This chicken eater you thought was king is Tormund Giantsbane.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Can't believe this pup
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: killed the Halfhand.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He was our enemy and I'm glad he's dead.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He was my brother once.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Back when he had a whole hand.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: What were you doing with him?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The Lord Commander sent me to the Halfhand for seasoning.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He wants me to lead one day.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But here you are, a traitor kneeling before the King-beyond-the-Wall.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: If I'm a traitor, then you are, too.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why do you want to join us, Jon Snow?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I want to be free.
name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I think what you want most of all is to be a hero.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'll ask you one last time ... why do you want to join us?
name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I saw...
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You saw what?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I saw Craster take his own baby boy and leave it in the woods.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I saw what took it.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You're telling me you saw one of them?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And why would that make you desert your brothers?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Because when I told the Lord Commander, he already knew.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Thousands of years ago, the First Men battled the White Walkers and defeated them.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I want to fight for the side that fights for the living.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Did I come to the right place?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We'll need to find you a new cloak.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Don't you want to leave something to the imagination?

text: Briefly.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'm sure you filled your pockets.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And now my pockets are empty.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You've given me a taste for the finer things.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And if you want me to carry on protecting you, you'll need to pay more.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I thought we were friends.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We are.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But I'm a sellsword. I sell my sword.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I don't loan it out to friends as a favor.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: How much?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Double.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Double?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'm a knight now.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Knights are worth double.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I don't even know how much I'm paying you now.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Which means you can afford it.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( breathing heavily )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( waves lapping )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( seabirds calling )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Here. Here!
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Help me!
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( horn blowing )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Who are you?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I was in the battle at Blackwater.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I was a captain and a knight.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Aye, ser, and serving which king?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The one true king of Westeros ...
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Stannis Baratheon.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I thought you were dead.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Everyone thought you were dead.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And your son?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He may have swam ashore as you did.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: No, the wildfire took him. I saw it.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'm so sorry, my friend.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I, too, have lost a son.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: There is nothing worse in this world.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But, Davos, you were a good father.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: If I was a good father, he'd still be here.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Stannis lives?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He licks his wounds at Dragonstone.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Will you take me there?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: There is nothing for me at Dragonstone.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: This war is not over.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Not for you, maybe.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But for Salladhor Saan, the war is over.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We're both sworn to King Stannis.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I am sworn to no man.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I promised you 30 ships and you promised me riches and glory.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I delivered the ships.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Stannis never gives up. Never.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Now he will regroup ...
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He's a broken man.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: His fleet lies at the bottom of Blackwater Bay.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: They say he sees no one ... not his generals, not even his wife.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Only the Red Woman whispering in his ear, telling him what she sees in the flames and burning men alive.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: What?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: They built a great fire when Stannis returned.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: All those who spoke against her she called servants of darkness.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: They say she sang to them as they burned.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'm a pirate.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You're a smuggler.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Servants of darkness.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'm thinking Dragonstone is a good place for us to avoid.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Take me back there, please.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You cannot turn Stannis against her.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Maybe not, but I could carve her heart out.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You could try.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: If you fail, they will burn you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: If you succeed, they'll burn you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And you've only just come back to life.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Stay alive a little longer, my friend.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You call me friend. You drank with me on my wedding day.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And you drank with me on four of my wedding days, but I don't ask you for favors.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I have to stop her.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Please, do this for me.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: When you are dead, I will gather your bones in a little sack and let your widow wear them around her neck.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We should set the siege lines
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: 1,000 yards from Harrenhal.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: There won't be a siege. The Mountain can't defend a ruin.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I imagine the Mountain will defend whatever Tywin Lannister tells him to defend.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The Lannisters have been running from us since Oxcross.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'd love a fight. The men would love a fight.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I don't think we're going to get one.
name: Valar Dohaeris

name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( flies buzzing )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: 200 Northmen slaughtered like sheep.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The debt will be repaid, my friend.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: For them and for your sons.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Will it?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: They rot in the ground
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: while their killer runs free.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The Kingslayer won't remain free for long.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: My best hunters are after him.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Robb: A Mallister?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Ser Jeremy.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: My father's bannerman.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Find her a chamber that will serve as a cell.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Talisa: She's your mother.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: She freed Jaime Lannister.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The Lannisters robbed them of their sons and she robbed them of their justice.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( coughing )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Water.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Water.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: This needs to be cleaned and closed.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: What's your name, friend?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Qyburn.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You're lucky to be alive.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Lucky?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( birds cawing )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( sighs )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The badge looks good on you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Almost as good as it looked on me.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Are you enjoying your new position?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Am I enjoying it?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I was very happy as Hand of the King.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( chuckles ) Yes.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I heard how happy you were.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( blows )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You brought a whore into my bed.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It wasn't your bed at the time.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I sent you here to advise the king.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I gave you real power and authority.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You chose to spend your days as you always have, bedding harlots and drinking with thieves.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Occasionally I drank with the harlots.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: What do you want, Tyrion?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why does everyone assume I want something?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Can't I simply visit with my beloved father?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: My beloved father who somehow forgot to visit his wounded son after he fell on the battlefield.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Maester Pycelle assured me your wounds were not fatal.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I organized the defense of this city while you held court in the ruins of Harrenhal.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I led the foray when the enemies were at the gate while your grandson, the king, quivered in fear behind the walls.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I bled in the mud for our family.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And as my reward, I was trundled off to some dark little cell.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But what do I want?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: A little bloody gratitude would be a start.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Jugglers and singers require applause.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You are a Lannister.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Do you think I demanded a garland of roses every time I suffered a wound on a battlefield?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Hmm?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Now, I have seven kingdoms to look after and three of them are in open rebellion.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: So tell me what you want.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I want what is mine by right.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Jaime is your eldest son, heir to your lands and titles.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But he is a Kingsguard, forbidden from marriage or inheritance.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The day Jaime put on the white cloak, he gave up his claim to Casterly Rock.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I am your son and lawful heir.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You want Casterly Rock?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It is mine by right.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( sighs )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We'll find you accommodations more suited to your name and as a reward for your accomplishments during the battle of Blackwater Bay.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And when the time is right, you will be given a position fit for your talents so that you can serve your family and protect our legacy.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And if you serve faithfully, you will be rewarded with a suitable wife.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And I would let myself be consumed by maggots before mocking the family name and making you heir to Casterly Rock.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You ask that?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You, who killed your mother to come into the world?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You are an ill-made, spiteful little creature full of envy, lust, and low cunning.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Men's laws give you
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: the right to bear my name and display my colors since I cannot prove that you are not mine.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And to teach me humility,
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: the gods have condemned me to watch you waddle about wearing that proud lion that was my father's sigil and his father's before him.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But neither gods nor men will ever compel me to let you turn Casterly Rock
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: into your whorehouse.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Go, now.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Speak no more of your rights to Casterly Rock.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Go.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Oh, one more thing.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The next whore I catch in your bed I'll hang.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Sansa: Dorne.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It's going to Dorne.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Shae: Why Dorne?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It's carrying silk and it's supposed to bring back wine in exchange.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But it's not coming back.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The captain's tired of risking his life so King's Landing lords and ladies can get drunk on better wine than they deserve.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He's going to stay in Dorne.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Wait out the winter where it's beautiful and warm.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I met some people in Dorne who weren't so beautiful and warm.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Don't ruin the game.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I told you, I don't want to play.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: What about that one there?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: That one?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It's going to Volantis.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Because when I got on a ship in Volantis, it looked like that one.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: That's not how the game works.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You're not supposed to just blurt out the right answer.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You've got to invent a story about where the ship is going and why.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why should I make up a story when I know the truth?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Because the truth is always either terrible or boring.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Lovely day for it.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Watching the ships.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Lord Baelish.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Might I speak with Lady Sansa alone for a moment?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I saw your mother not long ago.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: She's very eager to see you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And your sister.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Arya's alive?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You said you'd take me home.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You said King's Landing was your home.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You are the property of the crown.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Stealing you would be treason.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: If you were to tell just one person ...
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I won't tell anyone.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: How do I know?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Because I'm a terrible liar.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You said so yourself.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Please, Lord Baelish. Tell me what to do. Tell me when.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'm waiting for word on an assignment that will take me far away from the capital.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: When I set sail, I might be able to take you with me.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But you'll need to be ready to leave on a moment's notice.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You're her handmaiden?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Yes. And you're his...?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I help manage his affairs.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He's an important person.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: So is she.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I grew up in the shadow of her father's castle.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The day she was born, they rang the bells from sunrise till sunset.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We've both done rather well, you and I.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Yes.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Given where we started.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And where is that?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It's not easy for girls like us to dig our way out.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Ros:
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Watch out for her.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I always do.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Watch out for her with him.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( dragon screeching )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( screeches )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( screeches )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( screeching )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: They're growing fast.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Not fast enough.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I can't wait that long.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I need an army.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( dragon screeching )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We'll be in Astapor by nightfall.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The greatest slave-soldiers in the world.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The distinction means a good deal to some people.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Do those people have any better ideas about how to put you on the Iron Throne?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It's too beautiful a day to argue.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( man vomiting )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You're right.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Another lovely day on the high seas.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Daenerys: Don't mock them.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: They're the first Dothraki who have ever been on a ship.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: They followed me across the poison water.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: If they'll do it, others will.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And with a true khalasar ...
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The Dothraki follow strength above all, khaleesi.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You'll have a true khalasar when you prove yourself strong.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And not before.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( seabirds calling )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Your Grace.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I heard you were dead.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Not yet.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I had hoped to speak to you alone, Your Grace.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: We are alone.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Your Grace, you are the rightful king.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Not only by blood.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You're an honorable man, a just man.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And there is still a war to fight.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I am fighting.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: By burning prisoners alive?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: How would you punish the infidels, Ser Davos?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I do not judge people for the gods they worship.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: If I did, I'd have thrown you in the sea before you ever set foot on Dragonstone.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I'm not your enemy.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You are my enemy.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Was it me you fought on Blackwater Bay?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Did I set your ships ablaze?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I wasn't there when the wildfire killed our men by the thousands.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I could have saved those men.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You would have taken the city, Stannis would now sit upon his rightful throne, and you would stand beside him.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: But I wasn't there because you convinced your king to leave me behind.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Do you hear them screaming?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: All those burning men in the water crying for their mothers, for their gods for help?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Until the moment the Blackwater swallowed them.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( gasps )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Don't despair, Ser Davos.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: What I told your son is true.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Death by fire is the purest death.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( growls )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: This woman is evil!
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: She's the mother of demons.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Take him to the dungeon and lock him in a cell.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Your Grace!
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Come on.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You've chosen the darkness, Ser Davos.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: She will destroy us all!
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I will pray for you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Davos: Your Grace!
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( door closes )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( guards shouting )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Guard: Halt. Down.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Guard #2: Halt. Down.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why have we stopped?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: It's Lady Margaery, Your Grace.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Joffrey: What is she doing? Who gave her permission?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Maid: My lady. We should have guards, my lady.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Why?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Pardon me.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Stop, my lady. You'll ruin your dress.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I have others.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Would you like to speak with her, Your Grace?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: No.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He was a soldier.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He went to fight on the walls when the ships came into Blackwater Bay.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He never came back.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And your mother?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: She died when she had me.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Bad men wanted to come into this city and do terrible things, but your father stopped them.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Whenever you look at this knight, I want you to remember your father.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He wasn't a knight.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: He was just a soldier.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: And what do knights swear to do?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Protect the weak and uphold the good.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Your father did that. Be proud of him.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Was your father a soldier, too?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: You should be proud, too.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Under King Joffrey's leadership, your fathers saved the city.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: They saved us all.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: From now on, we're going to take care of you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: All of you.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( children laughing )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Come to me for whatever you need to feed them, clothe them, or house them.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Directly to me.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( doors open )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Your Grace.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Your Grace.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Please, sit. Sit.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I do apologize, my lady.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Small council meetings.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: At what point does it become treason to waste the king's time?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: ( laughs )
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: That's a lovely gown, my lady.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Yes, it suits you perfectly.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I imagine you might be rather cold.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: The climate is a bit more forgiving back in Highgarden, Your Grace.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Shall I have them bring you a shawl, my lady?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: I am touched by your concern, Your Grace.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Luckily for us Tyrells, our blood runs quite warm.
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Doesn't it, Loras?
name: Valar Dohaeris

text: Yes.
