text: So we've been told.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Are you going to bring the food or do you mean to starve us to death?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Here, Sansa, come sit with me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm much less boring than these others.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Do you know my son?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The Lord of Highgarden?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I haven't had the pleasure.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No great pleasure, believe me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A ponderous oaf.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: His father was an oaf as well.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My husband, the late Lord Luthor.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He managed to ride off a cliff whilst hawking.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: They say he was looking up at the sky and paying no mind to where his horse was taking him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And now my son is doing the same, only this time he's riding a lion instead of a horse.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Now...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I want you to tell me the truth about this royal boy, this Joffrey.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You, you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Who else would know better?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We've heard some troubling tales.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Is there any truth to them?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Has this boy mistreated you?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Has he ripped out your tongue?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Joff ... King Joffrey, he ... His Grace is very fair and handsome and as brave as a lion.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yes, all Lannisters are lions.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And when a Tyrell farts, it smells like a rose.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But how kind is he?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: How clever?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Has he a good heart, a gentle hand?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm to be his wife.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I only want to know what that means.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( footsteps approaching )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Bring me some cheese.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The cheese will be served after the cakes, my lady.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The cheese will be served when I want it served.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And I want it served now.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Are you frightened, child?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No need for that.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We're only women here.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Tell us the truth. No harm will come to you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My father always told the truth.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yes, he had that reputation.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And they named him traitor and took his head.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Joffrey.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Joffrey did that.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He promised he would be merciful and he cut my father's head off.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And he said that was mercy.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Then he took me up on the walls and made me look at it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Go on.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I ... I can't. I never meant ... my father was a traitor.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My brother as well. I have traitor's blood.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Please don't make me say anymore.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: She's terrified, Grandmother.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Just look at her.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Speak freely, child.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We would never betray your confidence, I swear it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He's a monster.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Ah.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That's a pity.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Please, don't stop the wedding.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Have no fear. The Lord Oaf of Highgarden
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: is determined that Margaery shall be queen.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Even so, we thank you for the truth.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Ah, here comes my cheese.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( panting )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Karstark: We're at war.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: This march is a distraction.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My grandfather's funeral is not a distraction.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Are we riding to battle at Riverrun?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Then it's a distraction.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My Uncle Edmure has his forces garrisoned there.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We need his men.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Unless he's been breeding them, he don't have enough to make a difference.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Have you lost faith in our cause?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If it's revenge, I still got faith in it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If you no longer believe ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I can believe till it snows in Dorne.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Don't change the fact that we've got half the men.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You don't think we can win?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: May I speak my mind, Your Grace?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Have you not been speaking your mind, Lord Karstark?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I think you lost this war the day you married her.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( horse whinnies )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Whoa, whoa.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Your Grace.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You're afraid of her.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And she knows it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm not afraid of her.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( snorting )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: May I help you, Lady Stark?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm sorry, I shouldn't have ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You can't help because a mother makes one for her children to protect them.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Only a mother can make them.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You've made them before?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Twice.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Did they work?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: After a fashion.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I prayed for my son Bran to survive his fall.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Many years before that, one of the boys came down with the pox.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Maester Luwin said if he made it through the night, he'd live.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But it would be a very long night.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: So I sat with him all through the darkness.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Listened to his ragged little breaths, his coughing, his whimpering.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Which boy?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Jon Snow.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: When my husband brought that baby home from the war, I couldn't bear to look at him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I didn't want to see those brown stranger's eyes staring up at me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: So I prayed to the gods, take him away.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Make him die.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He got the pox.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And I knew I was the worst woman who ever lived.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A murderer.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'd condemned this poor, innocent child to a horrible death all because I was jealous of his mother.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A woman he didn't even know.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: So I prayed to all seven gods, let the boy live.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Let him live and I'll love him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'll be a mother to him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'll beg my husband to give him a true name, to call him Stark and be done with it, to make him one of us.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And he lived.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And he lived.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And I couldn't keep my promise.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And everything that's happened since then...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: all this horror that's come to my family... it's all because I couldn't love a motherless child.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Was it hard for you to kill the Halfhand?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yes.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You liked him?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I like you, but if you're playing us false, it won't be hard for me to kill you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I've got wildling blood in my veins.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: These are my people.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I understand.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Well, how could you understand?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You want to protect your people.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Do you know what it takes to unite 90 clans, half of whom want to massacre the other half for one insult or another?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: They speak seven different languages in my army.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The Thenns hate the Hornfoots.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The Hornfoots hate the ice-river clans.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Everyone hates the cave people.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: So you know how I got moon worshippers and cannibals and giants to march together in the same army?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I told them we were all going to die if we don't get south.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Because that's the truth.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Shouldn't be long now.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( screeching )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What's wrong with him?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Mance: He's a warg.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He can enter the mind of animals, see through their eyes.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He's scouting for us.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What, you've never met a warg?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( screeching )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Mance: Orell.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( shivers )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Where were you this time?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The Fist of the First Men.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What did you see?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( chuckles )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Dead crows.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( men coughing )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Rast: What's the matter, Piggy?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You crying 'cause you're cold?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: There's 200 brothers killed by dead men and you're still here whimpering.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That seem fair to you?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I seen 'em torn to pieces fighting while you was off somewhere hiding in a hole.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why don't you lie down and rest for a while, eh?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You know you want to.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Hey.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Get up, Sam.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Get up.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I can't.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If you stop, you'll die.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: 'Course if you don't stop, you'll probably die, too.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You don't care.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: 'Course we care.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You left me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: When the white walkers came, you left me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Aye, we left you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You're fat and you're slow.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We didn't want to die.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( Sam sobbing )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Help me get him up.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Looks like that piggy is done for.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Help us get him up.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He's slowing us down.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Just get him up!
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why? So the rest of us can die?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We'll move faster without him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What is this? Get up, Tarly.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Is he all right?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Aye, I think so.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If he can't, we may as well just go without him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That's enough.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Tarly, I forbid you to die.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Do you hear me?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why should the rest of us ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Rast... you're responsible for him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What am I supposed to do?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Make sure he gets back alive.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If he doesn't, you don't.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Move on!
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm not dying for you, Piggy.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You hear me?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( branch snaps )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( wolf growling )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Where's Rickon and Hodor?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Looking for food.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( growling )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What's out there?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( growling )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( growling )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Osha: Not another step, boy.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Unless you want to drown in your own blood.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm unarmed.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That was poor planning.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My sister carries the weapons.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm better with them.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Drop the spear.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Drop it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If you kill me, that wolf will tear you to bits.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( growling )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You must be Summer.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( sniffing )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm Jojen Reed.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: This is my sister Meera.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We've come a long way to find you, Brandon.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And we have much farther to go.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Gendry: I'm just trying to understand.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Arya: Would you please shut up about it?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Jaqen H'ghar offered you three kills.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm not listening.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But just explain it to me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He offered to kill any three people you wanted.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Dead. All you had to do was give him the names.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Anyone. You could have picked King Joffrey.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Shut up.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You could have picked Tywin Lannister.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Jaqen got us out of Harrenhal, so why are you complaining?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But you could have ended the war.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Where are we going?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: North.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If we were going north, we should have come to the Red Fork River by now.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Maybe we already passed it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It's 100 feet wide.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: How could we have passed it?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If we hit the Red Fork, we can follow it west to Riverrun.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My mother grew up there.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My grandfather's a lord. He'll protect us.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( man singing )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Could be a minstrel.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Shut up.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ♪ A lion still has claws... ♪
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Hot Pie: A minstrel's got gold sometimes.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We could jump him, tie him up, steal his gold, and buy some food.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Shh.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ♪ And so he spoke, and so he spoke ♪
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ♪ That Lord of Castamere ♪
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text:
♪ But now the rains ♪
♪ Weep o'er his hall ♪
♪ With no one there to hear. ♪
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( gasps )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Singer: What's lurking behind that wall?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A lion?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A wolf?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Archer: Just a dirty little cub, I think.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Singer: Loose a few more shafts.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Don't.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Put the sword down, girl.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You go on down the road.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Just keep on singing so we know where you are.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Leave us be and I won't kill you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( laughing )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Generous.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You're a dangerous person.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I like dangerous people.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why are your friends so shy?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What friends?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The fat one to your left and the lad beside him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Three young ones on the run carrying castle-forged swords.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You escape from Harrenhal?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Arya: Who are you?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Thoros of Myr.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And the fellow here with the bow is Anguy.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No, who do you fight for?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The Brotherhood without Banners.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Now come along.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I want to hear how two boys and a very dangerous girl escaped Harrenhal.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm not going with them. The Brotherhood?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That's who the Mountain and them lot were looking for.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: They'll bring us back and put rats in us.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You've got nothing to fear from us, son.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The lords of Westeros want to burn the countryside.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We're trying to save it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Now come on.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We'll talk some more over brown bread and stew.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And then you can go on your way.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Here's the thing, fat boy.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: When I'm done talking, that arrow's falling down on your fat head.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: So I advise you move, because I'm done talking.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( men laughing )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Half the country's starving and look at this one.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Maybe he's the reason half the country's starving.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My lion.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We've spoken of this.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You cannot come here.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But you said I should come to you with any problems.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Did anyone see you?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You sure?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My father does not make idle threats.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Having you killed would be the high point of his week.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You have to be absolutely certain.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: All right.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What is this problem?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm worried about Sansa.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: When she spoke with Lord Baelish, his friend warned me about him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Baelish doesn't have friends.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I don't know her name.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Oh, Ros? The redhead?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: How do you know her?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I try to know as many people as I can.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You never know which one you'll need.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: She's a whore.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yes, well, we shouldn't be judgmental about these things.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You f*cked her.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Oh, please.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: All right, yes, I f*cked her once.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Twice.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But since I met you, my lady, I've been with no one else.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And was she good? Did you like her?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Not as much as I like you, obviously, or she'd be the one torturing me right now.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What did she say about Littlefinger?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That Sansa shouldn't trust him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Is there an idiot in any village who trusts Littlefinger?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We have to protect her.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We can't.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Now that the Lannisters have discarded her, Sansa will have many suitors.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A great beauty with a very old name.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A great beauty? Oh, a great beauty?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yes, she is, objectively, very.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Her face is quite pleasing ... to other men and to women, people in general.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But not to me, of course.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I only have eyes for you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You pervert. You want her?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: This child?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I don't even want to talk about her.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But you are.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Only because you're making me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( chuckles ) I didn't force you to open your mouth and make words come out.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: This is cruel and unfair. Cruelly unfair.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: "Oh, the cruelty.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Shae is so cruel to me."
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Hmm, yes.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Now do you think I'm cruel?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Only if you stop.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But you mustn't come here again.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Do you hear me?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You've come to a dangerous place full of dangerous people.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Dangerous people.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( moans )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( knocks )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Guard: Lady Tyrell, my king.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Send her in.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You wanted to see me, Your Grace?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm leaving on a hunting trip.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I just wanted to make sure you had everything you need before I left.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That's very thoughtful, Your Grace.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I have everything I could want.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Good. Good.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: How are you finding life in the capital?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It must be quite a change after Renly's camp.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A welcome one.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A military encampment is no place for a lady.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And the bedside of a traitor?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Is that a place for a lady?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Your Grace, I tried to do my duty as a wife, that is all.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What was your duty to this traitor as you saw it?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The duty of any wife to any husband ... to provide him with children.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You failed to do this.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I would not speak ill of the dead, Your Grace.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You think one ought to speak kindly of a traitor merely because he's had a sword put through his heart?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I do beg your pardon.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The subtleties of politics are often lost on me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Renly...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I don't believe he was interested
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: in the company of women.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What makes you say this?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Whenever I wanted to make a child with him, he ... he had so many excuses, so many late-night war councils.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He never wanted to try.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Except one evening, after he'd had far too much wine to drink, he suggested something ... something that sounded very painful and couldn't possibly result in children.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Maybe the fault was with me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No, he was a known... degenerate.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It's such a relief to hear you say so, Your Grace.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Mmm.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I've considered making his perversion punishable by death.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: As is your right.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You must do whatever you need to do.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You are the king.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yes.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I am.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Do you like it?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I just had it made.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Probably one of the finest weapons in the Seven Kingdoms.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It's beautiful.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Will you show me how it works?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It's a new design.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Much easier to load. There's no crank.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You use this lever to draw the string.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The bolt goes here.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: And then you just aim... and...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( laughs )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Would you take me hunting sometime?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Forgive me, Your Grace.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I know a hunt is no place for a woman.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It's not unheard of.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My father would never let me before ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You no longer belong to him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Do you want to hold it?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: May I? Please.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I imagine it must be so exciting to squeeze your finger here and watch something die over there.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Could you do it?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Could you... kill something?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I don't know, Your Grace. Do you think I could?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yes.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Would you like to watch me?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yes.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( screams ) Stop! Stop!
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Tell us the truth.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: About what?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( screams ) I don't know what you want.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I want the truth.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What truth?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why'd you take Winterfell?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I took it to ... I took it ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Who gave the orders?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No one.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I took it on my own.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: To take the North while it was vulnerable.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What were you going to do once you took it?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Hold it. Rule it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Good. That's very good.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( screams )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why did you do that? I told you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why did you take Winterfell?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I took it to bring glory to my house and my father.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Wait. Wait, wait, wait.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I took it because I hated the Starks.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I hated them for holding me prisoner.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I wanted to hurt them.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What are you doing?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Please.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( screaming )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'll tell you anything.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Just take it off.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Please. Please, just take it off.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( door closes )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Your sister sent me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yara?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( whimpers )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'll come for you tonight when the castle sleeps.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No, don't go. Please, please.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No, please don't leave me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Please, please.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Please, please don't go!
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( sobbing ) Please. Please. Don't leave me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Please don't go.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Rickon, stay with us.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It's all right. The wolves will protect him.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You can get inside his head, see through his eyes.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Only when I'm asleep.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That's how it begins until you learn to control it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You're a warg.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It's not just wolves.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Sometimes in my dreams there's a ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A three-eyed raven?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You've seen it?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We saw him together. You haven't forgotten?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Does it have anything to do with warging?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: No, the raven is something different, something deeper.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The raven brings the sight.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Seeing things that haven't happened yet?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Or things that happened long before you were born or things that are happening right now thousands of miles away.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What's he telling him?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Why don't you ask?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Isn't he ashamed, your brother, needing you to protect him?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Where's the shame in that?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Any boy his age who needs his sister to protect him is gonna find himself needing lots of protecting.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Some people will always need help.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That doesn't mean they're not worth helping.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: When my father died, I dreamt it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You didn't dream it. You saw it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: So did I.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You have the sight, too?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: When I told my father about your father... for the first time in my life, I saw him cry.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Your father is Howland Reed?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yeah.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He saved my father's life during the rebellion.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Your father told you about the rebellion?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Mine never did.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But I saw that, too.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What else have you seen?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Only one thing that matters ... you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( men laughing )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Thoros: I never liked the skinny ones.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Like drinking from a puddle.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Not that I'm averse to drinking from a puddle every now and again, you understand.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I don't drink ale.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: There's no story so good a drink won't make it better.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Yeah!
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You see?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: They've all suffered through my bouts of sobriety.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It's very tedious for all concerned.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Now, how did three children ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: We're not children.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: How did three young persons such as yourselves, untrained in the art of war, escape from Harrenhal?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Gendry's a smith.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He was apprenticed in the armory.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A smith, eh? Where'd you train?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: King's Landing. Tobho Mott's shop.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That criminal. He charges twice as much as every other armorer in the city.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That's because he's twice as good.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Aha! A smith and a salesman.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Gendry stole us weapons.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Ah, fought your way out of Harrenhal, I see.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: He knows how to use a sword and so do I.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( men laugh )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: My brothers taught me.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( men laugh )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Men: Ooh!
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( men cheer )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: To your brothers!
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( cheering )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You can finish your meals before you go.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It may be awhile before you see another.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You'll free us?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I gave you my word.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But before you go, allow me to raise a cup to your ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Hey, hey.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( men cheering )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Now that is an uncommonly large person.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: How does one manage to subdue such an uncommonly large person?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: One waits for him to drink until he passes out.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Poor man. You have my sympathy.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Aha, not a man at all.

text: A Hound!
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: So good to see you again, Clegane.

text: Thoros?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The f*ck you doing here?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Drinking and talking too much.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Same as ever.

name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A pretty prize, lads.

text: Men: Yeah!

text: Girl.

text: What in seven hells are you doing with the Stark bitch?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Silence, Kingslayer.

name: Dark Wings Dark Words

name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Which will she choose?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Gambler at heart.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Wouldn't have guessed.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Be quick about it.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I need to rest.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Get up.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I have these, you know, on your feet when you walk too far.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: What do you call them?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Get up now.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Corns. I never used to get corns.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Of course I used to ride everywhere, not march around like a common foot soldier wearing the same sh1t boots for over a year.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: This heel is ruined. There's no way ...
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( grunts )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( chuckles )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I never understood why some knights felt the need to carry two swords.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( sighs )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Ooh.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You move well... for a great beast of a woman.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You shouldn't grimace before you lunge.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: It gives away the game.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Bit of a quandary for you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If you kill me, you fail Lady Stark.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: But if you don't kill me,
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'm going to kill you.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You're good.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Graceless, but good.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: See? If you were willing to hurt me, you might have had me there.

text: ( grunting )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( grunts )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: ( panting )
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Looks like your woman's getting the better of you, if you can call that a woman.

text: We enjoy a good fight.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Gets our juices flowing.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: The Flayed Man of House Bolton.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: A bit gruesome for my taste.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: You sure he's the one?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: That's him, all right.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I saw him fight at the tourney for Ser Willem Frey's wedding.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Give the man his silver.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Let us go and my father will pay you whatever you want.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: Enough to buy me a new head?
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: If the King in the North hears I had the Kingslayer and let him go, he'll be taking it right off.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: I'd rather he takes yours.
name: Dark Wings Dark Words

text: This march is a distraction.

text: My grandfather's funeral is not a distraction.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Are we riding to battle at Riverrun?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: No.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Then it's a distraction.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: They're growing fast.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Not fast enough.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I need an army.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: We'll be in Astapor by nightfall.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Some say the Unsullied are the greatest soldiers in the world.
name: Walk of Punishment

name: Walk of Punishment

text: - Who are you?

text: Thoros of Myr.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: The Brotherhood without Banners.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: The lords of Westeros want to burn the countryside.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: We're trying to save it.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Your sister sent me.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Yara?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I'll come for you tonight when the castle sleeps.

text: I have been searching for you, Daenerys Stormborn, to ask your forgiveness.

text: I am Barristan Selmy, Kingsguard to your father.

text: I will not fail you again.

name: Walk of Punishment

name: Walk of Punishment

name: Walk of Punishment

text: Let us go and my father will pay you whatever you want.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Enough to buy me a new head?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: If I may, nephew, I encountered a situation with one of my lieutenants at the Stone Mill which may have some bearing ...
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Why don't you shut your mouth about that damned mill?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: And don't call him "nephew." He is your king.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Robb knows I meant him no disr ...
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You're lucky I'm not your king.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I wouldn't let you wave your blunders around like a victory flag.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: My blunder sent Tywin's mad dog scurrying back to Casterly Rock with his tail between his legs.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I think King Robb understands we're not gonna win this war if he's the only one winning any battles.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: No, there's glory enough to go around.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: It's not about glory.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Your instructions were to wait for him to come to you.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I seized an opportunity.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: What value was the mill?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: The Mountain was garrisoned across the river from it.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Is he there now?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Of course not. We took the fight to him.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: He could not withstand us.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I wanted to draw the Mountain into the west, into our country where we could surround him and kill him.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I wanted him to chase us, which he would have done because he is a mad dog without a strategic thought in his head.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I could have that head on a spike by now.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Instead, I have a mill.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: We took hostages.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Willem Lannister. Martyn Lannister.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Willem and Martyn Lannister are 14 years old.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Martyn is 15, I believe.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Tywin Lannister has my sisters.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Have I sued for peace?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: No.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Do you think he'll sue for peace because we have his father's brother's great-grandsons?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: No.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: How many men did you lose?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: But for every man we lost, the Lannisters ...
name: Walk of Punishment

text: We need our men more than Tywin needs his!
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I'm sorry.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I didn't know.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You would have.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Right here today at this gathering if you had been patient.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: We seem to be running short of patience here.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You know who isn't?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Tywin Lannister.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Intimate. Lovely table.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Better chairs than the old small council chamber.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Conveniently close to your own quarters. I like it.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: What news of Jaime?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: 20,000 unwashed Northerners have known about his escape for weeks.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Collectively, you control more spies and informants than the rest of the world combined.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Do you mean to tell me that none of you has any notion of where he is?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: We are trying, my lord.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Try harder.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: What do we have, then?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Robb Stark and most of his bannermen are in Riverrun for the funeral of his grandfather Lord Hoster Tully.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: In Stark's absence, Roose Bolton holds Harrenhal, which would seem to make him Lord of Harrenhal, in practice if not in name.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Well, let him have it.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: The name suits our purposes far more than that useless pile of rubble.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: The Lord of Harrenhal will make a worthy suitor for the widow Arryn.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: For which I am extremely grateful to you, my lord.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Lady Arryn and I have known each other since we were children.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: She has always been... positively predisposed toward me.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: A successful courtship would make Lord Baelish acting Lord of the Vale.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Titles do seem to breed titles.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You'll leave for the Eyrie as soon as possible and bring Lysa Arryn into the fold.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Then the young wolf can add his own aunt to the list of people who have taken up arms against him.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Far be it from me to hinder true love, but Lord Baelish's absence
name: Walk of Punishment

text: would present certain problems.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: The royal wedding may end up being the most expensive event in living memory.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Summer has ended, hard days lie ahead.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Not a good time to leave the crown's finances unattended.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Fully agreed.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Which is why I'm naming you new Master of Coin.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Master of Coin?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: It would appear to be a position that best suits your talents.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I'm quite good at spending money, but a lifetime of outrageous wealth hasn't taught me much about managing it.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I have no doubt you will prove equal to this challenge.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Hear, hear.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: ♪ He lifted her high in the air ♪
name: Walk of Punishment

text:
♪ He sniffed and roared and smelled her there ♪
♪ She kicked and wailed, a maid so fair ♪
♪ But he licked the honey from her hair ♪
♪ From there to here, from here to there ♪
♪ All black and brown and covered with hair ♪
♪ He smelled that girl in the summer air ♪
♪ The bear, the bear and the maiden fair... ♪
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I hope you're pleased.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: If you had armed me, they never would have taken us.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You were armed when we were taken.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I was in chains if you recall.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Our little match would have ended quite quick if my hands weren't bound.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: All my life I've been hearing, "Jaime Lannister, what a brilliant swordsman."
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You were slower than I expected.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: And more predictable.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I've been sitting in a muddy pen wrapped in chains for the past year.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: And I'm a woman. I was still beating you.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You were not beating me.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Maybe you were as good as people said... once.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Or maybe people just love to overpraise a famous name.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: When we make camp tonight, you'll be raped.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: More than once.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: None of these fellows have ever been with a noblewoman.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You'd be wise not to resist.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Would I?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: They'll knock your teeth out.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: You think I care about my teeth?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: No, I don't think you care about your teeth.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: If you fight them, they will kill you.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Do you understand?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: I'm the prisoner of value, not you.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Let them have what they want. What does it matter?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: What does it matter?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Close your eyes.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Pretend they're Renly.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: If you were a woman, you wouldn't resist?
name: Walk of Punishment

name: Walk of Punishment

text: Forgive a debt, my father?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: For a man of the world, you're strangely naive.

text: I've never borrowed money before.

text: I'm not clear on the rules.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Well...
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Ahem!
name: Walk of Punishment

text: The basic principle is I lend you money, and after an agreed upon period of time, you return it with interest.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: And what if I don't?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Well, you have to.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: But what if I don't?
name: Walk of Punishment

text: This is why I don't lend you money.

text: Anyway, it's not my father I'm worried about.

text: It's the Iron Bank of Braavos.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: We owe them tens of millions.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: If we fail to repay these loans, the bank will fund our enemies.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: One way or another, they always get their gold back.
name: Walk of Punishment

text: Ah, the return of the conquering hero.

text: I trust you got your money's worth.

text: This is more than I give you in a year.

text: Oh, then it's much more than I give you in a year.

name: Walk of Punishment

text: As a boy, I travelled with a troupe of actors through the Free Cities.
name: And Now His Watch is Ended

text: One day in Myr, a certain man made my master an offer too tempting to refuse.
name: And Now His Watch is Ended

text: I feared the man meant to use me as I'd heard some men used small boys.
name: And Now His Watch is Ended

text: But what he wanted was far worse.
name: And Now His Watch is Ended

text: He gave me a potion that made me powerless to move or speak, yet did nothing to dull my senses.
name: And Now His Watch is Ended

text: With a hooked blade he sliced me, root and stem, chanting all the while.
name: And Now His Watch is Ended

text: He burned my parts in a brazier.
name: And Now His Watch is Ended

text: The flames turned blue and I heard a voice answer his call.
name: And Now His Watch is Ended

name: Kissed by Fire

text: Of course, Your Grace.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I have reason to believe that House Tyrell do not hold the crown's best interests at heart.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I see. And have you shared these suspicions with Lord Tywin?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: My father's a practical man. He appreciates facts.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Myself, I often find them a hindrance.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And he appreciates those who aid his family, as you well know.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He's almost as generous to those who help us as he is unpleasant towards those who don't.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You have a good working relationship with the Tyrells.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I thought you might look into it before you leave the capital.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I shall do my best.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Thank you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And your best will prove better than when I asked you to locate Arya Stark?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I assure you that it will.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Gods, boy, that's enough. We're not in a tavern.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Pardon, my lady.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: No need to speak.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Are there any figs? Fetch some.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I always take figs midafternoon.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They help move the bowels.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: To what do I owe this summons?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Thank you for seeing me, my lady.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I had hoped we might discuss a few financial matters.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I climbed all those steps to discuss financial matters?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It's the royal wedding.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm told you had a hand in planning it.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Naturally.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It's shaping up to be a very involved affair.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The word extravagant has been used.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: What good is the word extravagant if it can't be used to describe a royal wedding?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I understand that.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Good.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: But, as Master of Coin, it falls upon me to calculate the cost for the crown.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: As of now, it's a huge expense.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And we're at war, Lady Olenna.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Oh, I'd nearly forgotten.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Yes, and maintaining supply lines ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I can't think how it slipped my mind.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: What is it, 12,000 infantrymen the Tyrell family has supplied?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: 1,800 mounted lances.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: 2,000 in support.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Provisions so this city might survive the winter.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: A million bushels of wheat.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Half a million bushels each of barley, oats, and rye.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: 20,000 head of cattle.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: 50,000 sheep.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You don't have to lecture me about wartime expenses.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm quite familiar with them.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And we are so grateful for your contributions which are necessary for the preservation of the realm.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: As is a royal wedding.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The people are hungry for more than just food.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They crave distractions.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And if we don't provide them, they'll create their own.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And their distractions are likely to end with us being torn to pieces.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: A royal wedding is much safer.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Wouldn't you say?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I would.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And traditionally paid for by the royal family.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I was told you were drunk, impertinent, and thoroughly debauched.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You can imagine my disappointment at finding nothing but a browbeaten bookkeeper.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Where did you go for them, Volantis?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: My lady ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Oh, very well.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I won't have it said that House Tyrell refuses to play its part.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: We'll pay for half the expenses and the celebrations will go on as planned.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Is that sufficient?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Quite sufficient. Thank you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Very good, then. That's settled. Good day.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Give me that.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: What are you doing?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Just mending Lord Beric's armor.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Why?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm going to stay on and smith for the Brotherhood.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Have you lost your mind?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: When the Lannisters find this place, you think they'll spare the smiths?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They'll cave your head in with your own helmet.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Lannisters wanted to kill me long before I joined the Brotherhood.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You don't have to do this.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I want to.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They need good men.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Robb needs good men, too. We're leaving tomorrow.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And then you ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: What? Serve him?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I've served men my entire life.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I served Master Mott at King's Landing and he sold me to the Watch.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I served Lord Tywin at Harrenhal, wondering every day if I'd get tortured or killed.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm done serving.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You just said you were serving Lord Beric.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He may be their leader, but they chose him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: These men are brothers. They're a family.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I've never had a family.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I can be your family.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You wouldn't be my family.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You'd be "my lady."
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Willem.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Willem!
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Is this a rescue?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Lannister filth! Take him!
name: Kissed by Fire

name: Kissed by Fire

text: Please, I didn't do anything. I'm just a squire.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Please ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Bring them in.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Is that all of them?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It took five of you to murder two unarmed squires?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Not murder, Your Grace.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Vengeance.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Vengeance?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Those boys didn't kill your sons.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I saw Harrion die on the battlefield and Torrhen ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Was strangled by the Kingslayer.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They were his kin.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They were boys!
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Look at them.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Tell your mother to look at them.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: She killed them as much as I.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: My mother had nothing to do with this.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: This was your treason.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It's treason to free your enemies.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: In war, you kill your enemies.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Did your father not teach you that, boy?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Leave him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Aye.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Leave me to the king.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He wants to give me a scolding before he sets me free.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: That's how he deals with treason.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Our King in the North.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Or should I call him the King Who Lost the North?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Escort Lord Karstark to the dungeon.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Hang the rest.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Mercy, sire! I didn't kill anyone.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I only watched for the guards.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: This one was only the watcher.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Hang him last so he can watch the others die.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Please! Please, no. They made me do it!
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They made me! They made me!
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Word of this can't leave Riverrun.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They were Tywin Lannister's nephews.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Lannisters pay their debts.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They never stop talking about it.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Would you make me a liar as well as a murderer?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It wouldn't be lying.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: We will bury them and remain silent until the war is done.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm not fighting for justice if I don't serve justice to murderers in my ranks,
name: Kissed by Fire

text: no matter how highborn.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He has to die.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Karstarks are Northmen.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: They won't forgive the killing of their lord.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Your mother's right.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: If you do this, the Karstarks will abandon you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You tended to their wounds.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You brought them supper. Now they're dead.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And more boys will keep dying until this war is over.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You need Karstark men to end it.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Spare his life. Keep him as a hostage.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: A hostage.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Tell the Karstarks that as long as they remain loyal, he will not be harmed.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The blood of the First Men flows through my veins as much as yours, boy.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I fought the Mad King for your father.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I fought Joffrey for you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: We are kin ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Stark and Karstark.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: That didn't stop you from betraying me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And it won't save you now.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I don't want it to save me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I want it to haunt you to the end of your days.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Kneel, my lord.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Rickard Karstark,
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Lord of Karhold, here in sight of gods and men, I sentence you to die.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Would you speak a final word?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Kill me and be cursed.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You are no king of mine.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Joffrey.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Cersei.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Ilyn Payne.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Ser Meryn.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Hound.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: What are you going to do with me?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: At first light we'll ride for Riverrun.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Your brother's there now.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He'll make a contribution to our cause and you can go home.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm a hostage and you're selling me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Don't think of it that way.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: But it is that way.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It is.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And it isn't.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: More is than isn't.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Beric admired your father a great deal, you know.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He wanted to refuse your ransom altogether.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: So why don't you?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: We need the gold.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Do I frighten you, child?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: No.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You're angry with me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And I don't blame you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: But letting him go was the right thing.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I have more reason than most to want him hanged.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I thought he killed you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He did.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: But how...?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Thoros... how many times have you brought me back?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It's the Lord of Light brings you back.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm just the lucky drunk who says the words.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: How many times?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Five, I think.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: No, this makes six.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Six.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: There was the first time ... the Mountain.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Show her.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Lance right through the chest.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Then I was stabbed in the belly.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Then it was an arrow in the back.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And that axe in the side.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Then the Lannisters caught me and executed me for treason.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Was it a hanging or a dagger in the eye?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Both. Fuckers couldn't decide.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And the Hound makes six.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Second time I've been killed by a Clegane.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You'd think you'd learn.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It's not getting any easier, you know.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I know.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Every time I come back, I'm a bit less.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Pieces of you get chipped away.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Could you bring back a man without a head?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Not six times. Just once.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I don't think it works that way, child.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He was a good man, Ned Stark.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He's at rest now, somewhere.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I would never wish my life upon him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I would.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You're alive.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Lord, cast your light upon me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Protect me in the darkness.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Burn away my sins.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Help me serve you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Use me as you will.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: For the night is dark and full of terrors.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I have prayed day and night for you to come to me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: My lady.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I meant to come sooner.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The battle ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I know of your troubles, my king.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Lady Melisandre has told me everything.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Yes, of course.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You mustn't despair. Your claim is true.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You will be victorious.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I believed that once.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You are the one god's champion and the finest man I've ever known.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Selyse.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I've broken a sacred vow.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I've sinned.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: No.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I've wronged you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I have shamed you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You're doing god's work.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You don't understand.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Red Woman ... the Lady Melisandre ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I know, Stannis.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Lady Melisandre has told me everything.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: No act done in service of the Lord of Light can ever be a sin.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: When she told me, I wept with joy.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Oh, my sweet boys.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Petyr, Tommard, Edric.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I thank god every day for bringing Melisandre to us.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: She gave you a son.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I gave you... nothing.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: That's not true.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: So you've come to see her as well?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: There is no need.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You must keep away from such distractions.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: She's my daughter.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I want to see her.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You are a king.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You don't need my permission.
name: Kissed by Fire

name: Kissed by Fire

♪ The birds have scales ♪

name: Kissed by Fire

text: Shireen.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Father!
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You've grown since I last saw you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Mother said you fought in a battle.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Did you win?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: No.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Did the Onion Knight come back with you?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He did.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He fought bravely.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He hasn't come to visit me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He said he'd bring me back a present from the capital.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He won't be visiting, child.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Why not? He's my friend.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Look.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He made this for me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: But don't tell Mother I have it.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: It's a secret.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Mother doesn't like the Onion Knight.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Ser Davos is a traitor.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He's rotting in a dungeon cell for his crime.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Best forget him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Not so hard. You'll scrub the skin off.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: What are you doing here?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I need a bath.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Help me out of these rags.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Now get out.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: There's another tub.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: This one suits me fine.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Don't worry. I'm not interested.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: If I faint, pull me out.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I don't intend to be the first Lannister to die in a bathtub.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Why should I care how you die?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You swore a solemn vow, remember?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You're supposed to get me to King's Landing in one piece.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Not going so well, is it?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: No wonder Renly died with you guarding him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: That was unworthy. Forgive me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You protected me better than most ...
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Don't you mock me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm apologizing.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I'm sick of fighting.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Let's call a truce.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You need trust to have a truce.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I trust you.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: There it is. There's the look.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I've seen it for 17 years on face after face.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You all despise me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Kingslayer.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Oathbreaker.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: A man without honor.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You've heard of wildfire?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Of course.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Mad King was obsessed with it.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He loved to watch people burn, the way their skin blackened and blistered
name: Kissed by Fire

text: and melted off their bones.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He burned lords he didn't like.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He burned Hands who disobeyed him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He burned anyone who was against him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Before long, half the country was against him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Aerys saw traitors everywhere.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: So he had his pyromancer place caches of wildfire all over the city ...  beneath the Sept of Baelor and the slums of Flea Bottom.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Under houses, stables, taverns.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Even beneath the Red Keep itself.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Finally, the day of reckoning came.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Robert Baratheon marched on the capital after his victory at the Trident.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: But my father arrived first with the whole Lannister army at his back, promising to defend the city against the rebels.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I knew my father better than that.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He's never been one to pick the losing side.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I told the Mad King as much.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I urged him to surrender peacefully.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: But the king didn't listen to me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He didn't listen to Varys who tried to warn him.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: But he did listen to Grand Maester Pycelle, that grey, sunken c**t.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: "You can trust the Lannisters," he said.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: "The Lannisters have always been true friends of the crown."
name: Kissed by Fire

text: So we opened the gates and my father sacked the city.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Once again, I came to the king, begging him to surrender.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He told me to... bring him my father's head.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Then he... turned to his pyromancer.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: "Burn them all," he said.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: "Burn them in their homes.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Burn them in their beds."
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Tell me, if your precious Renly commanded you to kill your own father and stand by while thousands of men, women, and children burned alive, would you have done it?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Would you have kept your oath then?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: First, I killed the pyromancer.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: And then when the king turned to flee, I drove my sword into his back.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: "Burn them all," he kept saying.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: "Burn them all."
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I don't think he expected to die.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He ... he meant to... burn with the rest of us and rise again, reborn as a dragon to turn his enemies to ash.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: I slit his throat to make sure that didn't happen.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: That's where Ned Stark found me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: If this is true... why didn't you tell anyone?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Why didn't you tell Lord Stark?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Stark?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: You think the honorable Ned Stark wanted to hear my side?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: He judged me guilty the moment he set eyes on me.
name: Kissed by Fire

text: By what right does the wolf judge the lion?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: By what right?
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Help! Help!
name: Kissed by Fire

text: The Kingslayer!
name: Kissed by Fire

text: Jaime.
