text: Oh, I'm not a lady.
name: Two Swords

text: A term of courtesy in this establishment.
name: Two Swords

text: A lie anywhere.
name: Two Swords

text: Why not use the right words?
name: Two Swords

text: I'm a b*st*rd.
name: Two Swords

text: She is a whore.
name: Two Swords

text: And you're what?
name: Two Swords

text: A procurer.
name: Two Swords

text: Any of the others?
name: Two Swords

text: The two girls can leave.
name: Two Swords

text: ( snaps fingers )
name: Two Swords

text: You stay.
name: Two Swords

text: I'm afraid I'm not an offer, my lord.
name: Two Swords

text: Everyone who works for Littlefinger is an offer.
name: Two Swords

text: Take off your clothes.
name: Two Swords

text: We'll be here a while.
name: Two Swords

text: My lord.
name: Two Swords

text: I am a prince, boy.
name: Two Swords

text: Have you ever been with a prince?
name: Two Swords

text: Can't say I have.
name: Two Swords

text: I'm wildly expensive.
name: Two Swords

text: Take off your clothes.
name: Two Swords

text: Which way do you like it?
name: Two Swords

text: ( gasps )
name: Two Swords

text: My way.
name: Two Swords

text: Man: ♪ And so he spokeand so he spoke ♪
name: Two Swords

text: ♪ That Lord of Castamere ♪
name: Two Swords

text: ♪ And now the rains... ♪
name: Two Swords

text: Oberyn.
name: Two Swords

text: ♪ Weep o'er his hall... ♪
name: Two Swords

text: Oberyn, don't.
name: Two Swords

text: ♪ With no one there to hear ♪
name: Two Swords

text:
♪ Yes, not the rains weep o'er his hall ♪
♪ And not a soul to hear. ♪
name: Two Swords

text: You lost, friend?
name: Two Swords

text: Forgive me for staring.
name: Two Swords

text: I don't see many Lannisters where I'm from.
name: Two Swords

text: I don't see many Dornishmen in the capital.
name: Two Swords

text: We don't like the smell.
name: Two Swords

text: ( laughs )
name: Two Swords

text: Come with me, lover.
name: Two Swords

text: Gods, look at this one.
name: Two Swords

text: Sirs, if you follow me, I'll arrange for a private room.
name: Two Swords

text: Why are you wasting a woman like this on a Dornishman?
name: Two Swords

text: Bring him a shaved goat and a bottle of olive oil.
name: Two Swords

text: ( laughs )
name: Two Swords

text: Do you know why all the world hates a Lannister?
name: Two Swords

text: You think your gold and your lions and your gold lions make you better than everyone.
name: Two Swords

text: May I tell you a secret?
name: Two Swords

text: You're not a golden lion.
name: Two Swords

text: You're just a pink little man who is far too slow on the draw.
name: Two Swords

text: ( screams )
name: Two Swords

text: Longsword is a bad option in close quarters.
name: Two Swords

text: When I pull my blade, your friend starts bleeding.
name: Two Swords

text: Quite a lot, I'm afraid. So many veins in the wrist.
name: Two Swords

text: ( groans )
name: Two Swords

text: He'll live if you get him help straightaway.
name: Two Swords

text: So, decisions.
name: Two Swords

text: Prince Oberyn, forgive the intrusion.
name: Two Swords

text: We heard there might be...
name: Two Swords

text: ( screams )
name: Two Swords

text: ...trouble.
name: Two Swords

text: Apologies, my love.
name: Two Swords

text: I'm here to welcome you to the capital.
name: Two Swords

text: Ellaria Sand, my paramour.
name: Two Swords

text: The king's own Uncle Imp.
name: Two Swords

text: Tyrion, son of Tywin Lannister.
name: Two Swords

text: If there's anything I can do to make your stay--
name: Two Swords

text: What are you?
name: Two Swords

text: His hired killer?
name: Two Swords

text: It started that way, aye.
name: Two Swords

text: Now I'm a knight.
name: Two Swords

text: How did that come to pass?
name: Two Swords

text: Killed the right people, I suppose.
name: Two Swords

text: ( laughs )
name: Two Swords

text: We'll need a few more girls.
name: Two Swords

text: Girls, yes?
name: Two Swords

text: You don't partake?
name: Two Swords

text: Oh, I partook.
name: Two Swords

text: Now I'm married.
name: Two Swords

text: Prince Oberyn, if I may, a word in private?
name: Two Swords

text: Seems I visited the Lannister brothel by mistake.
name: Two Swords

text: Oh, they take all kinds.
name: Two Swords

text: Even Dornishmen.
name: Two Swords

text: The king is very grateful that you traveled all this way for his wedding.
name: Two Swords

text: Let us speak truth here. Joffrey is insulted.
name: Two Swords

text: I am only the second son after all.
name: Two Swords

text: Well, speaking as a fellow second son, I have grown rather used to being the family insult.
name: Two Swords

text: ( chuckles )
name: Two Swords

text: Why did you come to King's Landing, Prince Oberyn?
name: Two Swords

text: I was invited to the royal wedding.
name: Two Swords

text: I thought we were speaking truth.
name: Two Swords

text: The last time I was in the capital was many years ago.
name: Two Swords

text: Another wedding.
name: Two Swords

text: My sister Elia and Rhaegar Targaryen, the Last Dragon.
name: Two Swords

text: My sister loved him.
name: Two Swords

text: She bore his children.
name: Two Swords

text: Swaddled them, rocked them, fed them at her own breast.
name: Two Swords

text: Elia wouldn't let the wet nurse touch them.
name: Two Swords

text: And beautiful, noble Rhaegar Targaryen left her for another woman.
name: Two Swords

text: That started a war and the war ended right here when your father's army took the city...
name: Two Swords

text: I wasn't actually present.
name: Two Swords

text: ...and butchered those children.
name: Two Swords

text: My nephew and niece.
name: Two Swords

text: Carved them up and wrapped them in Lannister cloaks.
name: Two Swords

text: And my sister, you know what they did to her?
name: Two Swords

text: I'm asking you a question.
name: Two Swords

text: I've heard rumors.
name: Two Swords

text: ( chuckles ) So have I.
name: Two Swords

text: The one I keep hearing is that Gregor Clegane the Mountain raped Elia and split her in half with his great sword.
name: Two Swords

text: I wasn't there.
name: Two Swords

text: I don't know what happened.
name: Two Swords

text: If the Mountain killed my sister, your father gave the order.
name: Two Swords

text: Tell your father I'm here.
name: Two Swords

text: And tell him the Lannisters aren't the only ones who pay their debts.
name: Two Swords

text: ( dragons screeching )
name: Two Swords

text: ( growls )
name: Two Swords

text: ( screeching )
name: Two Swords

text: ( growls )
name: Two Swords

text: ( chuckles )
name: Two Swords

text: ( screeches )
name: Two Swords

text: Shh.
name: Two Swords

text: ( screeching )
name: Two Swords

text: ( gasps )
name: Two Swords

text: Shh. Shh.
name: Two Swords

text: ( roars )
name: Two Swords

text: ( gasps )
name: Two Swords

text: ( roars )
name: Two Swords

text: They're dragons, Khaleesi.
name: Two Swords

text: They can never be tamed.
name: Two Swords

text: Not even by their mother.
name: Two Swords

text: Ser Barristan.
name: Two Swords

text: Your Grace.
name: Two Swords

text: Where's Daario Naharis?
name: Two Swords

text: Where's Grey Worm?
name: Two Swords

text: Gambling, Your Grace.
name: Two Swords

text: Gambling?
name: Two Swords

text: Crowd: Mhysa. Mhysa. Mhysa...
name: Two Swords

text: How long have they been at it?
name: Two Swords

text: Since midnight, Your Grace.
name: Two Swords

text: Ser Worm is stronger than he looks.
name: Two Swords

text: But I can see his arms beginning to shake.
name: Two Swords

text: What's the prize to winning this stupid contest?
name: Two Swords

text: The honor of riding by your side on the road to Meereen.
name: Two Swords

text: That honor goes to Ser Jorah and Ser Barristan as neither of them kept me waiting this morning.
name: Two Swords

text: You two will ride in the rear guard and protect the livestock.
name: Two Swords

text: The last man holding his sword can find a new queen to fight for.
name: Two Swords

text: ( Daario groans )
name: Two Swords

text: You need to eat something.
name: Two Swords

text: Pigeon pie.
name: Two Swords

text: No, thank you.
name: Two Swords

text: Lemon cakes?
name: Two Swords

text: No, thank you.
name: Two Swords

text: You love lemon cakes.
name: Two Swords

text: Tell her she needs to eat.
name: Two Swords

text: My lady, you do need to eat.
name: Two Swords

text: I don't need to eat.
name: Two Swords

text: If I could have a moment alone with my wife.
name: Two Swords

text: She needs to eat.
name: Two Swords

text: I can't let you starve.
name: Two Swords

text: I swore to protect you.
name: Two Swords

text: My lady, I am your husband.
name: Two Swords

text: Let me help you.
name: Two Swords

text: How can you help me?
name: Two Swords

text: I don't know, but I can try.
name: Two Swords

text: I lie awake all night staring at the canopy thinking about how they died.
name: Two Swords

text: I could get you essence of nightshade to help you sleep.
name: Two Swords

text: Do you know what they did to my brother?
name: Two Swords

text: How they sewed his direwolf's head onto his body?
name: Two Swords

text: And my mother.
name: Two Swords

text: They say they cut her throat to the bone and threw her body in the river.
name: Two Swords

text: What happened to your familywas a terrible crime.
name: Two Swords

text: I didn't know your brother.
name: Two Swords

text: He seemed like a good man, but I didn't know him.
name: Two Swords

text: Your mother, on the other hand,I admired her.
name: Two Swords

text: She wanted to have me executed, but I admired her.
name: Two Swords

text: She was a strong woman.
name: Two Swords

text: And she was fierce when it came to protecting her children.
name: Two Swords

text: Sansa.
name: Two Swords

text: Your mother would want you to carry on.
name: Two Swords

text: You know it's true.
name: Two Swords

text: Will you pardon me, my lord?
name: Two Swords

text: I'd like to visit the godswood.
name: Two Swords

text: Of course. Of course. Prayer can be helpful, I hear.
name: Two Swords

text: I don't pray anymore.
name: Two Swords

text: It's the only place I can go where people don't talk to me.
name: Two Swords

text: My lion.
name: Two Swords

text: What are you doing?
name: Two Swords

text: What does it look like I'm doing? Come here.
name: Two Swords

text: How many times have I told you?
name: Two Swords

text: You can't visit me here.
name: Two Swords

text: I know.
name: Two Swords

text: I know.
name: Two Swords

text: We have come to a dangerous place.
name: Two Swords

text: Have you forgotten me?
name: Two Swords

text: Do you know how long it's been?
name: Two Swords

text: Of course I haven't forgotten.
name: Two Swords

text: I want you.
name: Two Swords

text: Don't you want me?
name: Two Swords

text: Things are a bit tense right now.
name: Two Swords

text: What things?
name: Two Swords

text: My nephew the king wants to murder me.
name: Two Swords

text: My wife hates me because my father murdered her family.
name: Two Swords

text: Oberyn Martell wants to murder everyone whose last name is Lannister.
name: Two Swords

text: You need to relax.
name: Two Swords

text: Don't you want to relax?
name: Two Swords

text: What's wrong?
name: Two Swords

text: I told you.
name: Two Swords

text: It's not a good time.
name: Two Swords

text: It's never a good time.
name: Two Swords

text: You have your child bride now.
name: Two Swords

text: Shae.
name: Two Swords

text: Do you love her?
name: Two Swords

text: Love her?
name: Two Swords

text: I barely know her.
name: Two Swords

text: She's a child.
name: Two Swords

text: She despises me.
name: Two Swords

text: That's not an answer.
name: Two Swords

text: Of course I don't love her.
name: Two Swords

text: You tried to ship me away.
name: Two Swords

text: Ship you away?
name: Two Swords

text: Give me diamonds and make me disappear.
name: Two Swords

text: What in the world are you talking about?
name: Two Swords

text: If you want me to leave, just say it.
name: Two Swords

text: Say it!
name: Two Swords

text: Shh.
name: Two Swords

text: I don't know what you're talking about.
name: Two Swords

text: You want me to stay?
name: Two Swords

text: ( groans )
name: Two Swords

text: A work of art, really.
name: Two Swords

text: The craftsmanship is excellent.
name: Two Swords

text: You like it so much, you're welcome to chop off your own hand and take it.
name: Two Swords

text: Such an ingrate.
name: Two Swords

text: I spent days with the goldsmith
name: Two Swords

text: getting the details just right.
name: Two Swords

text: Days?
name: Two Swords

text: Better part of an afternoon.
name: Two Swords

text: There, how does that feel?
name: Two Swords

text: Uh...
name: Two Swords

text: a hook would be more practical.
name: Two Swords

text: Elegant, I think.
name: Two Swords

text: Thank you for your help with the other matter.
name: Two Swords

text: The symptoms have abated?
name: Two Swords

text: Gone completely.
name: Two Swords

text: I am in your debt, Maester Qyburn.
name: Two Swords

text: Not a maester, Your Grace, but happy to help whenever I can.
name: Two Swords

text: Odd little man.
name: Two Swords

text: I've grown rather fond of him.
name: Two Swords

text: ( door closes )
name: Two Swords

text: He's quite talented, you know?
name: Two Swords

text: What symptoms?
name: Two Swords

text: Symptoms that are not your concern.
name: Two Swords

text: You let him touch you?
name: Two Swords

text: You jealous?
name: Two Swords

text: I'm surprised.
name: Two Swords

text: You never let Pycelle near you.
name: Two Swords

text: ( laughs ) You think I'd let that old lecher put his hands on me?
name: Two Swords

text: He smells like a dead cat.
name: Two Swords

text: I'm not sure I've eversmelled a dead cat.
name: Two Swords

text: Well, they smell like Pycelle.
name: Two Swords

text: You drink more than you used to.
name: Two Swords

text: Yes.
name: Two Swords

text: Why?
name: Two Swords

text: Let's see, you started a brawl in the streets with Ned Stark and disappeared from the capital.
name: Two Swords

text: My husband died in a tragic hunting accident.
name: Two Swords

text: It must have been traumatic for you.
name: Two Swords

text: My only daughter was shipped off to Dorne.
name: Two Swords

text: We suffered through a siege.
name: Two Swords

text: A rather short siege.
name: Two Swords

text: A rather short siege that I didn't expect to survive.
name: Two Swords

text: And now I'm marrying my eldest son to a wicked little bitch from Highgarden while I'm supposed to marry her brother, a renowned pillow biter.
name: Two Swords

text: So...
name: Two Swords

text: Father disowned me today.
name: Two Swords

text: He can't disown you.
name: Two Swords

text: You're all he's got.
name: Two Swords

text: You're forgetting Tyrion.
name: Two Swords

text: You don't really plan on staying in the Kingsguard, do you?
name: Two Swords

text: Staying in the Kingsguard means I live right here in the Red Keep with you.
name: Two Swords

text: Not now.
name: Two Swords

text: I want--
name: Two Swords

text: Not now? When?
name: Two Swords

text: I've been back for weeks.
name: Two Swords

text: Something's changed.
name: Two Swords

text: Everything's changed.
name: Two Swords

text: You come back after all this time with no apologies and one hand and expect everything to be the same?
name: Two Swords

text: What do you want me to apologize for?
name: Two Swords

text: For leaving me.
name: Two Swords

text: You think I wanted to be taken prisoner?
name: Two Swords

text: Don't know what you wanted.
name: Two Swords

text: You weren't here.
name: Two Swords

text: You left me alone.
name: Two Swords

text: Every day I was a prisoner, I plotted my escape.
name: Two Swords

text: Every day. I murdered people so I could be here with you.
name: Two Swords

text: You took too long.
name: Two Swords

text: What are you saying?
name: Two Swords

text: I'm saying you took too long.
name: Two Swords

text: ( knocking )
name: Two Swords

text: Come in.
name: Two Swords

text: Jaime: Go away.
name: Two Swords

text: Forgive me, Your Grace.
name: Two Swords

text: You told me to come at once if there was anything important.
name: Two Swords

text: You plan on killing all the crows yourself?
name: Two Swords

text: Do you plan on sitting here scratching your balls till winter?
name: Two Swords

text: We wait for Mance's orders.
name: Two Swords

text: You sent a man over the Wall at the full moon.
name: Two Swords

text: If he's not back yet,he's not coming back.
name: Two Swords

text: And what is it you want?
name: Two Swords

text: March on Castle Black with just this lot?
name: Two Swords

text: Your pretty crow said 1,000 men are nesting there.
name: Two Swords

text: Yeah, well, he's a liar.
name: Two Swords

text: He is?
name: Two Swords

text: Shouldn't it be "he was"?
name: Two Swords

text: You said you put three arrows in him.
name: Two Swords

text: I did.
name: Two Swords

text: I've seen you slip a shaft through a rabbit's eye at 200 yards.
name: Two Swords

text: If that boy's still walking, it's 'cause you let him go.
name: Two Swords

text: ( whistles )
name: Two Swords

text: Thenns.
name: Two Swords

text: I f*cking hate Thenns.
name: Two Swords

text: Mance sent you?
name: Two Swords

text: ( grunts )
name: Two Swords

text: How did you find us?
name: Two Swords

text: You came from the south, not the north.
name: Two Swords

text: Took a detour.
name: Two Swords

text: Got some supper from a village down that way.
name: Two Swords

text: Why does the meat down heretaste so much better than it does on our side of the Wall?
name: Two Swords

text: Help yourself.
name: Two Swords

text: ( chuckles )
name: Two Swords

text: Maybe everything's just better fed down here.
name: Two Swords

text: Fat and lazy.
name: Two Swords

text: Easier for us, hmm?
name: Two Swords

text: You didn't see us coming?
name: Two Swords

text: Lost your warg?
name: Two Swords

text: And that baby crow you had with you, lost him too?
name: Two Swords

text: I'll answer to Mance.
name: Two Swords

text: I won't answer to you.
name: Two Swords

text: She yours?
name: Two Swords

text: I'm not anybody's.
name: Two Swords

text: Too scrawny.
name: Two Swords

text: Not like those crows at Castle Black.
name: Two Swords

text: Think of themstuck in their larders stuffing their faces with ham and blood sausage and stew, getting nice and fat and marbled.
name: Two Swords

text: I know we've had our differences, Tormund, but just one time before you die, you really ought to try crow.
name: Two Swords

text: Officer:Draw.
name: Two Swords

text: Loose.
name: Two Swords

text: Jon:Last time I saw him,he was in the courtyardat Winterfell.He said, "Next time I see you,you'll be all in black."
name: Two Swords

text: I was jealous of Robb my whole life.
name: Two Swords

text: ( winces )
name: Two Swords

text: The way my fatherlooked at him,I wanted that.
name: Two Swords

text: He was better than me at everything-- fighting and hunting and riding and girls.
name: Two Swords

text: Gods, the girls loved him.
name: Two Swords

text: I wanted to hate him, but I never could.
name: Two Swords

text: Sometimes I want to hate you.
name: Two Swords

text: Well, you're better than me at everything.
name: Two Swords

text: Except reading.
name: Two Swords

text: They're-- they're ready for you.
name: Two Swords

text: He's wanted to hang me for a while.
name: Two Swords

text: Now's his chance.
name: Two Swords

text: No one's going to hang you.
name: Two Swords

text: You've done nothing wrong.
name: Two Swords

text: I've done plenty wrong.
name: Two Swords

text: So you admit you murdered Qhorin Halfhand?
name: Two Swords

text: Jon:I didn't murder him.
name: Two Swords

text: No? You put your sword through a brother of the Night's Watch.
name: Two Swords

text: What do you call that?
name: Two Swords

text: He wanted me to kill him.
name: Two Swords

text: A b*st*rd son of a traitor.
name: Two Swords

text: What would you expect?
name: Two Swords

text: The Halfhand believed our only chance to stop Mance was to get a man inside his army.
name: Two Swords

text: Don't talk about the Halfhand as if you knew him.
name: Two Swords

text: He was my brother.
name: Two Swords

text: Then you'd know he'd do anything to defend the Wall.
name: Two Swords

text: The free folk would have boiled him alive, but letting me kill him...
name: Two Swords

text: Slynt: The free folk?Listen to him.
name: Two Swords

text: He even talks like a wildling now.
name: Two Swords

text: Aye, I talk like a wildling. I ate with the wildlings.
name: Two Swords

text: I climbed the Wall with the wildlings. I-- I laid with a wildling girl.
name: Two Swords

text: You admit to breaking your vows, then?
name: Two Swords

text: I do.
name: Two Swords

text: The law is the law.
name: Two Swords

text: The boy must die.
name: Two Swords

text: If we beheaded every ranger who lay with a girl, the Wall would be manned by headless men.
name: Two Swords

text: There's a difference between sneaking off to the Mole's Town brothel and sleeping with the enemy.
name: Two Swords

text: While we sit here debating which rules I broke, Mance Rayder marches on the Wall with an army of 100,000.
name: Two Swords

text: Impossible.
name: Two Swords

text: You can't get 50 wildlings together before they start killing each other.
name: Two Swords

text: He's united the Thenns, the Hornfoots,the ice-river clans.
name: Two Swords

text: He has giants fighting for him.
name: Two Swords

text: ( laughs ) Giants?
name: Two Swords

text: Have you ever been beyond the Wall, ser?
name: Two Swords

text: I commanded the City Watch of King's Landing, boy.
name: Two Swords

text: And now you're here.
name: Two Swords

text: You must not have been very good at your job.
name: Two Swords

text: How dare you?!
name: Two Swords

text: There's a band of wildlings south of the Wall already led by Tormund Giantsbane.
name: Two Swords

text: I killed their warg and three others.
name: Two Swords

text: They shot me full of arrows.
name: Two Swords

text: Their orders are to attack Castle Black from the south when Mance hits it from the north.
name: Two Swords

text: The signal for the attack will be a bonfire.
name: Two Swords

text: Mance said it would be the greatest fire the North has ever seen.
name: Two Swords

text: That's the truth.
name: Two Swords

text: All the truth.
name: Two Swords

text: Do you intend to execute me or am I free to go?
name: Two Swords

text: You can see that your presence has become a bit of a problem.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( crying )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( dogs snarling, barking )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Rip her!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Rip her!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Rip her!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( Tansy screaming )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( tearing )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Not so pretty now.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Tyrion: Your new hand, it's nicer than the old one.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Wouldn't you agree, Pod?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Is it solid gold?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Gilded steel.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You're not eating.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Why is no one eating?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: My wife wastes away and my brother starves himself.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm not hungry.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You lost a hand, not a stomach.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Try the boar.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Cersei can't get enough of it since one killed Robert for her.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: A toast.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: To the proud Lannister children.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: The dwarf, the cripple, and the mother of madness.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Oh!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'll clean it up.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: No, I'll do it.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Leave us.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: It's only wine.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I can't fight anymore.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What about your left?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I can hold a sword, but all my instincts are wrong.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: How can I protect the king when I can hardly wipe my own ass?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You're the Lord Commander now.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Command.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Let others do the fighting.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: When was the last time Father used a sword?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm not Father.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm the Kingslayer.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: When people find out I can't slay a pigeon...
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Train, then.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Learn to fight with your other hand.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: With whom? You?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Men talk.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Soon as someone discovers I can't fight, he'll tell everyone.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You need a proper, discreet swordsman.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: As it happens, I have just the one.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: My brother tells me you can keep your mouth shut.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Unusual talent for a sellsword.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: He tells me you sh1t gold just like your father.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Is this place safe?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: There's this knight, Leygood,
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: got thunderbolts on his shield.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Uh-huh.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Right here is where I f*ck his wife.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She's a screamer, that one.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: If they don't hear her, they won't hear us.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( whistles ) I've never seen Valyrian steel before.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She's a beauty.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: The problem is, if you fight with an edged blade, I'll have to.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: And if I fight with an edged blade, I'll have no one left to pay me.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( blade clatters )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I haven't used a sparring sword since I was nine.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Ah!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Bold warrior you are, attacking a man when his guard's down.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Best time to attack a man.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Mind yourself.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: If I still had my right hand...
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Plan on growing it back?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Come on, then.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Man:Open the gates!Riders coming in!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( horse whinnies )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Man: Let's get these horses seen to!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Father.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Welcome home.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Walda, this is Ramsay Snow, my b*st*rd.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: A pleasure, Mother.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Hello.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Roose: See that the horses are fed, watered, and rubbed down.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: And take Lady Walda to her chambers.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: This way, my lady.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Where is your prize?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: With the hounds.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'll have a look at him.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I hear you took a hand from the Kingslayer.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Word travels.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: How he screamed.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You would have loved it.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( laughs )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Father.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What did you do to him?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I trained him.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: He was a slow learner, but he learned.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You flayed him.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Peeled a few bits.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Removed a few others.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: This was Balon Greyjoy's son and heir.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: We've been flaying our enemies for 1,000 years.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: The flayed man is on our banners.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: My banners, not yours.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You're not a Bolton.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You're a Snow.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Tywin Lannister has given me the North.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: But he won't lift a finger to help me take it.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: As long as the ironborn hold Moat Cailin,our armies are trappedsouth of the Neck.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Theon was a valuable hostage, not your plaything.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I wanted to trade him for Moat Cailin.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I already asked.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Lord Greyjoy refused.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Savages have no--
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You sent terms to Balon Greyjoy without my consent?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You made me acting Lord of the Dreadfort.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I acted.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I had to smuggle myself into my own lands thanks to the Greyjoys.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I needed Theon.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I needed him whole.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Theon was our enemy.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: But Reek, Reek will never betray us.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I placed far too much trust in you.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Reek, how could you let me stand before my father unshaven?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: It's disrespectful.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm sorry, my lord.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Give him the razor.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: If I'm not a Bolton, Father, what does it matter?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Go on, Reek.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: A nice close shave.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Reek, tell Father where are Bran and Rickon Stark?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I don't know, my lord.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You murdered them and displayed their corpses at Winterfell.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Ramsay: Reek, did you murder the Stark boys?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: No, my lord.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Just two farm boys.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Ramsay: And crisped them so no one would know.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Theon:Yes, my lord.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: The Starks have always ruled the North.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: If Bran and Rickon are alive, the country will rally to their side now that Robb Stark is gone.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Oh, that's right, Reek.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Robb Stark is dead.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Sorry.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I know he was likea brother to you.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: But my father put a knife through his heart.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: How do you feel about that?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You ready for a hunt?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Always.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Find those boys and I'll give you 1,000 acres and a holdfast.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Your pet rat have any thoughts on which way they went after Winterfell?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Jon Snow is at Castle Black.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Who the f*ck is Jon Snow?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Their b*st*rd brother.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: He could be sheltering them.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: He may know where they are.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Even if he doesn't, he's half Stark himself.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Could be a threat.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You want to prove yourself a Bolton?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Gather whatever men you can and ride for Moat Cailin.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Bring this creature of yours.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Maybe he'll be of some use.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Take the Moat for the family, for our family, and I'll reconsider your position.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Lord Varys.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Breakfasting with the king?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm afraid foreigners aren't welcome at such exclusive affairs.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Oh, to be foreign.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Ahem.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Shae has been noticed.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Sansa's maid saw you with her.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She already told your sister.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: It's only a matter of time before your father hears.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: So I'm guilty of being seen with my own wife's handmaiden.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: My father will ask you if there's anything more and you'll tell him some clever lie.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: No, I will not.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: How long do you imagine your father and sister would let me live if they suspected me of lying?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I have no pet sellsword to protect me.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: No legendary brother to avenge me.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Only little birdswho whisper in my ear.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Forgive me if I don't weep for you.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: No one weeps for spiders or whores.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I have friends across the sea who could help her.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She won't leave.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I've told her this is a dangerous place so many times, she no longer believes it.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Your father has promised to hang the next whore he finds you with.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Have you ever known your father to make an idle threat?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: From House Tyrell and the people of the Reach, Your Grace, it is my honor to present you with this wedding cup.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: May you and my daughter Margaery drink deep and live long.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: A handsome goblet, my lord.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Or shall I call you Father?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I shall be honored, Your Grace.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She's the whore I told you about.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: The dark-haired one.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Have her brought to the Tower of the Hand before the wedding.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: A book?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: "The Lives of Four Kings." Grand Maester Kaeth's history of the reigns of Daeron the Young Dragon, Baelor the Blessed, Aegon the
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Unworthy, and Daeron the Good.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: A book every king should read.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Now that the war is won, we should all find time for wisdom.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Thank you, Uncle.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: One of only two Valyrian steel swords in the capital,
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Your Grace, freshly forged in your honor.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Careful, Your Grace.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Nothing cuts like Valyrian steel.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: So they say.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( panting )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Such a great sword should have a name.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What shall I call her?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Man: Stormbringer.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Man # : Terminus.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Man # : Widow's Wail.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Man # : Wolfsbane.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Widow's Wail. I like that.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( chuckles )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Every time I use it, it'll be like cutting off Ned Stark's head all over again.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( door opens )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Don't.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You want me on the desk?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What's wrong, my lion?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Don't call me that.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What should I call you?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm afraid our friendship can't continue.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Our friendship?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: There's a ship waiting in the harbor bound for Pentos.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You'll have your own cabin, of course, and across the Narrow Sea a house, servants.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What is this?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm a married man.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: My wife has suffered a great deal, as you well know.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I don't want her to suffer anymore on my account.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I need to uphold my vows.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She doesn't want you.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I need to do right by her.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You don't want her.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: By our children.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What are you afraid of?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm not afraid.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You are. You are afraid of your father and your sister.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You're going to run from them all your life?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I need you to leave.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm not afraid of them.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm not going to run.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Shae.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: We will fight them together.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: It's like you said, I am yours and you are mine.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You're a whore!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Sansa is fit to bear my children and you are not.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I can't be in love with a whore.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I can't have children with a whore.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: How many men have you been with?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: How many whores have you been with?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I have enjoyed my time with all of them and I have enjoyed my time with you most of all.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: But now that time is over.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( Shae crying )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You'll have a comfortable life in Pentos.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Bronn will escort you to your ship.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( door closes )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( woman screaming )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Melisandre: Hear us now.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Accept these tokens of our faith, my lord, and lead us from the darkness.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( crying )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Sire, I served you well.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( crowd chanting ) Lord of Light, show us the way...
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Selyse, you're my sister!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Yours are the stars that guide us.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Tell him!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Tell him!
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Melisandre:Lord of Light, protect us, for the night is dark and full of terrors.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( screaming )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Did you see?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Their souls.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: It was their souls.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Our lord took them.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Did you see?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Lord Florent was your brother by law.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: He was an infidel.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: He worshipped the gods of his fathers and their fathers before him.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: They were the gods of your fathers, too.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I ordered him to tear down his idols.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: He disobeyed.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: How many ships did he bring to your cause?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: How many men?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: A good deal more than you.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Did you see, Ser Davos?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: They're with our lord now.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Their sins all burned away.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Did you see?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I'm sure they're more than grateful, my queen.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( sniffs )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Meat's off.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Our larders are almost empty.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Serve fish, then.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: We're on an island.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You hate fish.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I hate a good many things, but I suffer them all the same.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: When Storm's End was under siege and I was starving,Stannis boiled soupfor me from books.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: The binding glue is made from horses.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: One morning, he shot two seagulls on the beach.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I've never tasted anything as good as grilled seagull.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Do you remember?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Of course I remember.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Have you ever known true hunger, my lady?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: It's all I knewwhen I was a child.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Until you found the Lord of Light?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Until he found me.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I fear for our daughter's soul.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Every mother should fearfor her child's soul.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She's a stubborn little beast.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She's a child.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You barely know her.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You think she's sweet because she smiles when you visit.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She's sullen and stubborn and sinful.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Why else would the Lord of Light have seen fit to mark her face?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She needs the rod.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: She's my daughter.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You will not strike her.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: As you command.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Perhaps the Lady Melisandre could speak with her.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( knocks )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Come in.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Were you sleeping, Princess?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Did you watch the ceremony on the beach?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I heard it.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: And it frightened you?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Ser Axel was my uncle.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: He was always kind to me.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: They're in a better place now, Princess.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: The fire cleansed themof the sins of the world.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: But they screamed.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Women scream when they give birth.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Afterward they are filled with joy.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Afterward they aren't ash and bone.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You have so many questions, don't you?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: So did I when I was a child.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I was much like you.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Only I wasn't a princess.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: And you didn't have this.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: No.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: But I suffered in other ways, sweet girl, believe me.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: What do you know of the gods?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I read "The Seven-Pointed Star."
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Lies and fables.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Septons speak of seven gods.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: There are but two-- a god of light and love and joy and a god of darkness, evil, and fear.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Eternally at war.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: There are no seven heavens and no seven hells?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: There's only one hell, Princess.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: The one we live in now.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( heavy breathing )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( growls )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Hodor.
name: The Lion and the Rose

name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( breathing heavily )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Why did you wake me?
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You've been gone for hours.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I was hungry.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: We're all hungry.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I was just eating.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Summer was eating.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Your body can't live on the food your wolf consumes.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Spending too much time in Summer's skin is dangerous.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You're not a direwolf, Bran.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: Must be glorious, though.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: To run, to leap, to hunt.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: To be whole.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: I know that's tempting, but if you're trapped in Summer for too long, you'll forget what it was to be human.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You'd forget us, Bran.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You'd forget your mother and father.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You'd forget your brothers and sisters.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You'd forget Winterfell.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: You'd forget you.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: And if we lose you, we lose everything.
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( wind blowing )
name: The Lion and the Rose

text: ( wolf barks )
name: The Lion and the Rose

name: Breaker of Chains

text: Her visions and prophecies may be, too, but I've never heard of visions and prophecies winning a war.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Soldiers win wars.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Soldiers on the ground.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: It's dirty on the ground.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We don't have any gold.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Not yet.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: If I do not press my claim, my claim will be forgotten.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I will not become a page in someone else's history book.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'm running out of time, Ser Davos.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Which means you're running out of time.
name: Breaker of Chains

name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( knocking )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You're late.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'm sorry, Princess.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I thought you weren't coming.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The Hand of the King doesn't have much leisure time.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You won't be a very good Hand if you see the word knight and say "ka-nigit."
name: Breaker of Chains

text: That happened once, weeks ago.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You're your father's daughter, no mistake.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Bloody relentless, the both of you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: It's a new one today.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Lots of tricky words.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: But I think you can manage.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You'll never read well if you move your lips.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: That's how children do it.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: "The Life and Adventures of Elyo Grivas First Sword of Braavos."
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( claps )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Thank you very much.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I like this one. It's full of sword fights and pirates.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You were a pirate once.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No, I was never a pirate.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I was a smuggler.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What's the difference?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Well, if you're a famous smuggler, you're not doing it right.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: My father says a criminal is a criminal.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Your father lacks an appreciation of the finer points of bad behavior.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: So do the Braavosi.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You've sailed to Braavos?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Of course.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Almost got beheaded by a First Sword of Braavos.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I tried to explain to him the difference between pirates and smugglers, but he didn't seem any more interested in the distinction than your father.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I suppose if you work for the Iron Bank of Braavos and each one of your gold barges is worth half a kingdom, you tend not to be overly concerned with the kind of distinction--
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What was that for?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I need you to write a message.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You should write it yourself.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: It's good practice.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: It's too important for me.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I need a smart person to do it. Go on.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: To the offices of the Iron Bank of Braavos from Stannis Baratheon the one true king of Westeros.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: But that's not you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I need to get their attention.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Go on. Write.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( baby cooing )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: He's seen some adventures, hasn't he?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( people laughing, chatting )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Precious little thing.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Thank you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What's his name?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Sam.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Lovely.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: That the daddy?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Where's the daddy?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: He's dead.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Oh. Where you from?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: North of here.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: North of here?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You a f*cking wildling?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Only room and board?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: That's right.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: She'll clean and cook and look after the other girls' babies.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Could find other work for her, too.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No other work.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: There'd be money.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Give you a piece of it.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No other work.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I promise to come back and visit whenever I can.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You'll be safer here.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Who's gonna protect you at Castle Black? Me?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You protected me north of the Wall.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: This is different.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They're brothers of the Night's Watch and I can't just stab them in the back and I can't run away, which is what we did at Craster's.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( baby crying )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You have to trust me.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: It's for the best.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Best for you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Oh, Gilly.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Please don't.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( baby crying )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( moaning )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Greedy.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'm sorry.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You're lovely, I just never acquired the taste.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You're calling my beauty an acquired taste?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: That's quite all right, lover.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: It's more for you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Your loss.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You like them both the same?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Boys and girls?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Does that surprise you?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Everyone has a preference.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Then everyone is missing half the world's pleasure.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The gods made thatand it delights me.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The gods made this and it delights me.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: When it comes to war, I fight for Dorne.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: When it comes to love, I don't choose sides.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I hope I have as much stamina when I'm your age.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What are you, 25?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Children.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( Chuckles )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Someday, if you're lucky, you will wake up and realize you are old.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: That pretty ass of yours will sag.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Your belly will grow soft and your back will ache in the night and gray hairs will sprout from your ears.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No one will want you anymore.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Make sure you f*cked your fill before that day.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Did you?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: He is a prince of Dorne.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Girls and boys will line up to f*ck him till the day he dies.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They will all have to line up behind you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( door opens )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Prince Oberyn.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Lord Tywin.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: May we have the room?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Call my name if you need me, lover.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Would you like to sit?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No, thank you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Some wine?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No, thank you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( door closes )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'm sorry about your grandson.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Are you?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I don't believe that a child is responsible for the sins of his father.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Or his grandfather.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: An awful way to die.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Which way is that?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Are you interrogating me, Lord Tywin?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Some believe the king choked.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Some believe the sky is blue because we live inside the eye of a blue-eyed giant.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The king was poisoned.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I hear you studied poisons at the Citadel.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I did.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: This is why I know.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Your hatred for my family is rather well known.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You arrive at the capital, an expert in poisoning, some days later my grandson dies of poisoning.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Rather suspicious.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Why haven't you thrown me in a dungeon?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You spoke with Tyrion in this very brothel on the day that you arrived.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What did you discuss?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You think we conspired together?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What did you discuss?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The death of my sister.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: For which you blame me.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: She was raped and murdered by the Mountain.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The Mountain follows your orders.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Of course I blame you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Here I stand unarmed, unguarded.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Should I be concerned?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You are unarmed and unguarded because you know me better than that.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I am a man of reason.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: If I cut your throat today, I will be drawn and quartered tomorrow.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Men at war commit all kinds of crimes without their superiors' knowledge.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: So you deny involvement in Elia's murder?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Categorically.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I would like to speak with the Mountain.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'm sure he would enjoy speaking with you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: He might not enjoy it as much as he thinks he would.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I could arrange for this meeting.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: But you want something in return.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: There will be a trial for my son.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And as custom dictates, three judges will render a verdict.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I will preside.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Mace Tyrell will serve as the second judge.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I would like you to be the third.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Why?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Not long ago, the Tyrells sided with Renly Baratheon.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Declared themselves enemies of the throne.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Now they are our strongest allies.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Well, you made the Tyrell girl a queen.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Asking me to judge at your son's trial isn't quite as tempting.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I will also invite you to sit on the small council to serve as one of the new king's principal advisors.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I never realized you had such respect for Dorne, Lord Tywin.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We are not the Seven Kingdoms until Dorne returns to the fold.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The king is dead. The Greyjoys are in open rebellion.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: A wildling army marches on the Wall.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And in the East, a Targaryen girl has three dragons.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Before long, she will turn her eyes to Westeros.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Only the Dornish managed to resist Aegon Targaryen and his dragons.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You're saying you need us?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: That must be hard for you to admit.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We need each other.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You help me serve justice to the king's assassins and I will help you serve justice to Elia's.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( door unlocks )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Podrick.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Apologies for the stench.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I brought you some wine, my lord, but they took it from me.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: A noble effort.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They didn't find the candles, though.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: A quill, some parchment, duck sausage, almonds, and some hard cheese.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You're a good lad.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Any word of Shae?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I've heard nothing, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I suppose that's a good thing.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What are they saying about me out there?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You're to stand trial in a fortnight for murdering the king.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Do you believe I murdered Joffrey?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You didn't?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No. Gods, no.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The world is a better place without him, but I had nothing to do with it.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I would like to think if I were arranging a royal assassination, I'd plan it in such a way that I wouldn't be standing there gawking like a fool when the king died.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Trial in a fortnight.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Have they announcedthe judges yet?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Your father.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Of course.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Mace Tyrell.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Who will vote exactly as my father tells him to vote.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And Prince Oberyn of Dorne.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Oberyn?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Give it to my father.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: He never fails to take advantage of a family tragedy.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'm supposed to get a list of names from you, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Anyone who might testify on your behalf.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Oh, I can call my own witnesses?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: How generous of them.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Very well, my wife.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Sansa.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: My lord, she's gone.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Gone?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: - No one's seen her since the wedding.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You don't think she...
name: Breaker of Chains

text: No one had more causeto kill Joffrey than Sansa, but the girl is no assassin.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Whoever killed the king wanted me to lose my head for it.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And with my wife's disappearance, it makes me seem that much more guilty.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Podrick.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Yes, my lord?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They'll be following you now.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Who will?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I don't know. They.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They. The ominous they.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: The man pulling the strings.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Or woman. My father.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Maybe Joffrey was too much work for him.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Sweet Tommen will be so much easier to handle.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Whenever something bad happens to me, I assume it's my sister that had a hand in it.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: But say what you will of Cersei, she loves her children.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: She is the only one I'm certain had nothing to do with this murder.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Which makes it unique as King's Landing murders go.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Any other witnesses, my lord?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Varys could vouch for me if he dared.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: He's already been called as a witness for the queen.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Of course. Fetch Bronn.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I have a job for him.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I've already asked, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They won't let him see you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Why not?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They say he's a known cutthroat and your close associate.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: He's under investigation himself.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And my brother? Will they at least allow me to see Jaime?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'll ask, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: There's something else, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: A man, I didn't know his face, he came to ask if I'd testify against you.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Said I'd be named Ser Podrick Payne if I told the judges you'd bought a poison called the Strangler.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Ser Podrick Payne?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Has a nice ring to it.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What did you tell him?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I didn't tell them anything, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Are you going to accept their offer?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: My lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Testifying against me wasn't a suggestion.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: If they can't tempt you with honey, they'll choose something less sweet.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You've been good to me, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Pod, the trial's in a fortnight.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They'll want an answer before that.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I already gave them an answer, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I will not have you dying on my behalf.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Do you hear me?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: If I have to take that long walk to the executioner's block, I don't want to see your head already mounted.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: My lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Pod, I am giving you an order.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Go and find my brother.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Tell him I need him.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And get yourself out of King's Landing before it's too late.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Pod!
name: Breaker of Chains

text: This is farewell.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Farewell, my lord.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( door opens )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Pod.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: There has never lived a more loyal squire.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( door closes )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Boy: Mother says it's time to eat.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What's she got boiling?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Wait. Wait. Let me guess.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Potatoes.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Potatoes.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Well, no one boils a potato better than your mom.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Has she got--
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Man:The wildlings!
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Guymon!
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Hide.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Hide!
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( screams )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( shouting, screaming )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( grunting )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You know how to get to Castle Black?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Yes. Yes.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Those your parents?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Open your eyes.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'm going to eat them.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Do you hear me?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I'm going to eat your dead mama and I'm going to eat your dead papa.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Go tell the crows at Castle Black.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Yarwyck: We need to teach them a lesson about the way we deal with their kind.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Men:Aye! Aye!
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Yarwyck:  Three dozen bodies with slit throatstossed off the top of the Wall.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Seems like that would be a good lesson.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Aye!
name: Breaker of Chains

text: If we go after them, we'll be giving them what they want.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They want to draw us out, pick us off a few at a time.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We have just over 100 men.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And that's including stewards and builders.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And me. We can't afford to lose a single man.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We must remember our first responsibility.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We are the watchers on the Wall.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: There's got to be a way to protect them.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: You're a champion of the common people, Lord Snow.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What do you say toBrother Pyp's proposition?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Mance Rayder is coming.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: If the wildlings breach the Wall, they'll roll over everything and everyone for 1,000 miles before they reach an army that can stop them.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We need to shore up Castle Black and we need to defend the Wall.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: That is our job.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: ( horn blows )
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Rangers returning.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Help him.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Thought you'd have blue eyes by now.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: What took you so long?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We were held up.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: By what?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Chains.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We were guests of the mutineers at Craster's Keep.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: And the mutineers stayed?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They're not going anywhere.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: They've got Craster's food and his wives.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Dolorous Edd: Poor girls.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Never thought they'd miss their daddy.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Karl's running things now.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: He's the one who put a knife through Craster's mouth.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We need to ride north and kill them all.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: We just went over this, boy.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Justice can wait.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: It's not about justice.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: I told the wildlings we had over , men at Castle Black alone.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Karl and the others know the truth as well as we do.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: How long do you think they'll keep that information to themselves when the wildlings are peeling their fingernails off?
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Mance has all he needs to crush us, he just doesn't know it yet.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: As soon as he gets his hands on them, he will.
name: Breaker of Chains

text: Then he'll throw his full strength at us.
name: Breaker of Chains

May the Smith grant him strength that he might bear this heavy burden And may the Crone, she that knows the fate of all men, show him the path he must walk and guide him through the dark places that lie ahead. In the light of the Seven, I now proclaim Tommen of the House Baratheon First of His Name King of the Andals and the First Men and Lord of the Seven Kingdoms.

text: Not once in 1,000 years.
name: First of His Name

text: Know your strengths, use them wisely, and one man can be worth 10,000.

text: Lord Baelish.

name: First of His Name

name: First of His Name
