name: Kill the Boy

text: Sansa Stark?
name: Kill the Boy

text: I saw her riding on the East Road with Littlefinger. We'll follow them.
name: Kill the Boy

text: May I introduce my son, Ramsay Bolton.
name: Kill the Boy

text: My Lady.
name: Kill the Boy

text: Welcome home, Lady Stark. The North remembers.
name: Kill the Boy

text: You let a halfwit escape through the crypt.
name: Kill the Boy

text: And Rickon too, the little one.
name: Kill the Boy

text: I told you what would happen if you serve me loyally.
name: Kill the Boy

text: And what would happen if you did not.
name: Kill the Boy

text: Who are you?
name: Kill the Boy

text: Your captor.
name: Kill the Boy

text: You said you're taking me to the queen.
name: Kill the Boy

text: I meant Daenerys Targaryen.
name: Kill the Boy

text: You're the Mother of Dragons. Show your strength.
name: Kill the Boy

text: No one's seen Drogon in weeks. For all I know, he's flown half way across the world.
name: Kill the Boy

text: The Wise Masters ask for the reopening of the fighting pits.
name: Kill the Boy

text: Where slaves fought slaves to the death?
name: Kill the Boy

text: Opening them would show the people of Meereen that you respect their traditions.
name: Kill the Boy

text: Traditions are the only thing that will hold this city together.
name: Kill the Boy

text: (theme music playing)
name: Kill the Boy

text: I'm so sorry, my queen.
name: Kill the Boy

text: He was a good man.
name: Kill the Boy

text: "Barristan the Bold" they called him.
name: Kill the Boy

text: He crossed a continent to serve me.
name: Kill the Boy

text: He was a loyal friend.
name: Kill the Boy

text: And he died in an alley, butchered by cowards who hide behind masks.
name: Kill the Boy

text: We could pull back to the pyramid district,
name: Kill the Boy

text: secure it, and use it as a base from which to operate.
name: Kill the Boy

text: Then we clean the city out,
name: Kill the Boy

text: neighborhood by neighborhood, street by street, until the rats have nowhere left to hide.
name: Kill the Boy

name: Kill the Boy

name: Kill the Boy

text: You?

text: Cersei sent for me.
name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

text: I expect I'll be a married woman by the time you return.
name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

text: I'll never hurt her!
name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

text: All sinners are equal before the Gods.

name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

text: Who do you think you are?
name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

text: Your brother was murdered, while you sit here, doing nothing.

name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

text: Queen Cersei loves her children.

name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

text: We're rescuing my niece, bringing her back to her family.
name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

text: The Dornish are crazy.
name: Unbowed, Unbent, Unbroken

name: Blood of My Blood

text: (grunting)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (voices whispering)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (screeches)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (Meera grunting)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (groans)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (panting)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (grunting)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (cawing)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Burn them all!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Where's my sister?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (groans)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (caws)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Aerys: Burn them all!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (Meera panting)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (shouts, panting)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (grunts)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (sobbing)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (murmuring)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Please.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Aerys: Burn them. Burn them all!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (wights shrieking)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Aerys: Burn them all!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ TITLE SEQUENCE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ EXT. BEYOND THE WALL ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (Heavy snow is falling. MEERA is dragging BRAN's sledge through the forest. BRAN's eyes are glazed white. He experiences many visions of the past all at once. MEERA staggers and falls against the base of a tree. She puts all her weight into pulling the sledge, but it does not budge. She begins crying and goes to BRAN, cradling his head. BRAN continues to have rapid fire visions, then sees a group of wights running through the woods. He wakes up from the visions and looks at MEERA.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bran: Meera. They found us.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MEERA looks out into the woods and sees the group of wights. She begins crying and embraces BRAN.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Meera: I'm so sorry.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The wights converge on MEERA and BRAN. Moments before they reach them, a cloaked rider appears. The rider's horse kicks one of the wights out of the way, then the rider extends a chain which lights on fire at the end. Two wights charge, and the rider hits them both with the chain, setting them on fire. A third wight tries to attack his horse, but the horse's bulk rebuffs it into a tree and it crumbles. The rider plunges a chain-sickle into the chest of another wight, then rides forward, dragging the wight behind his horse. He sets another wight on fire with the chain, launching it into the air, and then approaches BRAN and MEERA.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Rider: Come with me, now.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (A large group of wights approaches.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Rider: The dead don't rest.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The rider leans down and hoists BRAN up onto his horse. MEERA takes the rider's hand and joins them on the horse's back. The three of them ride off into the forest with wights in pursuit.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ EXT. ROAD TO HORN HILL ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM, GILLY, and LITTLE SAMare riding in a carriage escorted by several soldiers. GILLY looks out the window. SAM is holding LITTLE SAM.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: It's so green.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, yes. Once you get south of the Riverlands, very different sorts of trees start to take over. Maple, elm, beech, poplar. The odd willow. And of course now that summer's over, you'll start seeing the autumn colors coming in. Still, you'll find more green here than anywhere else.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: You're nervous. You're a nervous talker.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM looks away.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: That's not any better being a nervous mute.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: I didn't think I'd ever come back here after my father made me renounce my title and inheritance and, well, threaten to kill me if I didn't. A person just doesn't feel welcome at that point.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (GILLY looks at LITTLE SAM.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: And I certainly didn't expect to be introducing him to my family. So you know what to tell them.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: That Little Sam is your baby.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Yes, now that's very important. If he thinks that Little Sam is his grandchild, he'll take you in. He'll get an education. He'll learn to read. And you can help teach him. Huh?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: What did you tell your family about me?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: I told them I met you in the North.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: Did you tell them how far north?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Well, it wasn't a very large piece of parchment.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: You didn't tell them where I'm really from? You didn't tell them I'm a wildling?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: The thing is...my father doesn't like wildlings. He hoped I'd make a man of myself by "killing some bloody wildlings," so it's probably a good subject to avoid if at all possible.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (GILLY looks out the window.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: I think we're here.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM looks out the window. The carriage is approaching the castle on Horn Hill.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: HORN HILL - COURTYARD ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (A party of guests is lined up at the entrance to the castle courtyard. GILLY and SAM enter. GILLY is carrying LITTLE SAM. SAM's mother, MELESS, and his sister, TALLA, descend a set of stairs and approach them.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: Sam. Oh, Sam.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM and MELESSA embrace.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, hello, Mother.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: I never thought I'd see you again. You look wonderful.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (TALLA embraces SAM and he grunts.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Talla? Gods, you're a woman now.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Talla: Father says I have to marry Symun Fossoway. He has yellow teeth--
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: That's enough, Talla.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, um, Mother, this is Gilly.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (GILLY bows her head and curtsies.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: Oh, my. You are lovely.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: I am happy to know you, Lady Tarly.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, and this, this is our son Samwell.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MELESSA and TALLA smile at each other. MELESSA approaches the baby and smiles.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: Hello, little one. It's me, your grandmother.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (LITTLE SAM smiles and touches MELESSA's face.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: May I hold him?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: Yes, of course.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (GILLY passes LITTLE SAM to MELESSA.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa (to little Sam): You have a curious mind, I can tell. You'll be a scholar like your father.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Where is Father? And Dickon?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: They're on a hunt. They'll join us for dinner. Come inside. Such a journey. You must be exhausted.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MELESSA passes LITTLE SAM back to GILLY. SAM and MELESSA proceed up the steps. TALLA takes GILLY's arm and they follow.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Talla: Come, you'll be wanting a bath after all that travel. Oh, and a dress for dinner. You can wear one of mine. What's your color? Midnight blue or silver? Silver, maybe. Come. You can choose one of my bedrooms if you want.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ INT. GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (TOMMEN and the HIGH SPARROW are standing in the central chamber. TOMMEN lights a candle.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: Is there no other way?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: You're afraid for her?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: Of course I'm afraid for her! It just seems very dangerous.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: She'll be protected the entire way. The Faith Militant are very stern with those who overstep their bounds. And Queen Margaery isn't your mother. I suspect the gods will predispose the common people to gentleness on her behalf. She's truly opened her heart to them.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: She's always been very devoted to the poor and the unfortunate.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: And now she's devoted to the gods as well. Would you like to see her?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - PRAYER ROOM ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MARGAERY is sitting on a bench reading a book. The door opens. TOMMEN and the HIGH SPARROW are visible outside. TOMMEN enters and stares at MARGAERY. The HIGH SPARROW closes the door behind TOMMEN. MARGAERY sets down her book and stands. They embrace.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: Have they hurt you? Have they mistreated you?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: No, Your Grace.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: I've missed you. More than you could know.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: We'll be together again soon and everything will be better than it was before.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: Better how? Soon the-- walk of atonement. He says there's no other way.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: Have you spoken to him at all, the High Sparrow?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: Yes, a few times. Have you?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: Yes, I have. He's not quite what we thought he was, is he?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (TOMMEN scrunches up his face. MARGAERY chuckles and turns away.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: You think I'm mad. I sound mad.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: No. No, you don't. You-- you could never. You're right, he's not. He's a lot more--
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: He is. There's something about him. His way of looking at the world. It's not an easy thing admitting to yourself what you really are. It's taken me a while. He's helped me.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: What are you talking about? You're a good person. You've always been a good person. You're the best person I know.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MARGAERY chuckles and retrieves her book from the bench.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: I was just telling him about your devotion to the poor.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: Ah, yes, I visited their hovels and I fed them soup and I made sure I was seen doing it. I never gave them what they really needed, though. I've had lots of time to think about how good I was at seeming good. All those stories I told myself about who I was and why I did the things I did. There were so many lies in those stories.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: I don't understand.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MARGAERY rushes to TOMMEN and takes his hand.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: It's all right. It really is. It's such a relief to let go of those lies.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MARGAERY leads him to the bench and they sit down on it together.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: What about Loras?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Margaery: I love my brother. I will always love my brother. His soul is pure and perfect. His sins don't erase that purity, they only obscure it. He just needs to atone for them. We all do. Sooner or later, one way or another. The gods have a plan for us all.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ INT. HORN HILL - HALLWAY ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM paces. GILLY enters on the far end of the hall. She is wearing a dress and her hair is done up.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: It's hard to walk in this.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: It's beautiful. You're beautiful.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (GILLY takes SAM's arm and they walk down the hall together.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: HORN HILL - DINING HALL ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM, GILLY, MELESSA, TALLA, DICKON, and RANDYLL are sitting around the dinner table eating. RANDYLL takes a bite and stares at SAM. GILLY looks around at others using their utensils and mimics them. SAM looks at DICKON.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: This venison, it's very tasty. Is it from today's hunt?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Dickon: Well, no. We haven't been able to cure that one yet. This is last week's.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, of course. Sorry. Long journey.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Dickon: Brought it down from 70 yards. One shot.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, that's a fair distance.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Dickon: So do you do much hunting up at the wall?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, yes. Yes. A good amount. North of the Wall, you don't hunt, you don't eat.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Dickon: Mm-hmmm. Mostly deer or is it elk as well?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Rabbits. Sometimes squirrels. I say "we," it's my friend Jon mostly. Sometimes Edd. Oh, and Gilly. She's-- she's quite a good hunter as well. Um, huntress.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa (to Gilly): I imagine it's common where you're from. We once met a man, Lord Umber from Last Hearth, wasn't it, Randyll, who said he taught all his daughters how to hunt.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Talla: Your father taught you to hunt? Our father would never teach us. I think our father could learn a thing or two from your father.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: That's enough of that.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: Samwell, would you care for more bread?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, yes. Yes, please. Thank you, Mother.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (A servant girl retrieves the basket of bread. She holds out the basket to SAM. SAM reaches for the bread.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: Not fat enough already?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM waves the servant away.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: I travelled south under orders from the Lord Commander. He wants me to--
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: I read your letter. You're to be a maester.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Yes. And once I have my chain, I'll return to Castle Black.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: I thought the Night's Watch might make a man of you. Something resembling a man at least. You managed to stay soft and fat.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM puts down his utensils.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: Your nose buried in books. Spending your life reading about the achievements of better men. I'll wager you still can't sit a horse or wield a sword.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: Randyll, to be maester of the Night's Watch is a great honor.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: He can wield a sword. He killed a Thenn. He killed a White Walker.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (DICKON laughs.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Dickon: There's no such thing.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: I saw it with my own eyes on our way down to Castle Black. He drove a dagger into the walker's heart. He risked his own life to save mine more than once. He's a greater warrior than either of you will ever be.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: Your way down to Castle Black? Where did he kill a white walker? Where are you from? How'd you come to meet my son?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: The Night's Watch came to our keep.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: Where?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Gilly.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: North of the Wall.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: North of the Wall? You're a Wildling. The Seven Kingdoms have waged war against these savages for centuries and here I sit hosting one in my hall thanks to my son. See that sword?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (RANDYLL points to a blade mounted on a mantle beside the table.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: It's called Heartsbane. It's been in our family for 500 years. It's Valyrian steel. Only a handful of them left in the world. It's supposed to go to my firstborn son after I die. To him. He will never wield that sword. If he were to become Lord Tarly of Horn Hill, it would be the end of this house. I took you for a Mole's Town whore when I saw you and I made my peace with that. Who else would have him? But I overestimated him. No. It was a wildling whore that seduced my son. This you getting back at me, boy? Hmm? Bring that to my table and making me dine with it. And you got what you were after, didn't you? A b*st*rd. A half-breed b*st*rd. Your invitation into our home.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MELESSA throws down her utensils and stands. She walks to GILLY.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: Come, my dear. Talla.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (TALLA and GILLY stand and begin to follow MELESSA out of the hall.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: I've lost my appetite.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll: He dishonors us.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Melessa: You dishonor yourself.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Randyll (to Sam): Your mother's a fine woman. You're not worthy of her. To please her, I'll take the wildling in. She can work in the kitchens. The b*st*rd will be raised here. But this will be the last night you ever spend at Horn Hill.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: HORN HILL - GILLY'S GUEST CHAMBER ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (GILLY is sitting at the foot of the bed. LITTLE SAM is in a crib beside her. SAM stands before them both. He hangs his head.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: I'm sorry I let him treat you that way. I was afraid he'd turn you and Little Sam away.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: I'm not angry at you. I'm angry that horrible people can treat good people that way and get away with it. When do you have to go?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: First light.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (LITTLE SAM fusses and reaches for SAM. SAM takes his hand.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Say good-bye to him for me.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM starts off but GILLY stands and gets in his way. She places her hands on his chest and kisses him.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: You're not what he thinks you are, Sam. He doesn't know what you are.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Good-bye, Gilly.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM walks to the door. He turns back and stares at GILLY before closing the doors. GILLY looks around the guest chamber and then goes to LITTLE SAM. She pulls his blanket up higher and comforts him. SAM bursts back into the room.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: Sam?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: We're leaving.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: What?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Get your things.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: I don't have any things.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM picks up LITTLE SAM.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: What are you doing?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: We belong together. All of us.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: HORN HILL - DINING CHAMBER ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM and GILLY walk briskly through the hall. GILLY is carrying LITTLE SAM.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: What about your mother and sister?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: Oh, they'll understand.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: Your sister's dress.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM grabs a stool and carries it in front of the mantle hosting Heartsbane.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: She won't mind. Looks better on you anyway.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM climbs on top of the stool.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: Sam. That's your father's sword.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM lifts Heartsbane off the mantle. He groans and slides it into its scabbard.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: It's my family's sword.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Gilly: Sam. Won't he come for it?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Sam: He can bloody well try.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (SAM hops down off the stool.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text:

');var e=document.createElement("script");e.type="text/javascript",e.src="//cdn.chitika.net/getads.js";try{document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(e)}catch(o){document.write(e.outerHTML)}}();
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ EXT. BRAAVOS - SHEELBA SQUARE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The acting troupe is putting on a repeat performance of) The Bloody Hand, ( their play about the happenings of Westerosi royalty. AYRA is standing in the crowd in the front row. On stage is CLORENZO portraying JOFFREY, an actress portraying MARGAERY, BIANCA portraying SANSA, BOBONO portraying TYRION, and LADY CRANE portraying CERSEI. CLORENZO is at center stage, brandishing a prop sword.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Clarenzo: The lion and the rose are one. I thank the gods above.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The actress portraying MARGAERY runs to CLARENZO.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Clarenzo: And to you, my beauteous bridge, I pledge undying love.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: All: Hail King Joffrey. Hail Queen Margaery.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Clarenzo: I'll drink a toast to my new queen, for there is no one fairer. Dear Uncle, will you share my joy and be my royal cupbearer?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BOBONO approaches CLARENZO and hands him a prop cup.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bobono: Drink long and deep, my noble king, from this cup of sweet wine.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (CLARNEZO takes the prop cup and BOBONO walks to center stage, addressing the audience.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bobono: The last drink he shall ever take. And vengeance shall be mine.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BOBONO laughs and the audience boos. CLARENZO takes a sip from the prop cup, then gags and sputters. The audience gasps. He moves to center stage.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Clarenzo: Poison! Murder! I gasp. I-- I die.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA smiles and laughs in the crowd.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Clarenzo: I limp. And it was he...
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (CLARENZO points at BOBONO. BOBONO holds up a prop vial of poison. The audience gasps and boos.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Clarenzo: ...that poisoned me. My evil Uncle Imp.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BOBONO laughs and exits with BIANCA. The audience boos. CLARENZO collapses and LADY CRANE kneels down beside him. ARYA laughs. LADY CRANE cradles the head of the actor portraying JOFFREY.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: My firstborn son. My golden lion foully, falsely slain. I pray you found a lasting peace free from strife and pain.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA's smile fades.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: Hear my prayer, O cruel gods. Take my life instead. For I cannot face another day when my sweet boy is dead. Oh, woe. Oh grief.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA notices BIANCA standing offstage. BIANCA is watching LADY CRANE's performance and mouths her lines as she utters them.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: Oh, darkest day, my heart is full of sorrow. All hope is lost. All joy is gone. And there is no tomorrow.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (LADY CRANE kisses CLARENZO's cheek and lays his head down. The audience claps. The actors clear out the stage and the prop men change the scene. BOBONO enters carrying a prop crossbow. IZEMBARO, portraying TYWIN, is sitting on a prop toilet.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bobono: What is that I hear and smell? Someone I'll soon send to hell.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA leaves the front row and moves through the crowd.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bobono: It's time to see if truth they told who said Tywin Lannister sh1ts gold.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BOBONO pretends to shoot IZEMBARO with the crossbow. IZEMBARO cries out.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: You beast. You beast. You killed my wife and now you've taken your father's life.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: SHEELBA SQUARE BACKSTAGE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA enters and walks further inward. On her way through the entrance hall, she sees the prop head the performers use for NED's execution scene.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro (O.C.): No worse child ever stained this land.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: SHEELBA SQUARE STAGE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: Curse the day I named you.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (IZEMBARO groans as though dying and turns to the side. The sound guy makes a farting noise.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bobono: My greatest crime. Now I must flee.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: SHEELBA SQUARE BACKSTAGE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA walks into the actor's break room.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bobono (O.C.): Then sail across the Narrow Sea to do unto you more treachery.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA draws the curtain and stares at LADY CRANE's bottle of rum.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bobono (O.C.): Don't fear the winter.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: SHEELBA SQUARE STAGE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bobono: Fear me!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BOBONO shoots a prop arrow into the audience and laughs. The audience gasps and boos him offstage.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: SHEELBA SQUARE BACKSTAGE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro (O.C.): Thank you. Ladies and gentlemen, I give you Bianca, Clarenzo.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA retrieves a vial of from her satchel. She uncorks LADY CRANE's bottle of rum.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: SHEELBA SQUARE STAGE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (IZEMBARO, BIANCA, and CLARENZO stand center stage.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: I give you Bobono.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BOBONO enters the stage and the audience boos.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: I give you Camello.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: SHEELBA SQUARE BACKSTAGE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA pours the contents of the vial into LADY CRANE's rum bottle and corks it.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro (O.C.): And last but not least, sweet Lady Crane.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (On stage, LADY CRANE enters and bows. The crowd cheers wildly. AYRA hears the cheering. She tucks the away the vial, draws back the curtain, and exits the break room. The actors are all piling into the area. CAMELLO approaches ARYA in the entrance hallway and hands her his costume cloak.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Camello: Give this a good beating. Shake those fleas out. That's a dear.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (IZEMBARO and BIANCA enter.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro (to Bianca): That crowd was sh1t.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA walks past them and puts down the cloak. She moves to leave. LADY CRANE enters and sees her.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: Girl.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA stops on the steps and looks at LADY CRANE.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: What are you doing back here?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: Nothing.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: I saw you the other day in the audience. How many times have you seen this stupid play?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: Three times.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: Did you pay?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA smiles.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: No.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA walks off the steps to get out of the way of the prop men.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: I remember when the players came to my village. I didn't have any money, so I snuck in. Just like you. Saw the painted faces, the costumes, listened to the songs, cried when the young lovers died in each other's arms. I ran off and joined them the next day, never looked back.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: You're very good.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: My final speech is sh1t.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (LADY CRANE takes ARYA by the waist and ushers her towards the break room.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: But to be fair to myself, which I always like to be, the writing's no good.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (They stop in a side corridor.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: So change it. It would all just be farting, belching, and slapping without you.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: How would you change it?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: The queen loves her son more than anything. And he was taken from her before she could say good-bye. She wouldn't just cry. She would be angry. She would want to kill the person who did this to her.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: What's your name?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: Mercy.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: You have very expressive eyes, Mercy.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA smiles.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: Wonderful eyebrows. Do you like pretending to be other people?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: I have to go. My father's waiting for me.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA exits. LADY CRANE enter the break room. BIANCA takes off her wig and notices LADY CRANE.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bianca: Lady Crane, they loved you.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (LADY CRANE removes her wig.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: They were sweet. Or drunk. Drunkenly sweet.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: No laugh for Ned's death. These people are worse than animals.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (IZEMBARO sips from a mug and gestures to LADY CRANE.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: But they loved her. They all love her.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (CAMELLO removes his wig and approaches LADY CRANE.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Camello: Yes, you are adored by people and animals alike.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: I do what I can with what I'm given.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: With what you're given?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: Well, I was thinking--
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: Oh, we're all thinkers now, are we?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (IZEMBARO stands, slaps his chest, and walks closer to LADY CRANE.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: Full to the tits with ideas.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lady Crane: I didn't mean--
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: You have ideas, I have ideas, he has ideas. Why should my ideas have any more value than yours simply because I've been doing this my whole life? Who is anyone to judge my work? This is my profession. I know what I'm doing.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (IZEMBARO removes his wig.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Izembaro: You have no right to an opinion.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (LADY CRANE brings a glass of rum to her lips. Just before she drinks, ARYA appears and slaps the glass out of her hands. Everyone in the room stares at ARYA. ARYA points at BIANCA.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Arya: Careful of that one. She wants you dead.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA exits. The WAIF is revealed to have been watching.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: HOUSE OF BLACK AND WHITE - OUTSIDE ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA pulls the stones away from where she hid Needle. She pulls Needle from inside the rocks and stares at it.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: HOUSE OF BLACK AND WHITE - WASHING CHAMBER ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (JAQEN is cutting the face of a corpse. The WAIF enters.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaqen: And?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Waif: As I expected.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaqen: A shame. A girl had many gifts.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (JAQEN begins lifting the face off of the corpse.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Waif: You promised me.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaqen: Don't let her suffer.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The WAIF nods and exits. JAQEN pulls the face from the corpse.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: UNKNOWN ALLEY ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (ARYA sets down a lit candle and brandishes Needle. She places Needle on the ground, sits down beside it, and blows out the candle.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ EXT. KING'S LANDING ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (JAIME is wearing armor and sitting atop a horse. He watches as MACE TYRELL, also wearing armor, leads a force of many soldiers down the street. MACE stops in front of JAIME and the soldiers halt.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Mace: My lord.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: My lord.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MACE turns his horse to face the soldiers.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Mace: My friends, the hour has come. Madness has overtaken this city and grasped in its claws my children. But now we must drive it back under the rocks whence it came. Madness has had its day!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MACE turns his horse back the other way and nods at JAIME. JAIME nods back.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Captain: Forward, march!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - STEPS ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The HIGH SPARROW is standing on the steps beside MARGAERY and SEPTA UNELLA.. They are surrounded by Faith Militant, including LANCEL. The HIGH SPARROW is addressing a large gathering of commoners who stand at the foot of the steps.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: Rich or poor, noble or common, if we win, we must atone. Margaery of House Tyrell came to us a sinner. She stood before the gods in the holy sept and lied. She turned a blind eye to her brother's sins. She disgraces her house, the king, and herself.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The crowd murmurs and parts. JAIME and MACE enter, leading the soldiers. MARGAERY gasps to herself. On the side, a smaller group of soldiers sets down a carriage. OLENNA steps out of the carriage.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Captain: Company, halt! Face front! Turn!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The soldiers form up and turn to face the steps.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: Lord Tyrell.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MACE nods at the HIGH SPARROW.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: Ser Jaime.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: Sorry to interrupt. We're here for Queen Margaery and Ser Loras Tyrell. Give them to us and we'll be on our way.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: I don't have the authority to give them to you. And you don't have the authority to take them.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The crowd murmurs. JAIME ushers his horse forward and rides it up the steps. He halts in front of the Faith Militant.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Captain: Lock spears!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The soldiers grunt and point their spears towards the Faith Militant.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: I speak for King Tommen of House Baratheon, First of His Name.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: The gods don't recognize his authority in this matter.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: You already insulted one great house. It won't happen twice. Every last sparrow will die before Margaery walks down that street.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: To die in the service of the gods would please each and every one of us. We yearn for it. But there is no call for it today. There will be no walk of atonement.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The crowd murmurs. OLENNA motions to MACE with her fan. MACE motions to one of the high ranking soldiers, who nods to the Captain.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Captain: Order up!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The soldiers return to a relaxed position.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: Queen Margaery has already atoned for her sins by bringing another into the true light of the Seven.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The doors to the Great Sept of Baelor open. TOMMEN emerges, accompanied by the Kingsguard. The crowd murmurs. JAIME looks back at OLENNA, who looks down. TOMMEN and the Kingsguard walk down the steps until TOMMEN stands beside MARGAERY. TOMMEN takes MARGAERY's hand.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: High Sparrow: Together we announce a new age of harmony. A holy alliance between the Crown and the Faith.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The crowd cheers.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Woman: Long live King Tommen and bless you, Queen Margaery!
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (TOMMEN looks at JAIME. JAIME shakes his head. TOMMEN looks at the crowd.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: The crown and the faith are the twin pillars upon which the world rests. Together we will restore the Seven Kingdoms to glory.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The crowd cheers.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Mace (to Olenna): What's happening?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Olenna: He's beaten us. That's what's happening.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The HIGH SPARROW smiles at JAIME.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CUT TO: RED KEEP - THRONE ROOM ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The room is lined with soldiers on either side. TOMMEN is sitting on the throne. KEVAN stands beside him. JAIME stands at the foot of the throne and removes his armor, letting it drop to the floor.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: When you attack the Faith, you attack the Crown. Anyone who attacks the Crown is unfit to serve as Lord Commander of the Kingsguard.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: I've been a member of the Kingsguard since before you were born. You don't have to do this. You don't have to do anything.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: I have to answer to the gods.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: Not when you're sitting in that chair.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: The Crown's decision on this matter is final.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: Will I be walking naked in the streets? Or will I spend a few months in the sept dungeons first to teach me about the gods' mercy?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (TOMMEN and KEVAN look at each other.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Tommen: You have served your house and your king faithfully for many years. And you will continue to do so. But not in this city.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ THE CROSSING - DINING HALL ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (WALDER FREY is sitting in a high chair addressing two of his sons, BLACK WALDER and LOTHAR. One of his young daughter stands beside him. Many other family members sit at the tables, eating.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: You've lost it?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Black Walder: Yes, father.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: It's a castle, not a bloody sheep. Presumably you still know where it is. You didn't lose Riverrun. You let the Blackfish take it from you.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lothar: He surprised us. He knows the castle better than anyone.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: You did lose the Blackfish after the Red Wedding. You had him right here in this hall and you let him leave. Then when I told you to hunt him down and kill him, you couldn't find him. That's what it means to lose something. Now he's come back and taken Riverrun.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Black Walder: I don't think it's fair to blame us--
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: For 300 years we kissed Tully boots, swore oaths to them and their stinking fish banners. Not again. Riverrun is ours. Take it back.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Black Walder: We don't have the men.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: We've got 10 times as many men as the damn Blackfish.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Black Walder: The Mallisters have risen against us. And the Blackwoods.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lothar: The Brotherhood Without Banners is rallying the commoners against us, raiding our supply trains and camps.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Black Walder: Riverrun can withstand a siege for a year.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (WALDER slaps his daughter on on the buttocks.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: If I want excuses, I'll put her in charge. They're laughing at us. All across the Riverlands right down to King's Landing, they're laughing at us.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (WALDER stands. Many family members stare at him.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: I hear it in my sleep! I'm not dead yet, unfortunately for you. And I'll not leave this world until they all choke on that laughter. Take that castle back.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Lothar: He'll never yield, Father.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: Oh, he'll yield.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (WALDER nods at some servants at the rear of the hall. LOTHAR looks back at the servants. The servants exit. WALDER points first at LOTHAR and then at BLACK WALDER.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: You'll show him the knife you used to kill Robb Stark's child in his whore mother's belly, and you'll show him the knife you used to open his niece's throat. And you'll remind him who it was that got married at the Red Wedding in the first place. His nephew.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (WALDER pulls his daughter into his lap. The servants return, ushering in a man bound in chains. They undo his chains. The man is EDMURE TULLY. EDMURE stares at WALDER.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Walder: Cheer up, Lord Edmure. You're going home.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ INT. RED KEEP - CERSEI'S CHAMBER ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (JAIME and CERSEI are sitting in chairs across the room from each other.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: I'm being sent to deal with the Blackfish. Apparently Walder Frey can't manage it on his own because he's 400 years old. Sent me with an army to the Riverlands and a siege that could last months.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (JAIME stands and paces.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Cersei: BEtter you're elsewhere at the head of an army than in the sept dungeons.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: I'm not going to the Riverlands.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (JAIME pours himself a cup of wine.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Cersei: What, then?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: I'm going to give Bronn the largest bag of gold anyone's ever seen and have him gather the best killers he knows. I'll take them to the sept and I'll remove the High Sparrow's head and every other sparrow head I can find.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Cersei: You can't.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: He has our son! He stole our son! He's torn our family apart. How should we treat people who tear us apart?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Cersei: We should treat them without mercy and we will. But if you kill the High Sparrow, you won't leave the sept alive. And without you, this is all for nothing. Stand at the head of our army where you belong, where Father wanted you. Show our men where their loyalties belong. Show them what lannisters are, what we do to our enemies. And take that stupid little castle back because it's ours and because you can.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Jaime: You'll stand trial soon. I need to he here for you.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Cersei: It will be a trial by combat. I have the Mountain. They've made us both stronger, all of them.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (CERSEI stands and approaches JAIME.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Cersei: They have no idea how strong we are. No idea what we're going to do to them.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (JAIME and CERSEI embrace and kiss. CERSEI whispers into JAIME's ear.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Cersei: We've always been together. We'll always be together. We're the only two people in the world.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (They resume kissing.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ EXT. BEYOND THE WALL ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (MEERA, BRAN, and the rider are gathered around a campfire. The rider beheads a rabbit and begins draining its blood. MEERA watches him.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Meera: Why did you help us?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The rider looks at MEERA from behind his face mask.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Rider: The Three-Eyed Raven sent for me.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Meera: The Three-Eyed Raven's dead.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Rider: Now he lives again.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BRAN startles as he comes out of a vision. MEERA goes to him.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Rider (to Bran): When I last saw you, you were a boy. A fearless boy. Loved to climb the castle walls, frighten his mother.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bran: Who are you?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The rider removes his hood and face mask. He is BENJEN STARK. His skin is gray and he has blemishes on his face.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bran: Uncle Benjen. The last letter Jon wrote me said you had been lost beyond the Wall.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Benjen: I led a ranging party deep into the North to find White Walkers. They found us. A white walker stabbed me in the gut with a sword of ice. Left me there to die. To turn. The Children found me. Stopped the walker's magic from taking hold.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bran: How?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Benjen: The same way they made the Walkers in the first place. You saw it yourself.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bran: Dragonglass. A shard of dragonglass plunged into your heart.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Benjen: You are the Three-Eyed Raven now.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Bran: I didn't have time to learn. I can't control anything.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BENJEN stands and walks over to BRAN and MEERA.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Benjen: You must learn to control it before the Night King comes.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BENJEN kneels beside BRAN and offers him a cup.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Benjen: Drink.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (BRAN takes the cup and drinks.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Benjen: One way or another, he will find his way to the world of men. When he does, you will be there waiting for him. And you will be ready.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ EXT. ESSOS ARID LANDS ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (DAENERYS and DAARIO are leading the Dothraki horde on horseback. DAARIO shouts in Dothraki and raises his hand, halting the horde. DAENERYS stares at the face of a mountain crag in the distance.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daario: Everything all right?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: How many days' ride to Meereen?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daario: A week at best.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: How many ships will I need to bring my khalasar to Westeros?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daario: Dothraki and all their horses, the Unsullied, the Second Sons-- 1,000 ships easily. Probably more.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: And who has that many?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daario: Nobody.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: Nobody yet.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daario: So we ride for Meereen and after that we sail for Westeros. What then?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: I take what is mine.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daario: You weren't made to sit on a chair in a palance.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: What was I made for?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daario: You're a conqueror, Daenerys Stormborn.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The wind howls. DAENERYS stares beyond the mountain crag)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: Wait here.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (DAENERYS rides away from the horde and around the bend. Time passes. The Dothraki are growing antsy.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daario (speaking Dothraki): I'm going after her. Wait for me here.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (DAARIO starts off, but stops when a dragon's roar erupts from the sky. The Dothraki look around. The shadow of a dragon appears on the mountainside. DROGON flies over the Dothraki horde with DAENERYS on its back. DROGON circles around and lands in front of the horde. He roars.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys (speaking Dothraki): Every khal who ever lived chose three blood riders to fight beside him and guard his way. But I am not a khal. I will not choose three blood riders. I choose you all.
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The Dothraki cheer.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys (speaking Dothraki): I will ask more of you than any khal has ever asked of his khalassar! Will you ride the wooden horses across the black salt sea?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The Dothraki cheer.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: Will you kill my enemies in their iron suits and tear down their stone houses?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The Dothraki cheer.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: Will you give me the Seven Kingdoms, the gift Khal Drogo promised me before the Mother of Mountains?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The Dothraki cheer.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: Are you with me?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (The Dothraki continue to cheer.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: Daenerys: Now and always?
name: Blood of My Blood

text: (DROGON spreads his wings and roars.)
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ CREDITS ]
name: Blood of My Blood

text: [ EXT. RIVERLANDS - BROTHER RAY'S ENCAMPMENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (Many men are performing various tasks pertaining to the construction of a church. Many women are preparing food.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Man: That's it. Get it to the top.
name: The Broken Man

text: Man #2: Steady. Steady.
name: The Broken Man

text: (BROTHER RAY is standing beneath the framing, addressing two men who are hoisting up a log.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Up she goes.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY turns to another man and slaps him on the back.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Hey, come on. Put your back into it, huh?
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY walks a few paces away, grabs an ax, and lifts it up to a man standing on the church framing.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Here you are, son.
name: The Broken Man

text: (The man standing on the framing takes the ax. RAY turns to see two men carrying a log into the opening beneath the framing. He waves them in.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Oh, gentlemen, please.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY walks out from beneath the framing and addresses more men carrying logs.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: And you lot, come on. Come on, get it moving. Come on, come on.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY hurries beneath one of the logs and laughs. He turns and looks up at the church framing, smiles, and nods. In a field a little ways off, more men are carrying larger logs towards the church framing. Four men carry each log. A man carrying one of these heavy logs by himself comes into view. He drops the log in front of the church framing and pants, then turns to look out over the landscape. The man is SANDOR CLEGANE, The Hound.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ TITLE SEQUENCE ]
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. RIVERLANDS - BROTHER RAY'S ENCAMPMENT OUTSKIRTS ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR repeatedly swings an ax into a horizontal log. Woods chips fly everywhere. RAY walks up behind SANDOR.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: In all my days I've never seen a man swing an ax like that. How many men did it take to cut you down?
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: Just one.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Ooh. he must have been some kind of monster.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR sinks the ax into the log.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: He was a woman.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY laughs. SANDOR continues chopping. RAY walks away.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: BROTHER RAY'S ENCAMPMENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (A man standing beneath the church framing rings a bell. All of the men rush down off the church framing and father at the food stations. The women divvy out food. RAY pours a cup of water and walks among the people. They are all sitting down on the ground and eating. SANDOR is sitting on a rock away from everyone else, eating. RAY approaches him from behind and hands him the cup of water. SANDOR takes it.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: I think some of the men are a bit afraid of you.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: I'm used to it.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR drinks the entire cup of water.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: When I found you, I thought you'd been dead for days. The way you were stinking already and you had bugs all over you and bone was coming through right there.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY sits down next to SANDOR and points at SANDOR's right knee.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: I was gonna give you a proper burial and then you coughed. Oh, nearly sh1t myself. I reckoned you were gonna die by the time I loaded you on the wagon, but you didn't. Now, I reckoned you'd die a dozen more times over the next few days, but you didn't. What kept you going?
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR pauses and stares ahead.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: Hate.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR continues eating.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: No, there's a reason you're still here.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: Aye, there's a reason. I'm a big fucker and I'm tough to kill.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: No, a reason. Gods aren't done with you yet.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR smiles. RAY stands and walks a few paces away from SANDOR, then turns to face him.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: I've heard that before. Man was talking about a different god, though.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Well, maybe he was right. I don't know much about the gods.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: You're in the wrong line of work.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Oh, there's plenty of pious sons of bitches who think they know the word of god or gods. I don't. I don't even know their real names. Maybe it is the Seven. Or maybe it's the old gods. Or maybe it's the Lord of Light. Or maybe they're all the same f*cking thing. I don't know. What matters, I believe, is that there's something greater than us. And whatever it is, it's got plans for Sandor Clegane.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR stops eating and stares up at RAY. RAY nods at him.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: You didn't know me back in my time. You don't know the things I've done.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: I've heard stories.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: If the gods are real...why haven't they punished me?
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: They have.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY walks away. SANDOR stares out across the fields.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ INT. GREAT SEPT OF BAELOR - PRAYER ROOM ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (MARGAERY is reading from the Book of the Seven. She is wearing a crown. The HIGH SPARROW enters.)
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: Your Grace. What are we reading today?
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: The Book of the Mother, Your Holiness. Chapter three, verse 12.
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: Ah, "As water rounds the stones, smoothing--"
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: "Smoothing what was jagged, so does a woman's love calm a man's brute nature. A wife salves her husband's wounds, a mother sings her son to sleep."
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: You learn quickly. There are some who know every verse of the sacred text, but don't have a drop of the Mother's mercy in their blood and savages who can't read at all who understand the Father's wisdom.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: For year I pretended to love the poor, the afflicted. I had pity for them, but I never loved them. They disgusted me.
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: They are hard to love.
name: The Broken Man

text: (The HIGH SPARROW sits down on a bench.)
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: The poor disgust us because they are us, shorn of our illusions. They show us what we'd look like without our fine clothes. How'd we smell without perfume.
name: The Broken Man

text: (The HIGH SPARROW sighs.)
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: Can I ask you about a personal matter?
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Of course.
name: The Broken Man

text: (MARGAERY sits on the bench beside the HIGH SPARROW.)
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: The king mentioned that since your reunion, you haven't joined him in the marriage bed.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: No.
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: You have a duty, Your Grace. To your husband, your king, your country, to the gods themselves.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: It's just...the desires that once drove me no longer do.
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: Congress does not require desire on the woman's part, only patience. The king must have an heir if we are to continue our good work.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Forgive me. Sometimes the truth path is hard to find.
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: Hard to find and harder still to walk upon. But you've made great progress. I only pray your grandmother follows your lead.
name: The Broken Man

text: (The HIGH SPARROW stands.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: My grandmother?
name: The Broken Man

text: High Sparrow: Yes. The Queen of Thorns is a remarkable woman, a strong woman, and an unrepentant sinner. You must teach her the new way as she taught you the old. Or I fear for her safety, body and soul.
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: RED KEEP - OLENNA'S CHAMBER ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (MARGAERY and OLENNA are sitting at a table. SEPTA UNELLA stands several feet away, watching them.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: Does it move or talk? I want to speak with you alone.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Septa Unella has been my true friend and counselor.
name: The Broken Man

text: (OLENNA stands.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: Oh, this is madness!
name: The Broken Man

text: (OLENNA takes MARGAERY's hand and leads her out onto the balcony to a different table. SEPTA UNELLA follows them out. MARGAERY sits at the table.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna (to Septa Unella): You're not in your sanctuary now, my dear. All I have to do is whistle and my men will stroll in here and bash you about...
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Grandmother.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: ...until I tell them to stop. If I tell them to stop. You could use a good bashing.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Grandmother, please.
name: The Broken Man

text: (OLENNA sits across from MARGAERY.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: What have they done to you?
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: You marched against the High Sparrow, against the Faith.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: We marched for you.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: The gods could have punished you and Father, but they didn't. They showed mercy.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: And what about your brother? What mercy did they show him?
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Loras's only hope is to confess his crimes and repent. If he does, the Faith will allow him to return to Highgarden. He'll have to renounce his name and title...
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: Have you lost your mind?
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: ...and live his life as a penitent.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: He is the heir to Highgarden, the future of House Tyrell.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: He can begin again.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: As a mindless fanatic.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: As a free man.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: You will leave for Highgarden today. There is no law that says you must stay here.
name: The Broken Man

text: (MARGAERY stands.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: I am the queen. It is my duty to serve my husband the king.
name: The Broken Man

text: (MARGAERY walks around the table and kneels before OLENNA. Her back is to SEPTA UNELLA.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: But you should leave, Grandmother. Your place is at home.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: I will never leave you. Never.
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: You must.
name: The Broken Man

text: (MARGAERY slips a piece of paper into OLENNA's hand. MARGAERY's eyes widen.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Go home. Find comfort in prayer and good works.
name: The Broken Man

text: (MARGAERY stands.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: The Mother watches over us all.
name: The Broken Man

text: (OLENNA stands.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: I'll see you soon, my dear.
name: The Broken Man

text: (MARGAERY and OLENNA embrace. MARGAERY closes her eyes and then steps back.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Seven blessings to you, Grandmother.
name: The Broken Man

text: (OLENNA nods and walks back into her chamber. MARGAERY stifles tears. She regains her composure and turns to face SEPTA UNELLA.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Margaery: Shall we pray?
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: RED KEEP - OLENNA'S CHAMBER INNER BALCONY ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (OLENNA walks out onto the balcony and shuts the door behind her. She looks around and then unfolds the piece of paper MARGAERY placed in her hand and looks at it. There is a drawing of a rose on it. OLENNA looks up and smiles.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. SOUTH OF THE WALL - WILDLING ENCAMPMENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW, SANSA, DAVOS, TORMUND, and WUN WUN are meeting with DIM DALBA and the other Wildling leaders. They are all gathered around a fire pit.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Dim Dalba: We said we'd fight with you, King Crow, when the time comes and we meant it, but this isn't what we agreed to. These aren't White Walkers. This isn't an army of the dead. This isn't our find.
name: The Broken Man

text: Tormund: If it weren't for him, none of us would be here. All of you would be meat in the Night King's army. And I'd be a pile of charred bones just like Mance.
name: The Broken Man

text: Dim Dalba: Remember Mance's camp? It stretched all the way to the horizon. And look at us now. Look what's left of us. And if we lose this, we're gone. Dozens of tribes, hundreds of generations. Be like we were never there at all. We'll be the last of the free folk.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: That's what'll happen to you if we lose. The Boltons, the Karstarks, the Umbers, they know you're here. They know that more than half of you are women and children. After they finish with me, they'll come for you. You're right. This isn't your fight. You shouldn't have to come to Winterfell with me. I shouldn't be asking you. It's not the deal we made. I need you with me if we're gonna beat them, and we need to beat them if you're going to survive.
name: The Broken Man

text: (TORMUND gestures to JON SNOW.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Tormund: The crows killed him because he spoke for the free folk when no other southerners would. He died for us. If we are not willing to do the same for him, we're cowards. And if that's what we are, we deserve to be the last of the free folk.
name: The Broken Man

text: (WUN WUN stands.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Wun Wun: Snow.
name: The Broken Man

text: (WUN WUN walks away. DIM DALBA looks at the men around him. One of them nods. DIM DALBA walks up to JON SNOW and holds out his hand. JON takes it. DIM DALBA returns to his men.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow (to Tormund): Are you sure they'll come?
name: The Broken Man

text: Tormund: We're not clever like you southerners. When we say we'll do something, we do it.
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW exhales.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ INT. RED KEEP - OLENNA'S CHAMBER ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (OLENNA is sitting at a table, writing. CERSEI enters with GREGOR in tow.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Cersei: I heard you were leaving King's Landing.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: That is hardly your concern.
name: The Broken Man

text: Cersei: Your grandson is still a prisoner. You'll leave him rotting in a cell?
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: Loras rots in a cell because of you. THe High Sparrow rules this city because of you. Our two ancient houses face collapse because of you and your stupidity.
name: The Broken Man

text: Cersei: You're right. I made a terrible mistake. I carry it with me every single day.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: Good.
name: The Broken Man

text: Cersei: I delivered an army of fanatics onto our doorstep. And now we must fight them together. We need each other.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: I wonder if you're the worst person I've ever met. At a certain age, it's hard to recall. But the truly vile do stand out through the years. Do you remember the way you smirked at me when my grandson and granddaughter were dragged off to their cells? I do. I'll never forget it.
name: The Broken Man

text: Cersei: You love your granddaughter. I love my son. It's the only truth I know. We must defend them.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: I'm leaving this wretched city as fast as I can before that shoeless zealot throws me into one of his cells. If you're half as bright as you think you are, you'll find your way out of here, too.
name: The Broken Man

text: Cersei: Never. I'll never leave my son.
name: The Broken Man

text: Olenna: What'll you do, then? You have no support. Not anymore. Your brother's gone. The High Sparrow saw to that. The rest of your family have abandoned you. The people despise you. You're surrounded by enemies, thousands of them. You're going to kill them all by yourself? You've lost, Cersei. It's the only joy I can find in all this misery.
name: The Broken Man

text: (OLENNA goes back to writing.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. RIVERRUN - OUTSKIRTS ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (A Lannister army approaches Riverrun led by JAIME and BRONN. JAIME and BRONN stop their horses on a hill and look out at the encampment of Freys at the foot of Riverrun.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Man: Pick the pace up. Keep going.
name: The Broken Man

text: Man #2: Keep it moving!
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: Now, that is a sorry attempt at a siege. Someone needs to teach those sad twats how to dig trenches.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: Someone certainly does.
name: The Broken Man

text: (JAIME looks at BRONN.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: Oh, no. Not me. I'm just an upjumped sellsword.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: You're an anointed knight. There's quite a difference.
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: Aye, knights don't get paid.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: You have better instincts than any officer in the Lannister army.
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: That's like saying I have a bigger cock than anyone in the Unsullied army.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: I expect to command all the Lannister forces before long. You can be the right hand I lost.
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: You promised me a lordship and a castle and a highborn beauty for a wife.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: And you'll get all three. A Lannister always--
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: Don't say it. Don't f*cking say it.
name: The Broken Man

text: (BRONN ushers his horse onwards.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: RIVERRUN - FREY ENCAMPMENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (JAIME and BRONN lead a group of Lannister soldiers through the encampment. Some Frey men gather around and stare at them. LOTHAR is standing at the foot of Riverrun, shouting up at the castle walls. BLACK WALDER is behind him, standing on a makeshift hangman's platform. EDMURE is also on the platform with a noose around his neck. JAIME and BRONN watch them.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Lothar: Come out and fight us, Blackfish. Yield the castle or we'll hang him.
name: The Broken Man

text: (BRYNDEN TULLY, the Blackfish, walks along Riverrun's castle wall and comes to a stop in front of an arrowslit. He stares out at LOTHAR, BLACK WALDER, and EDMURE.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Lothar: This is your last warning. Yield the castle.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LOTHAR looks back at BLACK WALDER. BLACK WALDER takes the noose off of EDMURE's neck and draws a knife.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Black Walder: You think I won't do it, old man?
name: The Broken Man

text: (BLACK WALDER holds the knife to EDMURE's neck.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Black Walder: I sliced your niece's throat from ear to ear. And where were you? Running and hiding like a f*cking coward. Yield the castle or I cut his throat.
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Go on, then. Cut his throat.
name: The Broken Man

text: (BRYNDEN walks away. LOTHAR looks at BLACK WALDER and shrugs. BLACK WALDER takes the knife away from EDMURE's neck. Some Frey men take EDMURE away. JAIME, BRONN, and the Lannister army advance towards LOTHAR and BLACK WALDER, and stop in front of them.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: Lothar, is it?
name: The Broken Man

text: Lothar: Ser Jaime. We didn't know you were coming.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: ‘Cause you didn't set up a proper perimeter. You just allowed 8,000 men to approach unchallenged.
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: Good thing we're friends or we'd be f*cking you in the ass right now.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: Have Lord Edmure bathed and fed.
name: The Broken Man

text: (BLACK WALDER waves at the Frey men escorting EDMURE.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Black Walder: Whoa, whoa.
name: The Broken Man

text: (The Frey men stop walking. BLACK WALDER approaches JAIME.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Lothar: Walder.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LOTHAR puts his hand out to stop BLACK WALDER, but BLACK WALDER pushes him away. BLACK WALDER walks up to JAIME.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Black Walder: Edmure is a prisoner of House Frey.
name: The Broken Man

text: (JAIME looks BLACK WALDER up and down.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: Only a fool makes threats he's not prepared to carry out. Now let's say I threatened to hit you unless you shut your mouth, but you kept talking. What do you think I'd do?
name: The Broken Man

text: Black Walder: I don't give a rat's--
name: The Broken Man

text: (JAIME hits BLACK WALDER across the face with his gold hand. BLACK WALDER staggers back beside LOTHAR.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: I'm here by the king's command to take back this castle. Have him bathed and fed. Unless you'd like to take his place.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lothar: Apologies, Ser Jaime.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LOTHAR waves at the Frey men escorting EDMURE.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Lothar: Do as he says.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: The siege is now under my command. The next time the Blackfish looks out from those ramparts, he'll see an army at his gates, not whatever this is.
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: Have your lads start digging perimeter trenches. Set pickets every hundred yards. And work double-time on those siege towers and trebuchets.
name: The Broken Man

text: Black Walder: Those are our siege towers--
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: As I said, the siege is under my command. If that's not to your liking, go home.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LOTHAR and BLACK WALDER walk away. BRONN walks up behind JAIME.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: Get word to the Blackfish. I want a parley.
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: A parley or a fight?
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: He's an old man.
name: The Broken Man

text: Bronn: You've got one hand. My money's on the old boy.
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. BEAR ISLAND ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (The castle of House Mormont sits atop a high hill. Waterfalls pour out below. A bird screeches.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: BEAR ISLAND - CASTLE AUDIENCE CHAMBER ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (LYANNA MORMONT sits at a high table flanked by a commander and a maester. JON SNOW, SANSA, and DAVOS enter. Some guards close the doors behind them.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Lady Mormont.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: Welcome to Bear Island.
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW looks at SANSA.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: I remember when you were born, my lady. You were named for my Aunt Lyanna. It was said she was a great beauty. I'm sure you will be, too.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: I doubt it. My mother wasn't a great beauty or any other kind of beauty. She was a great warrior, though. She died fighting for your brother, Robb.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: I served under your uncle at Castle Black, Lady Lyanna. He was also a great warrior and an honorable man. I was his steward. In fact--
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: I think we've had enough small talk. What are you here?
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Stannis Baratheon garrisoned at Castle Black before he marched on Winterfell and was killed. He showed me the letter you wrote to him when he petitioned for men. It said--
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: I remember what it said. "Bear Island knows no king but the King in the North whose name is Stark."
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Robb is gone, but House Stark is not. And it needs your support now more than ever. I've come with my sister to ask for House Mormont's allegiance.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LYANNA leans towards her maester. They whisper to each other. LYANNA turns back to face JON SNOW.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: As far as I understand, you're a Snow and Lady Sansa is a Bolton. Or is she a Lannister? I've heard conflicting reports.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: I did what I had to do to survive, my lady. But I am a Stark. I will always be a Stark.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: If you say so. In any case, you don't just want my allegiance. You want my fighting men.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Ramsay Bolton cannot be allowed to keep Winterfell, my lady. It is our duty to stop him. Even more so because he holds our brother Rickon Stark as prisoner. What you have to understand, my lady, is that--
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: I understand that I'm responsible for Bear Island and all who live here. So why should I sacrifice one more Mormont life for someone else's war?
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW and SANSA fall silent. DAVOS steps forward.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: If it please, my lady, I understand how you feel.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: I don't know you, Ser...?
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: Davos, my lady, of House Seaworth.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LYANNA turns to her maester.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: You needn't ask your maester about my house. It's rather new.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LYANNA settles back into her chair.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: All right, Ser Davos of House Seaworth. How is it you understand how I feel?
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: You never thought you'd find yourself in your position. Being responsible for so many lives at such a young age. I never thought I'd be in my position. I was a crabber's son, then I was a smuggler. And now I found myself addressing the lady of a great house in time of war. But I'm here because this isn't someone else's war. It's our war.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: Go on, Ser Davos.
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: Your uncle, Lord Commander Mormont, made that man his steward. He chose Jon to be his successor because he knew had the courage to do what was right, even if it meant giving his life. Because Jeor Mormont and Jon Snow both understood that the real war isn't between a few squabbling houses. It's between the living and the dead. And make no mistake, my lady, the dead are coming.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: Is this true?
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW nods.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Your uncle fought them at the Fist of the First Men. I fought them at Hardhome. We both lost.
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: As long as the Boltons hold Winterfell, the North is divided. And a divided North won't stand a chance against the Night King. You want to protect your people, my lady. I understand. But there's no hiding from this. We have to fight and we need to do it together.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LYANNA's maester leans over to whisper in her ear, but she waves him away.)
name: The Broken Man
