text: Lyanna: House Mormont has kept faith with House Stark for 1,000 years. We will not break faith today.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Thank you, my lady. How many fighting men can we expect?
name: The Broken Man

text: (LYANNA leans to her military commander and they whisper to each other.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: 62.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: 62?
name: The Broken Man

text: Lyanna: We are not a large house, but we're a proud one. And every man from Bear Island fights with the strength of 10 mainlanders.
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: If they're half as ferocious as their lady, the Boltons are doomed.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LYANNA smiles and nods.)
name: The Broken Man

text:
ad=document.getElementById("chitika-ads-1"),ad.getBoundingClientRect().width?adWidth=ad.getBoundingClientRect().width:adWidth=ad.offsetWidth,function(){if(void 0===window.CHITIKA&&(window.CHITIKA={units:[]}),adWidth>=550)var t={publisher:"andjoh",width:550,height:250,sid:"In-Post",color_site_link:"E7CE64",color_text:"ffffff",color_bg:"000033",color_button:"E7CE64",color_button_text:"000033"};else var t={publisher:"andjoh",width:300,height:250,sid:"In-Post",color_site_link:"E7CE64",color_text:"ffffff",color_bg:"000033",color_button:"E7CE64",color_button_text:"000033"};var i=window.CHITIKA.units.length;window.CHITIKA.units.push(t),document.write('
');var e=document.createElement("script");e.type="text/javascript",e.src="//cdn.chitika.net/getads.js";try{document.getElementsByTagName("head")[0].appendChild(e)}catch(o){document.write(e.outerHTML)}}();
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. RIVERRUN - LANNISTER ENCAMPMENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (JAIME is on horseback, galloping through the encampment. He is accompanied by a bannerman and a regiment of foot soldiers. When he reaches the bridge leading to Riverrun's castle, he dismounts his horse and walks across it. He stands at the foot of the bridge and stares down into the water. Above, several Tully soldiers notch their crossbows and point them at him through arrowslits. The drawbridge lowers. BRYNDEN stands on the other side, accompanied by a regiment of Tully soldiers. BRYNDEN walks out across the drawbridge alone and approaches JAIME.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Kingslayer.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: Blackfish.
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: I assume you're here to fulfill the vow you gave my niece. I don't see Sansa and Arya.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: I don't have them.
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Pity. Do you wish to resume your captivity?
name: The Broken Man

text: (JAIME shakes his head.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Then why are you here?
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: You know why I'm here. This castle belongs to House Frey. You're trespassing. In the name of King Tommen, I order you to surrender or--
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Or you'll kill Edmure?
name: The Broken Man

text: (BRYNDEN walks past JAIME.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: My nephew's marked for death no matter what. Hang him and be done with it.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: It won't stop with Edmure. You'll force me to storm the castle. Hundreds will die.
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Hundreds of mine. Thousands of yours. If you can breach the walls.
name: The Broken Man

text: (JAIME positions himself beside BRYNDEN.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: We'll breach them and kill every last one of you. But if you surrender, I'll spare the lives of your men. On my honor.
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Your honor? Bargaining with oathbreakers is like building on quicksand.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: The war is over, ser. Why sacrifice living men to a lost cause?
name: The Broken Man

text: (BRYNDEN turns to face JAIME and walks close to him.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: As long as I'm standing, the war is not over. This is my home. I was born in this castle and I'm ready to die in it. So you can either attack or try to starve us out. We have enough provisions for two years. Do you have two years, Kingslayer?
name: The Broken Man

text: (BRYNDEN walks past JAIME and continues back across the drawbridge.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: You clearly have no intention of saving your men's lives. Why did you come to treat with me?
name: The Broken Man

text: (BRYNDEN turns back to face JAIME.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Sieges are dull. And I wanted to see you in person, get the measure of you.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jaime: Well, now you have.
name: The Broken Man

text: Brynden: Aye, now I have. I'm disappointed.
name: The Broken Man

text: (BRYNDEN turns around and walks back inside the castle. The drawbridge begins to close. JAIME scrunches up his face, turns around, and walks back across the bridge.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. DEEPWOOD MOTTE - COURTYARD ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW, SANSA, and DAVOS are meeting with ROBETT GLOVER. Several men serving under ROBETT stand in attendance.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: The answer is no.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Lord Glover, if you could just hear us out.
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: I've heard enough. We've only just taken back this castle from the Ironborn. The Boltons helped us do it. Now you want me to fight against them? I could be skinned for even talking to you.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: The Boltons are traitors. Roose Bolton--
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: Have other northern houses pledged to fight for you?
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: House Mormont.
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: And?
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: We sent raven to Houses Manderly--
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: I don't care about ravens. You're asking me to join your army. Who is fighting in this army?
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: The bulk of the force is made up of wildlings.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ROBETT laughs.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: Then the rumors are true. I didn't dare believe them. I received you out of respect for your father. Now I would like you to leave. House Glover will not abandon its ancestral home to fight alongside wildlings.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ROBETT turns around and heads up the stairs towards a door attended by his men.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Lord Glover.
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: There's nothing else to say.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: I would remind you that House Glover is pledged to House Stark. Sworn to answer when called upon.
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW glares at SANSA. ROBETT turns on his heel and walks up close to SANSA.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: Yes, my family served House Stark for centuries. We wept when we heard of your father's death. When my brother was lord of this castle, he answered Robb's call and hailed him King in the North.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ROBETT gets closer to SANSA.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: And where was King Robb when the Ironborn attacked this castle? When they threw my wife and children in prison and brutalized and killed our subjects? Taking up with a foreign whore. Getting himself and those who followed him killed.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ROBETT looks at JON SNOW and then back at SANSA.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Robett: I served House Stark once, but House Stark is dead.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ROBETT turns, climbs the stairs to the door, and walks through it. SANSA and JON SNOW look down.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. LONG BRIDGE OF VOLANTIS - BAY ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (Many boats bearing the sigil of House Greyjoy on their sails are docked in the bay near the Long Bridge. Chatter and laughter can be heard from the Long Bridge.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: LONG BRIDGE OF VOLANTIS - BAR ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (Many Ironborn men are communing with prostitutes. THEON sits at a table alone, looking back at forth at them. YARA sits down at his table accompanied by a prostitute. She and the prostitute kiss at length. THEON does not look at them.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Theon: Why did we have to come here?
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Some of us still like it. Have a drink at least.
name: The Broken Man

text: Theon: I don't want one.
name: The Broken Man

text: (YARA sighs and turns back to the prostitute..)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Don't go far, love.
name: The Broken Man

text: (YARA kisses the prostitutes breast.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: I'll find you in a bit.
name: The Broken Man

text: (The prostitute stands. YARA kisses her backside and then slaps it. The prostitute giggles and runs away. YARA laughs and grabs a drink.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Nothing on the Iron Islands has an ass like that. Doesn't interest you anymore?
name: The Broken Man

text: (THEON scrunches up his face.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: I'm sorry. I won't joke about it. I'll never hurt you, little brother. Don't you know that?
name: The Broken Man

text: (YARA pours herself another drink.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Theon: You think Uncle Euron's hunting for us?
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Of course he is. As long as we're alive, we're a threat.
name: The Broken Man

text: Theon: He'll find us.
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: It's a great big world and we have fast ships. Drink.
name: The Broken Man

text: Theon: I don't want any.
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: I don't care what you want. Drink.
name: The Broken Man

text: (THEON takes a small sip of his drink.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Drink it all.
name: The Broken Man

text: (THEON drinks deeper.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: You're Ironborn, Theon. I know you've had some bad years.
name: The Broken Man

text: Theon: Some bad years?
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: But I'm tired of watching you cower like a beat dog. Drink the goddamn ale.
name: The Broken Man

text: (THEON takes another deep drink.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Now listen to me. I need you. The real Theon Greyjoy, not this rat sh1t pretender. Can you find him for me? Drink.
name: The Broken Man

text: (THEON drinks more deeply..)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: You escaped, do you hear me? You got away and you're never going back. We'll get justice for you.
name: The Broken Man

text: Theon: If I got justice, my burnt body would hang over the gates of Winterfell.
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: f*ck justice, then. We'll get revenge. Drink.
name: The Broken Man

text: (THEON downs the rest of his ale. YARA moves closer to THEON.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Listen to me. If you're so broken that there's no coming back, take a knife and cut your wrists. End it. But if you're staying, Theon, I need you. We're gonna sail to Meereen. We're gonna make a pact with this Dragon Queen. And we're gonna take back the Iron Islands.
name: The Broken Man

text: (YARA places her hand on the back of THEON's neck.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Are you with me? Are you really with me?
name: The Broken Man

text: (THEON slowly raises his head up and locks eyes with YARA. He nods. YARA smiles and kisses his forehead.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Yara: Now, since it's my last night ashore for a long while, I'm gonna go f*ck the tits off this one.
name: The Broken Man

text: (YARA stands, pats THEON on the back, walks over to the prostitute she was communing with earlier, and takes her hand. THEON stares blankly to the side.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. NORTHERN WILDERNESS - STARK ENCAMPMENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW, SANSA, and DAVOS are riding horses through the encampment.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: Stannis camped here on his way to Winterfell.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: And that's a good thing?
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: He was the most experienced commander in Westeros. He chose this place for a reason. Those mountains are a natural fortification. There's a stream down there for the horses.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: We're not staying here long. Another storm could hit any day..
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: Aye, the snows defeated Stannis as much as the Boltons did.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: We have to march on Winterfell now while we still can.
name: The Broken Man

text: (They all dismount their horses and begin walking side by side.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: 2,000 Wildlings. 200 Hornwoods, 143 Mazins--
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: 62 Mormonts.
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: It's not what we'd hoped for. But we still have a chance if we're careful and smart.
name: The Broken Man

text: (DAVOS spots two men fighting.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: For f*ck's sake.
name: The Broken Man

text: (DAVOS hurries over to the men. JON SNOW and SANSA watch him go and then continue walking.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: So he's your most trusted advisor now? Because he secured 62 men from a ten year old?
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: Ser Davos is the reason I'm standing here talking to you and he served Stannis for years.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: Stannis who lost the Blackwater, who murdered his own brother, who doesn't have a head?
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANSA stops walking. JON keeps walking a few paces and then turns to face her.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: It's not enough. We need more men.
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: There's no time.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sansa: If we went down to Castle Cerwyn, I know that Lord--
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW moves close to SANSA.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Jon Snow: We fight with the army we have.
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW looks over SANSA's shoulder at DAVOS. He is standing in front of the fighting men, who are wrestling on the ground.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: Friends, this is not worth fighting over!
name: The Broken Man

text: (JON SNOW walks past SANSA and away.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: This'll be it, now. Right now, we don't need to be fighting.
name: The Broken Man

text: (One of the men gets in DAVOS' face.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Man: Who the f*ck are you?
name: The Broken Man

text: Davos: Hold on.
name: The Broken Man

text: Man #2: Yeah, who the f*ck are you?
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANSA spies the maester of Bear Island handling some crates containing ravens. He holds up one of the crates to LYANNA MORMONT.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: NORTHERN WILDERNESS - STARK ENCAMPMENT TENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANSA is writing a letter. She signs her name, pours wax, and presses the wax with the direwolf sigil of House Stark. She picks up the letter and rereads it, then stares ahead.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. RIVERLANDS - BROTHER RAY'S ENCAMPMENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (All of RAY's followers are gathered together in a circle. RAY is standing in the center, speaking to them all. SANDOR stands at the far end of the flock, behind everyone else. The church framing stands on a hill in the background.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: I was a soldier once. All my superiors thought I was brave. I wasn't. I mean, I never ran from a fight. Only because I was afraid my friends would see I was afraid. That's all I was, a coward. We followed orders no matter the orders. Burn that village. Fine, I'm your arsonist. Steal that farmer's crops. Good, I'm your thief. Kill those young lads so they won't take up arms against us. I'm your murderer. I remember once a woman screaming at us, calling us animals as we dragged her son from their hut. But we weren't animals. Animals are true to their nature and we had betrayed ours. I cut that young boy's throat myself as his mother screamed and my friends held her back.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY sits down on a stump next to one of the men and rests his arm on the man's shoulder.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: That night...I felt such shame. Shame was so heavy on me, I couldn't eat, I couldn't sleep.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR looks down.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: All I could do was stare into that dark sky and listen to that mother screaming her son's name. I'll hear her screaming the rest of my life.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY stands and walks back to the center of the circle.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Now, I know I can never bring that lad back. All I can do with time I've got left is bring a little goodness into the world. That's all any of us can do, isn't it? Never too late to stop robbing people, to stop killing people. Start helping people.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY stares at SANDOR.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: It's never too late to come back.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR returns RAY's gaze but is distracted by three horsemen coming up the way. RAY turns to look at them. SANDOR walks a few paces into the midst of RAY's followers and stares at the riders.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: And it's not about waiting for the gods to answer your prayers. It's not even about the gods. It's about you. Learning you have to answer your prayers yourself.
name: The Broken Man

text: (The three riders reach the group and stop. RAY walks out to meet them. All of RAY's followers stand. The riders are FLYNN, MORGAN, and LEM LEMONCLOAK.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Seven save you, friends. How can we help you?
name: The Broken Man

text: Lem: What are you doing here?
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Well, we're talking about life. You?
name: The Broken Man

text: Lem: Protecting the people.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Well, we thank you for your protection. Who are you protecting us from?
name: The Broken Man

text: Lem: Do you have any horses?
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: No horses. No gold. No steel.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lem: Food, then. Protecting the people is hungry work.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: I'm sure it is. You're welcome to stay for supper, but we have hungry mouths here.
name: The Broken Man

text: Lem: Stay safe. The night is dark and full of terrors.
name: The Broken Man

text: (LEM smiles. The three riders turn the horses around and ride off. SANDOR watches them leave.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: RIVERLANDS - BROTHER RAY'S ENCAMPMENT OUTSKIRTS ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR is splitting wood with an ax on a chopping block. RAY walks up the path. SANDOR sees him coming but continues chopping.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: "Seven save you, friends."
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: I'm a f*cking septon. What was I supposed to say?
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: They don't believe in your Seven. They're from the Brotherhood. They follow the Red God.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Aye, well, all are welcome here. Anyway, we got nothing for them.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR stops chopping.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: Sure, you do. You've got food, you've got steel even if you say you don't. And you've got women.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: What do you want to do? Fight them? Kill them?
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR shrugs and sighs.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: It'd be you against all of them. I mean, these people don't know how to fight.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: You do.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: I'm done with fighting.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: Even if it's to protect yourself?
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: Violence is a disease. You don't cure a disease by spreading it to more people.
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: You don't cure it by dying, either.
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR resumes chopping.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: You've done enough work for one day. Come on up for some supper.
name: The Broken Man

text: (RAY starts back up the path.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Sandor: It's gonna be a cold night. We'll need firewood.
name: The Broken Man

text: Ray: I'll save you a bowl of stew. Might even have some ale hidden away.
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. BRAAVOS - MARKETPLACE ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (People of all sorts line the streets. ARYA walks among them with her hands behind her back. She encounters two men sitting across from each other at a small table.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Man: He's not a lying man. He says the Iron Fleet's in Slaver's Bay. I'm inclined to believe him. I'm not going anywhere near those mad fuckers.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ARYA walks up beside the men and addressing the one who was speaking.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Arya: You're Westerosi.
name: The Broken Man

text: Man: What do you care?
name: The Broken Man

text: Arya: I want to book passage home.
name: The Broken Man

text: (The man laughs.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Man: You? Can't afford it.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ARYA tosses a bag of coins on the table in front of the man. The man opens it and pulls out some coins.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Man: Where'd you steal this from?
name: The Broken Man

text: Arya: Why do you care?
name: The Broken Man

text: Man: We leave in two days. You can have a hammock in steerage.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ARYA throws another bag of coins on the table.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Arya: I want a cabin. And we'll leave at dawn.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ARYA walks past the man and grabs the coin purses off the table on the way.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Arya: See you at sunrise.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ARYA walks onto a bridge and stops to stare out at the Titan. An old woman approaches her.)
name: The Broken Man

text: Woman: Sweet girl.
name: The Broken Man

text: (ARYA turns to face the old woman. The old woman draws a blade and slashes ARYA across the stomach. She grabs ARYA by the neck and holds her tight to her body, the stabs ARYA severl times in the stomach and twists the blade. With her free hand, she reaches up and pulls off her face, revealing she is the WAIF in disguise. ARYA headbutss the WAIF, pushes her, and then runs and jumps off the opposite side of the bridge, plummeting into the water. The WAIF rushes to the side of the bridge ARYA jumped off and stares into the water. Bubbles and blood rise to the surface. The WAIF straightens her shirt and walks away.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: BRAAVOS - MARKETPLACE SHORE ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (ARYA bursts through the surface of the water, gasping. She pulls herself up onto some steps , turns onto her back, and clutches her bleeding stomach.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: BRAAVOS - MARKETPLACE ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (ARYA stumbles through the crowd, clutching her bleeding stomach and shivering. She looks from face to face. Everyone stares at her blankly.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ EXT. RIVERLANDS - BROTHER RAY'S ENCAMPMENT WOODS ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (SANDOR is chopping a branch with a machete. He tosses the machete down and takes a drink of water, then hears people screaming and runs through the woods.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CUT TO: RIVERLANDS - BROTHER RAY'S ENCAMPMENT ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (The dead bodies of RAY's followers are strewn all over the ground. SANDOR walks among them. He approaches the church framing. RAY is hanging by the neck from the framing, dead. SANDOR looks up at him and sighs. He walks to a nearby stump and retrieves an ax.)
name: The Broken Man

text: [ CREDITS ]
name: The Broken Man

text: (theme music playing)
name: No One

text: Lady Crane: My son.
name: No One

text: My firstborn son.
name: No One

text: My child king, hush.
name: No One

text: Listen to the gods, for you they sing.
name: No One

text: Fight no more, sweet child.
name: No One

text: Your wars are won.
name: No One

text: The wolves are buried and the false stag done.
name: No One

text: Shut your blue eyes, my love.
name: No One

text: Let the crown fall.
name: No One

text: The Father above beckons you to his hall.
name: No One

text: In Seventh Heaven I'll see you once more.
name: No One

text: But now I seek vengeance on Sansa the whore and my brother the Imp who killed his own king.
name: No One

text: Born amongst lions, our curse from within.
name: No One

text: I will slay him, I swear.
name: No One

text: With noose or with knife, though it take me a fortnight, a moon or my life.
name: No One

text: (applause)
name: No One

text: (cheering)
name: No One

text: (music playing)
name: No One

text: Bobono: What is that I hear and smell?
name: No One

text: (audience booing)
name: No One

text: Someone I'll soon send to hell.
name: No One

text: It's time to see if truth they told who said Tywin Lannister sh1ts gold.
name: No One

text: (theme music playing)
name: Battle of the Bastards

text: (booming)
name: Battle of the Bastards

text: (man shouts in Valyrian)
name: Battle of the Bastards

text: ♪ (DRAMATIC MUSIC) ♪
name: Winds of Winter

text: (DORAN GRUNTS)
name: Winds of Winter

text: Weak men will never rule Dorne again.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Walder: Riverrun is ours.
name: Winds of Winter

text: You let the Blackfish take it from you.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Take that castle back.
name: Winds of Winter

text: He'll never yield, father.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Walder: You'll remind him who it was that got married at the Red Wedding in the first place.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Edmure: Command all the forces within the castle to lay down their arms. Open the gates.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Petyr: Your aunt Lyanna...
name: Winds of Winter

text: She was already promised to Robert Baratheon.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Sansa: Father never talked about her.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Petyr: How many tens of thousands had to die because Rhaegar chose your aunt.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Sansa: And then he kidnapped her and raped her.
name: Winds of Winter

text: (WOMAN SCREAMING)
name: Winds of Winter

text: We need friends in Westeros, and we need ships.
name: Winds of Winter

text: I hope you're right about this expedition of yours.
name: Winds of Winter

text: If I don't return, you'll know I was wrong.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Daenarys: Our fathers were evil men.
name: Winds of Winter

text: They left the world worse than they found it.
name: Winds of Winter

text: We're going to leave the world better than we found it.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Your reign is over.
name: Winds of Winter

text: My reign has just begun.
name: Winds of Winter

text: (DRAGONS SNARLING)
name: Winds of Winter

text: High Sparrow: You've made great progress.
name: Winds of Winter

text: I only pray your grandmother follows your lead, or I fear for her safety.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Go home. Find comfort in prayer and good works.
name: Winds of Winter

text: The Mother watches over us all.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Tommen: After conferring with His Holiness, the High Septon, we have determined that trial by combat will be forbidden throughout the Seven Kingdoms.
name: Winds of Winter

text: Cersei Lannister and Loras Tyrell will stand trial before seven septons as it was in the earliest days of the faith.
name: Winds of Winter

text: (theme music playing)
name: Winds of Winter

text: (bell tolling)
name: Winds of Winter

text: (tolling continues)
name: Winds of Winter

text: (muttering quietly)
name: Winds of Winter

text: (door opens)
name: Winds of Winter

text: (knocks)
name: Winds of Winter
